examples.text: 某啲新移民無視香港嘅生活方式，將佢哋嗰套照搬嚟香港用。
examples.jyutping: mau5 di1 san1 ji4 man4 mou5 si6 hoeng1 gong2 ge3 sang1 wut6 fong1 sik1, zoeng1 keoi5 dei6 go2 tou3 ziu3 bun1 lei4 hoeng1 gong2 jung6.
examples.translation: Some new immigrants ignore the lifestyle of Hong Kong, and simply maintain theirs instead.

senses.definition: 過於高估自己，唔識得衡量自己嘅能力 (to overrate or overestimate one's own abilities)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 單憑你點可以搬得起張凳啊？真係不自量力！
examples.jyutping: daan1 pang4 nei5 dim2 ho2 ji5 bun1 dak1 hei2 zoeng1 dang3 aa3? zan1 hai6 bat1 zi6 loeng6 lik6!
examples.translation: How can you lift this chair on your own? Don't overestimate your ability!

senses.definition: 唔使去到某個田地；唔導致某結果 (to not have to; to not lead to something)
senses.label: 連詞

examples.text: 我仲好驚依家太晏，好彩喺門口撞到你，咁我都不致失望而回。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 zung6 hou2 geng1 ji1 gaa1 taai3 aan3, hou2 coi2 hai2 mun4 hau2 zong6 dou2 nei5, gam2 ngo5 dou1 bat1 zi3 sat1 mong6 ji4 wui4.
examples.translation: I was worried it might be too late, but luckily, I ran into you at the door and avoided coming here all the way for naught.

senses.definition: 喺配對兩個以上嘅物件、人或者稱呼嘅時候，用嚟詢問每樣嘢各自要配啲乜嘢（量詞「個」會跟住所指嘅嘢變化） (which is which; who is who (the two classifiers #個 go3 can be changed according to the referred items))
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 邊張打邊張
examples.jyutping: bin1 zoeng1 daa2 bin1 zoeng1
examples.translation: which piece is which (for paper, cards, furniture, etc.)

senses.definition: 食咗嘢而唔肚餓 (to get full on food)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 頭先冇#食晏，今晚食多啲飯飽肚先得。
examples.jyutping: tau4 sin1 mou5 sik6 aan3, gam1 maan1 sik6 do1 di1 faan6 baau2 tou5 sin1 dak1.
examples.translation: Since I skipped lunch, I have to eat more rice tonight to get full.

senses.definition: 發生咗唔好嘅事嗰陣用；#大鑊；死喇 (an exclamation, equivalent to "Damn!", "Oh dear!" or "Oh no!", used when the situation is undesirable)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 弊傢伙喇！我跌爛咗阿爸部相機呀！
examples.jyutping: bai6 gaa1 fo2 laa3! ngo5 dit3 laan6 zo2 aa3 baa4 bou6 soeng2 gei1 aa3!
examples.translation: Oh no, I've broken dad's camera!

senses.definition: 假新聞 (fake news; literally: boil water news)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 嗰兩個明星一齊，只係煲水新聞，咁你都信。
examples.translation: The news that those two stars are dating is just fake news. How come you believe that?

senses.definition: 無任何實質證據嘅小道消息 (groundless gossip)

examples.text: 佢吹水唔抹嘴，幾無厘頭嘅煲水新聞都可以講到似層層 。
examples.translation: He is very boastful and can spin the most groundless gossips into seemingly credible information.

senses.definition: #打電話 嘅舊俗稱。以前嘅電話係用脈衝式撥號盤送出接駁信號，撥號盤係一個圓形嘅輪盤，有10個窿，俾人擺隻手指入去想撥嘅數字嘅窿再轉動。 (to call somebody on the telephone, an old term used in the age of rotary pulse-dialing telephone; literally: to dial the wheel)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你到左樓下就撥個輪過我，我嚟接你。
examples.jyutping: nei5 dou3 zo2 lau4 haa6 zau6 but6 go3 leon2 gwo3 ngo5, ngo5 lai4 zip3 nei5.
examples.translation: Call me when you arrive downstairs, I'll come down to pick you up.

senses.definition: 畀全班着嘅同一款嘅衫（量詞：件） (class shirt)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我哋班班衫唔靚咩？
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 baan1 baan1 saam1 m4 leng3 me1?
examples.translation: Our class shirts look fabulous, don’t they?

senses.definition: #夠；滿足 (to fully enjoy or be satisfied by doing something)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 玩咗兩個鐘，乜都玩飽喇。
examples.jyutping: waan2 zo2 loeng5 go3 zung1, mat1 dou1 waan2 baau2 laa3.
examples.translation: After playing for two hours, I'm content.

senses.definition: 保持濕度 (to moisturise, to retain moisture)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 每日都要做好保濕，噉先唔會老化得咁快。
examples.jyutping: mui5 jat6 dou1 jiu3 zou6 hou2 bou2 sap1, gam2 sin1 m4 wui3 lou4 faa3 dak1 gam3 faai3.
examples.translation: Moisturizing daily helps prevent premature aging.

senses.definition: 軍隊駐紮或訓練嘅場所 (barrack; military camp; military camp or training ground)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 古代一啲豪門大族嘅私人軍隊 (private armies owned by noble houses in the ancient times)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 補滿。 (Bring up to full strength, make up a deficiency, fill (a vacancy, gap, etc.).)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 服用我哋呢隻營養飲品，補足更年期女人所需嘅營養。
examples.translation: Our nutritional drinks can supplement the nutrition that menopausal women need.

senses.definition: 改變數學上嘅形態 ((of mathematics) to transform)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 取得#博士 學位後，喺研究機構工作嘅研究人員（量詞：個） (postdoc)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 博士後獎學金
examples.jyutping: bok3 si6 hau6 zoeng2 hok6 gam1
examples.translation: postdoctoral fellowship

senses.definition: 「#包」習慣上錯字，意思係#麪包，常見於餐廳 (a variant of the character "包", bread)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 魚柳飽（見#魚柳包）
examples.jyutping: jyu4 lau5 baau1
examples.translation: fish burger

senses.definition: 太白，搞到好醜樣 (negatively, undesirably white)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 個袋白賴晒，我唔鍾意。
examples.jyutping: go3 doi2 baak6 laai4 saai4, ngo5 m4 zung1 ji3.
examples.translation: The bag is too white, so I do not like it.

senses.definition: 低音結他，音域低過#結他，通常只有四條弦 (bass guitar)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: bass手
examples.translation: bassist; bass player

senses.definition: 引爆炸藥去破壞啲嘢 (to blast; to dynamite; to blow up)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 附近將會進行爆破工程，請駕駛人士留意。
examples.jyutping: fu6 gan6 zoeng1 wui5 zeon3 hang4 baau3 po3 gung1 cing4, cing2 gaa3 sai2 jan4 si6 lau4 ji3.
examples.translation: There will be a construction involving a detonation nearby. Drivers please be aware.

senses.definition: 形容樓市嘅泡沫急速降温 ((of economic bubbles) to burst)

examples.text: 紅籌泡沫最終爆破，大部分紅籌股都跌破招股價。
examples.jyutping: hung4 cau2 pou5 mut6 zeoi3 zung1 baau3 po3, daai6 bou6 fan6 hung4 cau4 gu2 dou1 dit3 po3 ziu1 gu2 gaa3.
examples.translation: The red chip bubble finally burst with most now trading below their issue prices.

senses.definition: 由#醫生 簽署嘅書面證明，記錄醫生嘅#診斷、建議嘅#病假 日數等資料，通常用來畀#病人 交畀公司、學校做記錄，作為請病假嘅憑據（量詞：張／份） (sick leave certificate; doctor's certificate)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 冇用，要嚟都冇幫助，有時會用嚟引伸指一啲嘢質素低。 (useless, sometimes used as a comment on the low quality of something)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 唉，把鬼呀！
examples.jyutping: aai2, baa2 gwai2 aa4!
examples.translation: Argh! This thing is terrible!

senses.definition: 加「把鬼咩？」喺一個動作短句嘅後面，以反詰形式指出個動作冇用。 (adding the expression "把鬼咩?" (baa2 gwai2 me1, always said with falling intonation) after a verb phrase, used as a rhetorical question to mean there is no use in doing something.)

examples.text: 呢度得我哋兩個，要咁多張凳把鬼咩？
examples.jyutping: ni1 dou6 dak1 ngo5 dei6 loeng5 go3, jiu3 gam3 do1 zoeng1 dang3 baa2 gwai2 me1?
examples.translation: Just the two of us are here; what's the use of having so many chairs?

senses.definition: #抽水馬桶 入水入#水箱 嘅#零件（量詞：個） (ballcock; fill valve; float valve)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 即係#避孕套（量詞：個） (condom)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 固定喺牆上嘅大型告示版，通常會喺學校入面揾到（量詞：塊） (a large-scale wall-mounted notice board, usually found in schools)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 貼啲嘢喺壁報板
examples.jyutping: tip3 di1 je5 hai2 bik1 bou3 baan2
examples.translation: to paste something on the notice board

senses.definition: 俾小型船喺颱風或者惡劣天氣期間停泊暫避嘅水域，外圍有#防波堤 阻隔風浪；船隻喺其他時間亦可以入內停泊、舉辦節慶活動等（量詞：個） (typhoon shelter)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 大風喇，駛入避風塘避下先啦。
examples.jyutping: daai6 fung1 laa3, sai2 jap6 bei6 fung1 tong4 bei6 haa5 sin1 laa1.
examples.translation: The wind is getting stronger, steer the ship into the typhoon shelter first.

senses.definition: 貼／釘喺#壁報板 上面嘅佈置（量詞：塊） (decoration on a wall-mounted backdrop)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: #壁報板
examples.jyutping: bik1 bou3 baan2
examples.translation: wall-mounted notice board

senses.definition: 同軍事有關嘅 (something that is military-related)
senses.label: 語素

examples.text: #兵器
examples.jyutping: bing1 hei3
examples.translation: military weapon, such as spear, sword, but usually does not include modern military tech

senses.definition: 姓 (a surname, usually transliterated as "But", "Butt" or "Pat")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 完結，完成 (to finish; to complete; to end)
senses.label: 語素

examples.text: #畢業
examples.jyutping: bat1 jip6
examples.translation: to graduate

senses.definition: 形容人面色紅潤；氣色好 ((describing people's cheek or complexion) bright and rosy)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 白裏透紅嘅面色係健康嘅象徵。
examples.jyutping: baak6 leoi5 tau3 hung4 ge3 min6 sik1 hai6 gin6 hong1 ge3 zoeng6 zing1.
examples.translation: A bright and rosy cheek is a sign of good health.

senses.definition: 由天樞、天璇、天璣、天權、玉衡、開陽、瑤光七粒星組成，形狀好似𢳂酒嘅斗形，所以叫北斗星；將天樞同天旋嘅長度伸延大約五倍就會揾到#北極星 (the Big Dipper; an asterism formed by the seven stars Dubhe, Merak, Phecda, Megrez, Alioth, Mizar and Alkaid)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 啱啱#入睡 或者就#醒 嗰時，有意識但係身體一時之間郁唔到嘅現象；科學上叫睡眠癱瘓，亦有人話係俾#鬼#壓 完至會噉 ("night hag syndrome"; to be momentarily paralyzed before falling asleep or waking up, some believe that this happens because one is literally "pressed by a ghost")
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢噚晚俾鬼磧，所以今日冇乜精神。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 cam4 maan5 bei2 gwai2 zaak6, so2 ji5 gam1 jat6 mou5 mat1 zing1 san4.
examples.translation: He was "pressed by a ghost" last night, so he is tired today.

senses.definition: 即係食#白粉（#海洛英） (to do dope; to take heroin)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 將障礙消除，將問題解決。 (Remove the obstacles, resolve the problem.)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 阿媽唔俾我去旅行啊，你幫我擺平佢啦！
examples.jyutping: aa3 maa1 m4 bei2 ngo5 heoi3 leoi5 hang4 aa3, nei5 bong1 ngo5 baai2 ping4 keoi5 laa1!
examples.translation: Mom won't let me travel, help me convince her!

senses.definition: 形容一個人成日駁嘴 (used to describe a person who talks back no matter what; a stuck-up; quarrelsome; contentious; pugnacious)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢成日都駁嘴㗎啦，正一包拗頸。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 seng4 jat6 dou1 bok3 zeoi2 gaa3 laa1, zing3 jat1 baau1 ngaau3 geng2.
examples.translation: He's constantly arguing back, always ready with a retort. Such a stubborn and argumentative person.

senses.definition: （經濟、商業）唔好，蕭條，前景唔明朗 ((of economy and business) depressed; in recession; the future is not bright)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 樓市不景氣，人人都唔打算買樓投資。
examples.jyutping: lau4 si5 bat1 ging2 hei3, jan4 jan4 dou1 m4 daa2 syun3 maai5 lau2 tau4 zi1.
examples.translation: The real estate market is unfavorable, so few are planning to invest in it.

senses.definition: 好多#冰#雪 長年堆埋一齊形成一條#河 咁樣嘅地貌，下層嘅冰受壓滑動就好似一條流得好慢嘅河（量詞：條） (glacier)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 南極冰川正在以驚人速度融化，情況令人擔憂困惑。
examples.translation: The Antarctic ice sheets are melting at an alarming rate. The situation is very concerning.

senses.definition: 平時出街嘅衫，唔係制服或者莊重嘅衫（量詞：套） (informal or ordinary clothes)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 便服日
examples.jyutping: bin6 fuk6 jat6
examples.translation: dress casual day

senses.definition: 長時間、大量受到某種好差嘅待遇，或者精神上嘅負擔 (to suffer hugely and extensively from)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 個小朋友一直以嚟飽受虐待。
examples.jyutping: go3 siu2 pang4 jau5 jat1 zik6 ji5 lai4 baau2 sau6 joek6 doi6.
examples.translation: The child has suffered severe long term abuse.

senses.definition: 用匙羹或者殼將飯裝入碗入面；睇埋#潷 (use a scoop to put rice into the bowl)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 去幫老豆潷飯啦。
examples.jyutping: heoi3 bong1 lou5 dau6 bat1 faan6 laa1.
examples.translation: Help your dad scoop rice into his bowl.

senses.definition: 用嚟捉動物嘅裝置（量詞：個） (animal trap)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 近年不時有動物同市民喺郊區畀非法設置嘅捕獸器整傷。
examples.jyutping: gan6 nin4 bat1 si4 jau5 dung6 mat6 tung4 si5 man4 hai2 gaau1 keoi1 bei2 fei1 faat3 cit3 zi3 ge3 bou6 sau3 hei3 zing2 soeng1.
examples.translation: In recent years, there have been cases of animals and members of the public being injured by illegal animal traps in rural areas.

senses.definition: 明確表示自己嘅立場，通常有「唔俾面」嘅意思 (to show somebody's feeling or attitude without concealment; unabashedly)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 政府擺明唔接受呢個方案。
examples.jyutping: zing3 fu2 baai2 ming4 m4 zip3 sau6 ni1 go3 fong1 on3.
examples.translation: The government is evidently opposed to this proposal.

senses.definition: 顯而易見 (obvious, plain to see)

examples.text: 個答案擺明錯啦，四乘六點會係單數呀？
examples.jyutping: go3 daap3 on3 baai2 ming4 co3 laa1, sei3 sing4 luk6 dim2 wui5 hai6 daan1 sou3 aa3?
examples.translation: The answer is obviously wrong, how could you get an odd number from 4 times 6?

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
名貴、跑得好快嘅馬 (a valuable, precious horse; a "thoroughbred")
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 寶馬雕車香滿路。
examples.jyutping: bou2 maa5 diu1 geoi1 hoeng1 mun5 lou6.
examples.translation: Fine steeds and carved cabs spread fragrance en route.

senses.definition: 德國汽車品牌之一（量詞：架） (BMW, a German automotive company)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 一戰後，寶馬開始生產電單車同電單車引擎。
examples.jyutping: jat1 zin3 hau6, bou2 maa5 hoi1 ci2 sang1 caan2 din6 daan1 ce1 tung4 din6 daan1 ce1 jan5 king4.
examples.translation: BMW began production of motorcycle engines and then motorcycles after World War I.

senses.definition: 冇乜 #名氣，唔 #出名；字面解釋係「經書、傳記裏面都揾唔到」 (used to describe somebody who is not famous at all; literally: not found in classics and biographies)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 孔乙己係一個不見經傳嘅小人物。
examples.jyutping: hung2 jyut6 gei2 hai6 jat1 go3 bat1 gin3 ging1 zyun2 ge3 siu2 jan4 mat2
examples.translation: Hung Jyut Gei (character name) is not a famous person.

phonetic.original: baak3 zit3 bat1 naau5:baak3 zit3 bat1 naau4

senses.definition: 經歷過無數嘅挫折都仍然唔放棄，堅持繼續努力 (indomitable; steadfast)
senses.label: 語句

keywords: baak3 zit3 bat1 naau5:baak3 zit3 bat1 naau4

senses.definition: 唔怕#麻煩；好有#耐性 (to be patient; to be tolerant)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 我都不厭其煩再三叮囑你，點知你都係唔記得。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dou1 bat1 jim3 kei4 faan4 zoi3 saam1 ding1 zuk1 nei5, dim2 zi1 nei5 dou1 hai6 m4 gei3 dak1.
examples.translation: I have been patient with you. I reminded you again and again. It turns out that you still do not remember.

senses.definition: 一束綁起咗嘅頭髮（量詞：條） (braid; plait; ponytail; a bunch of hair that is tied together)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: #紮辮
examples.jyutping: zaat3 bin1
examples.translation: to tie up the hair

senses.definition: 紮頭髮嘅橡筋（量詞：條） (hair tie)

examples.text: 哎呀死啦冇帶條辮出街，一陣熱死都冇得紮起喇。
examples.jyutping: ai1 aa3 sei2 laa1 mou5 daai3 tiu4 bin1 ceot1 gaai1, jat1 zan6 jit6 sei2 dou1 mou5 dak1 zaat3 hei2 laa3.
examples.translation: Oh no, I didn't bring my hair tie, so I can't tie my hair up even if it gets too hot.

senses.definition: 指一個行為完全冇用（用喺動詞短語後面，要用「嚟把屁」嘅形式） (completely useless, completely pointless (the form 嚟把屁 lai4 baa2 pei3 is used when placed after a verb phrase))
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 得嗰兩日假，旅行嚟把屁咩？
examples.jyutping: dak1 go2 loeng5 jat6 gaa3, leoi5 hang4 lai4 baa2 pei3 me1?
examples.translation: I only have two days of vacation. What's the point of going on a holiday?

senses.definition: 已經準備就緒嘅#計劃 (a plan which is ready)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我哋唔可以俾佢打亂部署，唔係就會前功盡廢。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 m4 ho2 ji5 bei2 keoi5 daa2 lyun6 bou6 cyu5, m4 hai6 zau6 wui5 cin4 gung1 zeon6 fai3
examples.translation: We cannot let him disrupt our plans, or all our efforts will be wasted.

senses.definition: 保護、修理，令物件保持良好狀態 (to maintain; to keep something in good condition by checking or repairing it regularly)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 單車保養心得
examples.jyutping: daan1 ce1 bou2 joeng5 sam1 dak1
examples.translation: bike maintenance tips

senses.definition: 保護、調理、休養，令身體保持良好狀態 (to take care of one's health; to nourish)

examples.text: 保養頭髮
examples.jyutping: bou2 joeng5 tau4 faat3
examples.translation: to nourish one's hair

senses.definition: 交易前，賣家報俾買家聽嘅貨品或者服務價格（量詞：個） (quoted price; quote)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 老闆話太貴喎，你問多幾度攞報價啦。
examples.jyutping: lou5 baan2 waa6 taai3 gwai3 wo3, nei5 man6 do1 gei2 dou6 lo2 bou3 gaa3 laa1.
examples.translation: The boss says the price is too high. You should get more quotes from different vendors.

senses.definition: 對越南船民嘅謔稱。 (Cantonese corruption of the Vietnamese phrase "bắt đầu từ nay", or in English "from now on", which were the first few words of a Hong Kong radio public service announcement in Vietnamese in the late 80s during the boat people crisis, warning Vietnamese boat people of a screening policy against economic immigrants. As the message was often repeated on public radio, it became a derogatory slur of Vietnamese people in Hong Kong.)

examples.jyutping: mui5 go3 sing1 kei4 jat6 ziu1 zou2, ngo5 dou1 wui5 dak6 dang1 zou2 di1 hei2 san1 heoi3 mak6 gei3 sik6 baan1 kik1.
examples.translation: Every Sunday, I wake up earlier in the morning just to have pancakes at McDonald's.

senses.definition: 可麗餅，一種薄身啲嘅熱香餅，通常會夾埋忌廉同生果（例如芒果）或者唔甜嘅餡（例如菠菜）一齊食（量詞：份／嚿） (crêpe, a thin pancake often served with whipped cream and fruit (like mango) or savoury fillings (like spinach))

examples.text: 芒果班戟又平又好食，不過啲忌廉勁肥。
examples.jyutping: mong1 gwo2 baan1 kik1 jau6 peng4 jau6 hou2 sik6, bat1 gwo3 di1 gei6 lim1 ging6 fei4.
examples.translation: Mango crêpes are cheap and tasty, but the whipped cream contains a ton of fat.

senses.definition: 搏矇闖入私人地方嘅人 (a trespasser)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 嚴拿白撞。
examples.jyutping: jim4 naa4 baak6 zong6.
examples.translation: Trespassers will be apprehended.

senses.definition: 引申指入到舖頭齋睇唔買嘢嘅人，又作「#混吉」 (a person who goes into a shop with no intent to purchase anything)
#隔籬；#側邊；#旁邊；馬來西亞粵語詞彙 (neighbouring; adjacent; next to; used in Malaysian Cantonese)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我企妳邊皮，妳問我邊度有皮
examples.jyutping: ngo5 kei5 nei5 bin1 pei4, nei5 man6 ngo5 bin1 dou6 jau5 pei4
examples.translation: I stand beside you, you ask me where I have skin

senses.definition: 即係#救護車，因為救護車嘅車身主要係白色嘅；一架專門用嚟運送傷者、病人去醫院嘅車（量詞：架／部） (an ambulance; literally, white car)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢暈咗呀，快啲 Call 白車！
examples.jyutping: keoi5 wan4 zo2 aa3, faai3 di1 ko1 baak6 ce1!
examples.translation: We got someone fainted here, call the ambulance now!

senses.definition: 好似#鮮奶、#雪 咁純淨嘅顏色 (white)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: #白色
examples.jyutping: baak6 sik1
examples.translation: white colour

senses.definition: 講得清楚、老實、冇隱暪、冇轉彎抹角 (being explicit, frank, unreserved, straightforward)

examples.text: 我講得好白，唔妥嘅可以走。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 gong2 dak1 hou2 baak6, m4 to5 ge3 ho2 ji5 zau2.
examples.translation: I'm making it explicit here. If anyone doesn't agree, you may leave.

senses.definition: 指負上餘下責任，承擔人哋未完成工作，承接貸尾，或代為支付#尾數；睇返#包 (to take up remaining responsibility, to do the unfinished job left from others, to accept remaining goods, to pay for someone's outstanding amount. Literally: wrap up the bottom)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢啲手尾等我包底啦，你哋走先。
examples.jyutping: lei1 di1 sau2 mei5 dang2 ngo5 baau1 dai2 laa1, nei5 dei6 zau2 sin1.
examples.translation: Just leave those unfinished jobs to me, you guys can leave first.

senses.definition: 話一啲嘢俾人聽 (to tell others something; to inform)
senses.label: 語素

examples.text: #表白
examples.jyutping: biu2 baak6
examples.translation: to vindicate

senses.definition: 同口語有關嘅 (related to the vernacular)

examples.text: #白話
examples.jyutping: baak6 waa2
examples.translation: the vernacular (i.e. Cantonese)

senses.definition: 淺顯易明 (easy to understand)

examples.text: #淺白
examples.jyutping: cin2 baak6
examples.translation: (of an explanation) easy to understand

senses.definition: 漢字嘅其中一個讀法，同#文讀 相對；通常用於比較#口語 化嘅情況 (the colloquial pronunciation (as opposed to 文讀 man4 duk6 "literary pronunciation"))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 平嘅白讀音係peng4。
examples.jyutping: peng4 ge3 baak6 duk6 jam1 hai6 peng4.
examples.translation: The colloquial pronunciation of "平" is "peng4".

senses.definition: 向#北 嘅方向；#北面 (north; northern part)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我係北方人。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 hai6 bak1 fong1 jan4.
examples.translation: I am a northerner; I come from the north.

senses.definition: （機會）捉緊，珍惜，好好利用 ((opportunity) to grasp; to hold)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你要好好把握呢次機會呀，呢啲機會好難得。
examples.jyutping: nei5 jiu3 hou2 hou2 baa2 ak1 ni1 ci3 gei1 wui6 aa3, ni1 di1 gei1 wui6 hou2 naan4 dak1.
examples.translation: You should seize this opportunity, these opportunities are rare.

senses.definition: 七、八十年代大眾對#社會工作者 嘅比喻，代表佢哋為弱勢社群帶來光芒，為迷失者指引前路。源於當年無綫電視一套劇集《北斗星》 (figuratively: social workers, a term used in Hong Kong 1970-80's; literally: the Big Dipper)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 近年社會貧富懸殊加劇，令更多年青人選擇入讀社工系，希望畢業後做北斗星幫助弱勢社群。
examples.translation: In recent years the wealth disparity of the society is becoming more serious, this has pushed more youth to select social work major in higher education, hoping to be social workers to help disadvantaged groups.

senses.definition: 火鍋、邊爐嘅網絡寫法，取自粵語拼音 (hotpot)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 打binlo
examples.translation: to have a hotpot meal

senses.definition: 一定會經歷或經過 (necessary, unavoidable)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢個商場係好多居民返屋企嘅必經之路，有好有唔好囉。
examples.jyutping: nei1 go3 soeng1 coeng4 hai6 hou2 do1 geoi1 man4 faan1 uk1 kei2 ge3 bit1 ging1 zi1 lou6, jau5 hou2 jau5 m4 hou2 lo1.
examples.translation: This shopping centre is on along the path where many residents return home, so it has its advantages and disadvantages.

senses.definition: 家用#洗衣機、#冷氣機、#雪櫃 嘅統稱；相對「#黑電」 (white goods; the collective term of home use washing machine, air conditioner, refrigerator)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 用嚟帶出一啲對方理應知道，或者顯然而見嘅事實 (used in statements to indicate that the mentioned fact is supposed to be known to the speaker, or is regarded as obvious)
senses.label: 助詞

examples.text: 冇法啦，個女似我嚊。
examples.jyutping: mou5 faat3 laa1, go3 neoi2 ci5 ngo5 be6.
examples.translation: X

senses.definition: 喺社交媒體上封鎖某個用户，令佢冇得瀏覽你嘅個人檔案及活動，冇得同你溝通 (to block a user on social media)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我畀佢block咗好幾日喇。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 bei2 keoi5 bok1 zo2 hou2 gei2 jat6 laa3.
examples.translation: I have been blocked by him for a few days.

senses.definition: 網購時商家俾埋運費或郵費，免費提供郵寄服務。 (to provide free shipping)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 全店買滿500蚊就包埋郵俾你。
examples.translation: Enjoy free shipping when you purchase over $500 in the store.

senses.definition: #預約（量詞：個） (booking)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 唔該幫我取消咗個booking佢。
examples.translation: Can you help me to cancel my booking.

senses.definition: #石蒜 嘅日本名；一種鮮紅色嘅花，花瓣成針 (Lycoris radiata; red spider lily)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 指一系列中互相連接嘅作品或文章，通常用於小説或電影 (logia; discourse; series)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 三部曲
examples.translation: Trilogy

senses.definition: 即係#波 嘅#BB話 ((baby talk) ball; spherical plaything)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 形容一啲一半肥肉一半瘦肉嘅肉 (describes meat that consists of half fatty meat and half lean meat)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 半肥瘦叉燒
examples.translation: half-fat half-lean cha siu

senses.definition: 非常廉價嘅#酒店，通常略帶貶義；亦專指#開房 嘅地方（量詞：間） (guesthouse; motel; cheap hotel-like lodging; especially refer to a room for a sexual encounter)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢間賓館真係好污糟，連啲水都唔知可唔可以用嚟洗手。
examples.jyutping: ni1 gaan1 ban1 gun2 zan1 hai6 hou2 wu1 zou1, lin4 di1 seoi2 dou1 m4 zi1 ho2 m4 ho2 ji5 jung6 lei4 sai2 sau2
examples.translation: This guesthouse is really dodgy. I don't know if the tap water is even clean enough to wash your hands with.

senses.definition: 忍唔住 (cannot refrain from, wanted not to but did so)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 佢哋聽到個消息之後都不禁喊起上嚟。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 teng1 dou2 go3 siu1 sik1 zi1 hau6 dou1 bat1 gam3 haam3 hei2 soeng5 lai4.
examples.translation: They couldn't help crying after they heard the news.

senses.definition: 唔知頭尾 (to not know the whole story; to be unaware of the full situation; to be partially in the dark about something; literally: to eat gourd late at night)
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: 即係#屎；通常形容細路仔嘅屎 (excrement; poop)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 屙bet bet
examples.jyutping: o1 bet4 bet4
examples.translation: to poop

senses.definition: 形容人唔驚#瘀皮 噉向地位低過自己嘅人求教 (unafraid or unashamed to ask or learn from someone of a lower status or standing)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 做人應該不恥下問，有咩問清楚。
examples.jyutping: zou6 jan4 jing1 goi1 bat1 ci2 haa6 man6, jau5 me1 man6 cing1 co2.
examples.translation: We shouldn't be afraid/ashamed to ask those junior to us; if you have a question, ask away.

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
未有內容 NO DATA
未有內容 NO DATA

未有內容 NO DATA
事物本身就有嘅特性；人嘅本性 (intrinsic quality; nature; essence)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢兩套理論從本質上嚟講係好相似嘅。
examples.jyutping: ni1 loeng5 tou3 lei5 leon4 cung4 bun2 zat1 soeng6 lei4 gong2 hai6 hou2 soeng1 ci5 ge3
examples.translation: The two theories are very similar in essence.

senses.definition: 一開始、最初嗰陣；用嚟指出喺比較早期就已經發生嘅情況 (originally; in a prior state)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 本身我唔鍾意佢㗎，但係後來又覺得佢幾好人。
examples.jyutping: bun2 san1 ngo5 m4 zung1 ji3 keoi5 gaa3, daan6 hai6 hau6 loi4 jau6 gok3 dak1 keoi5 gei2 hou2 jan4.
examples.translation: Originally I didn't like him, but afterwards I thought he was a nice person.

senses.definition: 表示一種內在品質 (essentially; fundamentally; intrinsically; inherently)

examples.text: 佢本身都唔係啲好大膽嘅人。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 bun2 san1 dou1 m4 hai6 di1 hou2 daai6 daam2 ge3 jan4.
examples.translation: He is intrinsically not a bold person.

senses.definition: 形容風景秀麗，引人入勝；尤其係偏遠或意想不到嘅地方 (attractive scenery; especially for those in remote places or surprising locations)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢度位置偏遠，風景別有洞天。
examples.jyutping: nei1 dou6 wai6 zi3 pin1 jyun5, fung1 ging2 bit6 jau5 dung6 tin1.
examples.translation: This place is remotely located and has very attractive scenery.

senses.definition: 海名；位於#歐洲 內陸，透過一條海峽同北#大西洋 相連；鄰接#芬蘭、#愛沙尼亞、#拉脱維亞、#立陶宛、#俄羅斯、#德國、#丹麥、#瑞典 多國 (Baltic Sea)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #顏色#改變 (to change colour)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 啲蝦熟咗之後會變色。
examples.jyutping: di1 haa1 suk6 zo2 zi1 hau6 wui2 bin3 sik1.
examples.translation: The shrimps will have a change in colour after being cooked.

senses.definition: 比喻情緒改變，表現出#驚 或#嬲 嘅樣 (to be angry or frightened)

examples.text: 做咩你個樣變晒色嘅？
examples.jyutping: zou6 me1 nei5 go3 joeng2 bin3 saai3 sik1 ge2?
examples.translation: Why do you look so angry/frightened?

senses.definition: 用花紙包裹物件，係送禮物嘅步驟之一。呢個詞係禮品店裏面成日聽到。 (to wrap up an object, especially one bought in a shop)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 可唔可以同我包起啲禮物？
examples.jyutping: ho2 m4 ho2 ji5 tung4 ngo5 baau1 hei2 di1 lai5 mat6?
examples.translation: Can you wrap up the presents for me?

senses.definition: 將一個場地、或者一架交通工具暫時完全租用 (to rent a space for certain activities (not for living) or to charter a vehicle)

examples.text: 佢包起咗架飛機送隻狗去英國。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 baau1 hei2 zo2 gaa3 fei1 gei1 sung3 zek3 gau2 heoi3 jing1 gwok3.
examples.translation: He chartered a plane to send his dog to England.

senses.definition: 以金錢資助去包養、擁有一位女性，包括係陪伴同性服務方面嘅擁有權 (to financially support a female in exchange for her company and sexual services; in a way, the 'benefactor' owns the female)

examples.text: 有個學生俾人用每個月一萬蚊呢個價包起咗。
examples.jyutping: jau5 go3 hok6 saang1 bei2 jan4 jung6 mui5 go3 jyut6 jat1 maan6 man1 ni1 go3 gaa3 baau1 hei2 zo2.
examples.translation: A student was 'bought up' by a sugar daddy at the price of ten thousand dollars per month.

senses.definition: 用暴力打開一道鎖咗嘅門 (to break into)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 疑犯唔開門，結果差佬爆門入屋。
examples.jyutping: ji4 faan2 m4 hoi1 mun4, git3 gwo2 caai1 lou2 baau3 mun4 jap6 uk1.
examples.translation: The suspect didn't open the door, so the police had to force entry.

senses.definition: 因物件內壓力太大而導致外結構破裂 (to crack; to burst)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 地鐵水管爆裂，坐地鐵變咗坐潛水艇。
examples.jyutping: dei6 tit3 seoi2 gun2 baau3 lit6, co5 dei6 tit3 bin3 zo2 co5 cim4 seoi2 teng5.
examples.translation: An underground water pipe burst on the MTR. Taking the train now feels like riding a submarine.

senses.definition: 用眼長時間𥄫住 (to stare at for a long time)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 睥咩呀睥！
examples.translation: What are you staring at?!

senses.definition: 指眼睛斜向旁邊望，一幅不屑嘅樣 (to stare from the side, and show an unwelcome gesture)

examples.text: 斜睥
examples.translation: to stare from the side

senses.definition: 去祝賀老人家擺#大壽，賀佢生日 (to congratulate an elderly person on his decadeversary; to offer birthday felicitations)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 去阿爺度拜大壽有冇壽包食？
examples.jyutping: heoi3 aa3 je4 dou6 baai3 daai6 sau6 jau5 mou5 sau6 baau1 sik6?
examples.translation: Will we have steamed peach buns at Grandpa's birthday celebration?

senses.definition: 用嚟話人條命生得好，人生好順利 (to be born lucky; born under a lucky star)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 八字生得正真係好，要乜有乜。
examples.jyutping: baat3 zi6 saang1 dak1 zeng3 zan1 hai6 hou2, jiu3 mat1 jau5 mat1.
examples.translation: Being born under a lucky star is very beneficial, it brings many advantages.

senses.definition: 行為怪異反常嘅男人，通常會作出令人理解唔到或接受唔到嘅事情以及舉動（量詞：個／條） (an abnormal man; pervert)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我喺巴士度見到個變態佬係噉喺度大嗌。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 hai2 baa1 si2 dou6 gin3 dou2 go3 bin3 taai3 lou2 hai6 gam2 hai2 dou6 daai6 aai3.
examples.translation: On the bus, I saw a strange man shouting loudly.

senses.definition: 好白；白到好似雪咁 (very white; as white as snow)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢啲皮膚白雪雪，一啲都唔似係本地人。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 di1 pei4 fu1 baak6 syut1 syut1, jat1 di1 dou1 m4 ci5 hai6 bun2 dei6 jan4.
examples.translation: His skin is so white that he doesn't look like a local at all.

senses.definition: 食一餐好嘢嘅時候食到好飽 (to have a full meal)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 飽嘗一餐豐富嘅京菜
examples.jyutping: baau2 soeng4 jat1 caan1 fung1 fu3 ge3 ging1 coi3
examples.translation: to have a full meal of Beijing cuisine

senses.definition: 借代遇到好多挫折同艱難嘅歷練 (to face challenges or intense hardship)

examples.text: 個小朋友一直以嚟飽嘗風霜。
examples.jyutping: go3 siu2 pang4 jau5 jat1 zik6 ji5 lai4 baau2 soeng4 fung1 soeng1.
examples.translation: The child has endured many hardships.

senses.definition: 凶悍、不講理；多數形容女人 (fierce, easy to anger (generally used to describe women))
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢條女咁巴辣，你啃啦！
examples.jyutping: ni1 tiu4 neoi2 gam3 baa1 laat6, nei5 kang2 laa1!
examples.translation: She is a handful. You can take her!

senses.definition: 一種青色，呈#球體 嘅#蔬菜 (cabbage)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 咩話？雲吞嘅餡係包心菜豬肉？點食呀？
examples.jyutping: me1 waa2? wan4 tan1 ge3 haam2 hai6 baau1 sam1 coi3 zyu1 juk6? dim2 sik6 aa3?
examples.translation: What? You put cabbage and pork as filling for wonton? This isn't proper food!

senses.definition: 用#文火 慢慢噉煮食物 (to boil; to slowly cook liquid for a long time; a type of Chinese cooking method)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: #煲湯
examples.jyutping: bou1 tong1
examples.translation: to make soup

senses.definition: #食煙 (to smoke cigarettes)

examples.text: 食完飯煲支煙先！
examples.jyutping: sik6 jyun4 faan6 bou1 zi1 jin1 sin1!
examples.translation: Let me have a cigarette after the meal.

senses.definition: 長期集中做一件事 (to do an action intensively for a long period of time)

examples.text: #煲劇
examples.jyutping: bou1 kek6
examples.translation: to binge-watch soap opera

senses.definition: 唔容許、唔可以有錯失 (cannot miss; to not allow any fault or failure)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 今次不容有失，一定要全力做好佢。
examples.jyutping: gam1 ci3 bat1 jung4 jau5 sat1, jat1 ding6 jiu3 cyun4 lik6 zou6 hou2 keoi5.
examples.translation: We cannot miss this chance. We must give it our all.

senses.definition: 直抄，尤其冇理解過、消化過（含貶義） ((derogatory) to copy verbatim, especially without understanding)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 搬字過紙直譯新聞，算乜記者？
examples.jyutping: bun1 zi6 gwo3 zi2 zik6 jik6 san1 man2, syun3 mat1 gei3 ze2?
examples.translation: How can they be considered journalists if they simply translate news reports verbatim?

senses.definition: 描述一種全神貫注、超常發揮嘅狀態，出自日本動畫《Gundam Seed》中主角#覺醒 嘅狀態 (to push oneself beyond the limit; literally: to explode seed)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 美斯尋日爆seed連入馬體會三球呀！
examples.jyutping: mei5 si1 cam4 jat6 baau3 sit1 lin4 jap6 maa5 tai2 wui2 saam1 kau4 aa3!
examples.translation: Messi scored a hat trick against Atlético Madrid yesterday!

senses.definition: 去酒店#開房#做愛 (to go to a hotel for sex; literally "to burst open a room")

senses.definition: 源自古代中國，係一種利用 #天干 （ 甲、乙、丙、丁、戊、己、庚、辛、壬、癸）同 #地支 （子、寅、辰、午、申、戌、丑、卯、巳、未、酉、亥）嚟準確記錄年、月、日、時嘅方式。後來引伸為一個人嘅#時辰八字，即出生嘅年、月、日、時。有人認為一個人出世嘅時間，會決定佢日後嘅命運，同埋同其他人嘅關係。所以如果兩個人性格不合，會話佢哋「八字唔夾」。 (A method to record time (year, month, date, hour) in ancient China, and the word has an extended meaning of someone's birth time (record). It is also believed that the birth time determines how well a person will be and goes with another person. So when two persons do not go well with each other, it's said that 'their birth times do not match'.)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 去人哋屋企拜訪嘅時候屋主唔俾人客入屋，或者臨時被拒絕見面。 (to refuse seeing somebody, to turn somebody down; literally, close door soup)

examples.text: 我都係唔揾佢喇，費事俾人請我食閉門羹啦。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dou1 hai6 m4 wan2 keoi5 laa3, fai3 si6 bei2 jan4 ceng2 ngo5 sik6 bai3 mun4 gang1 laa1.
examples.translation: I'm not going to bother with him, to avoid rejection.

senses.definition: #優秀，#突出 (outstanding; excellent)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢嘅考試成績不嬲都好標青。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 ge3 haau2 si5 sing4 zik1 bat1 nau1 dou1 hou2 biu1 ceng1.
examples.translation: He has always excelled in his examinations.

senses.definition: 演員裝扮成戲中某一角色演出 ((in performances) to act; to play the part of)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢喺套戲入面扮演一個精明嘅律師。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 hai2 tou3 hei3 jap6 min6 baan6 jin2 jat1 go3 zing1 ming4 ge3 leot6 si1.
examples.translation: She played the part of a smart lawyer in the film.

senses.definition: 背負住一個身份以及對應嘅權責同期望 (to play a part of; to play a role of)

examples.text: 每個人喺日常生活都扮演住唔同嘅角色。
examples.jyutping: mui5 go3 jan4 hai2 jat6 soeng4 sang1 wut6 dou1 baan6 jin2 zyu2 m4 tung4 ge3 gok3 sik1.
examples.translation: Everyone plays various roles in their daily lives.

senses.definition: 同你#過人世 嘅人（量詞：個） (partner; lover; spouse)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你年紀都唔細喇，揾返個伴互相照應啦。
examples.jyutping: nei5 nin4 gei2 dou1 m4 sai3 laa3, wan2 faan1 go3 bun2 wu6 soeng1 ziu3 jing3 laa1.
examples.translation: At this age, maybe you should find a partner to look after each other.

senses.definition: 一齊去做某樣嘢嘅人 (somebody to do something together)

examples.text: 想busking，有冇伴？
examples.jyutping: soeng2 bas1 king4, jau5 mou5 pun2?
examples.translation: Is anyone interested in busking with me?

senses.definition: 捱夜唔瞓去做嘢或者去玩 (to stay up all night (to work or to play); to pull an all-nighter)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 連續爆咗三晚肝，再做就拉柴喇。
examples.jyutping: lin4 zuk6 baau3 zo2 saam1 maan5 gon1, zoi3 zou6 zau6 laai1 caai4 laa3.
examples.translation: I have worked three consecutive nights without sleep. I will probably die if I continue doing this.

senses.definition: 因為做嘢嘅時間太長、作息失調，導致精神體力變差 (to have deteriorated health due to overworking and disturbed sleep-wake cycle, originating from the traditional belief that overworking and sleeping disturbances would harm the liver)

examples.text: 做到爆肝
examples.jyutping: zou6 dou3 baau3 gon1
examples.translation: to work too much; to work till health is compromised

senses.definition: 半路；去到一半；棘住喺中間，唔上唔落 (caught in a dilemma; not know whether to go forward or back)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 我啲嘢做到半langkang，但係又好肚餓喎。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 di1 je5 zou6 dou3 bun3 lang1 kang1, daan6 hai6 jau6 hou2 tou5 ngo6 wo3.
examples.translation: I'm in the middle of something important, so it's hard for me to stop and eat even though I am very hungry.

senses.definition: 發生咗唔好嘅事嗰陣用；#大鑊；死喇 (an exclamation, equivalent to "damn!" or "blast")
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 弊傢溜喇！我跌爛咗阿爸部相機呀！
examples.jyutping: bai6 gaa1 leu1 laa3! ngo5 dit3 laan6 zo2 aa3 baa4 bou6 soeng2 gei1 aa3!
examples.translation: Oh crap, I broke dad's camera!

senses.definition: 出版#報紙 嘅機構（量詞：間） (newspaper publisher)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 家下喺報社做記者，人工好奀㗎咋！
examples.jyutping: gaa1 haa5 hai2 bou3 se5 zou6 gei3 ze2, jan4 gung1 hou2 ngan1 gaa3 zaa3!
examples.translation: Journalists working for newspaper are poorly paid these days.

senses.definition: #杯葛 (to boycott)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 而家佢哋杯緊阿明，你同阿明玩嘅話跟住都會俾佢哋杯㗎。
examples.jyutping: ji4 gaa1 keoi5 dei6 bui1 gan2 aa3 ming4, nei5 tung4 aa3 ming4 waan2 ge3 waa2 gan1 zyu6 dou1 wui5 bei2 keoi5 dei6 bui1 gaa3.
examples.translation: They're boycotting Ming. If you play with him, you'll be boycotted by them too.

senses.definition: 堤壩頂唔住洪水而穿窿受損，導致水浸 (to have a dam burst or dam failure)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 連日暴雨，大壩終於崩堤。
examples.jyutping: lin4 jat6 bou6 jyu5, daai6 baa3 zung1 jyu1 bang1 tai4.
examples.translation: After several days of heavy rain, the great dam finally collapses.

senses.definition: 比喻#崩盤 ((of a market) to collapse)

examples.text: 全球對港元冇信心就會崩堤。
examples.jyutping: cyun4 kau4 deoi3 gong2 jyun4 mou5 seon3 sam1 zau6 wui5 bang1 tai4.
examples.translation: Hong Kong dollar will collapse when global investors lose faith in it.

senses.definition: 精神崩潰 (to have a mental breakdown)

examples.text: 一提起屋企人佢就無啦啦崩堤。
examples.jyutping: jat1 tai4 hei2 uk1 kei5 jan4 keoi5 zau6 mou4 laa1 laa1 bang1 tai4.
examples.translation: When she mentioned her family, she suddenly broke down emotionally.

senses.definition: 唔掂，唔好嘅；通常用嚟形容一樣嘢嘅表現；口頭少講 (wanting; lackluster; bad; not often in speech)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢間公司近期嘅業績好不濟。
examples.jyutping: ni1 gaan1 gung1 si1 gan6 kei4 ge3 jip6 zik1 hou2 bat1 zai3.
examples.translation: This company's performance has been quite poor recently.

senses.definition: #八卦 嘅小妹妹（量詞：個） (a nosy girl; a gossip)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你個八妹吖！人仔細細成日想知大人拍拖啲嘢。
examples.jyutping: nei5 go3 baat3 mui1 aa1! jan4 zai2 sai3 sai3 seng4 jat6 soeng2 zi1 daai6 jan4 paak3 to1 di1 je5.
examples.translation: What a nosy girl! You're so young and always eager to know about adults' dating lives.

senses.definition: 操作車輛行得快啲，通常指將#油門 踩深啲 (to accelerate (a vehicle), usually by pushing the pedal)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 上斜時畀啲油先放手掣。
examples.translation: Push harder on the accelerator when starting uphill.

senses.definition: 形容一啲女人有樣有身材，但冇智慧 (an attractive but unintelligent woman, a "bimbo")
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢靚係靚呀，但連影印都唔識，正一波大冇腦。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 leng3 hai6 leng3 aa3, daan6 lin4 jing2 jan3 dou1 m4 sik1, zing3 jat1 bo1 daai6 mou5 nou5.
examples.translation: She's beautiful but clueless; she doesn't even know how to make a photocopy of a document.

senses.definition: 陀衰家，形容人做咗啲嘢敗壞家聲或者散盡家財 (to disgrace the family by bringing dishonor, or by bankrupting the family fortune)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 衰仔，學人吸毒，你真係敗家！
examples.translation: Bad son, how dare you take drugs! You bring shame to the whole family!

senses.definition: 亂使錢 (to spend money (or valuable resources) wastefully)

examples.text: 你咁敗家㗎，啲咁貴嘅衫着一次就送俾人。
examples.translation: You are so wasteful to give such pricey clothes away after wearing them just once!

senses.definition: 作者喺文章入面嘅自稱 (how an author or writer addresses himself in an article)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 筆者認為，該數據唔能夠證明兩者間嘅因果關係，只能夠説明數字彼此有比例上嘅關聯。
examples.jyutping: bat1 ze2 jing6 wai4, goi1 sou3 geoi3 m4 nang4 gau3 zing3 ming4 loeng5 ze2 gaan1 ge3 jan1 gwo2 gwaan1 hai6, zi2 nang4 gau3 syut3 ming4 sou3 zi6 bei2 ci2 jau5 bei2 lai6 soeng6 ge3 gwaan1 lyun4.
examples.translation: In my opinion, the data does not establish a causal relationship between the two variables but reveals a proportional connection.

senses.definition: #開片 之前打爆個玻璃樽，等自己有支鋭器傷人 (to break a bottle in readiness for a fight; literally: to explode a bottle)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 大力用玻璃樽打人哋個頭，大力到連個玻璃樽都整爆 (to break a bottle over someone's head)

examples.text: 「25歲仔蒲夜場俾人爆樽」
examples.jyutping: jaa6 ng5 seoi3 zai2 pou4 je6 coeng4 bei2 jan4 baau3 zeon1
examples.translation: A 25-year-old man was attacked with a bottle at a nightclub.

senses.definition: 挨住（一啲嘢） (to lean against)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你冇腰骨㗎？成日憑住道門企。
examples.jyutping: nei5 mou5 jiu1 gwat1 gaa4 seng4 jat6 bang6 zyu6 dou6 mun4 kei5
examples.translation: Can't you stand up straight? Why do you always lean against the door?

senses.definition: 喺旁面陪同 (to accompany)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 兩位朋友一直傍住佢行。
examples.jyutping: loeng5 wai2 pang4 jau5 jat1 zik6 bong6 zyu6 keoi5 haang4.
examples.translation: Two of his friends are walking with him.

senses.definition: 從旁照顧 (to look after)

examples.text: 唔係佢阿媽傍住，有鬼今日啊？
examples.jyutping: m4 hai6 keoi5 aa3 maa1 bong6 zyu6, jau5 gwai2 gam1 jat6 aa3?
examples.translation: He would not succeed without his mum's help.

senses.definition: 喺旁邊留神注意 (to look out for somebody)

examples.text: 女明星湊女出街，成村人傍住。
examples.translation: An actress went out for a walk with a team of people for safety.

senses.definition: 噴出煙或霧 (to emit smoke or steam)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: #火牛 飆煙，快啲熄機！
examples.jyutping: fo2 ngau4 biu1 jin1, faai3 di1 sik1 gei1!
examples.translation: The power supply is smoking! Shut down your computer immediately!

senses.definition: 大件事；好大鑊；好嚴重 (awful; terrible; serious)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢件事俾佢知道就不得了喇。
examples.jyutping: nei1 gin6 si6 bei2 keoi5 zi1 dou3 zau6 bat1 dak1 liu5 laa3.
examples.translation: It would be disastrous if he found out.

senses.definition: 角色扮演去誤導其他人；著戲服、化妝去整蠱人 (to play a role to deceive somebody; to wear a costume or make up to trick someone. Literally: to masquerade as a ghost and as a horse)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 呢個騙徒成日扮鬼扮馬去呃人，早兩日先至扮便依警察呃咗個阿婆錢。
examples.translation: This conman often disguises himself to cheat people, like when he pretended to be a plainclothes police officer and cheated an old lady of her money two days ago.

senses.definition: 一定唔可以無，必須要有 (indispensable; a must)
senses.label: 形容詞

senses.definition: 補番好穿窿嘅衫。 (to patch up a shirt or a upper wear.)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 脆弱嘅心靈 (a fragile heart; literally: a heart made of glass)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你唔好咁講嘢啦，你會傷到佢個玻璃心㗎。
examples.jyutping: nei5 m4 hou2 gam2 gong2 je5 laa1, nei5 wui5 soeng1 dou2 keoi5 go3 bo1 lei1 sam1 gaa3.
examples.translation: Don't say that; you might hurt her easily-offended feelings.

senses.definition: 「#辦公」嘅諧音，諷刺冗員響辦公室枱頭對住電腦好專注咁扮做嘢，實際就上網玩樂打發時間 ("office mock": joke homophone of "office work" in Cantonese, means someone pretend to work in office, mostly in front of the computer and pretend to be concentrated and focused, but actually is playing game or rendering on internet.)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 咪扮忙啦，你返到公司咪又係成日響度扮工。
examples.jyutping: mai5 baan6 mong4 laa1, nei5 faan1 dou3 gung1 si1 mai6 jau6 hai6 seng4 jat6 hoeng2 dou6 baan6 gung1.
examples.translation: Don't pretend to be busy; I know you spend most of your time at the office pretending to work.

senses.definition: 同周圍顏色唔同嘅一點（量詞：粒） (speck; speckle; spot)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 雀斑
examples.jyutping: zoek3 baan1
examples.translation: freckle

senses.definition: #石斑 魚，泛指鱸形目鮨科石斑魚亞科裏的各屬魚類，身體肥厚，口部大。（量詞：條） (garoupa; grouper; typically having a stout body and a large mouth.)

examples.text: 清蒸游水斑
examples.jyutping: cing1 zing1 jau4 seoi2 baan1
examples.translation: steamed fresh garoupa

senses.definition: 歇後語，形容唔知點埋手。補鑊時師傅要用蘸咗灰料嘅布團，即係「枳」嚟頂住，令補鑊嘅鐵粒平滑咁填塞落去要補嘅窿。冇咗枳，就冇辦法補鑊。 (A sandwich pun.  It means "no way to solve".)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 補鑊唔見枳，認真狼狽！
examples.jyutping: bou2 wok6 m4 gin3 zat1, jing2 zan1 long4 bui3!
examples.translation: I can't find a solution! I'm in trouble!

examples.text: 呢個明星去雞竇俾人見到，登咗上八卦週刊。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 ming4 sing1 heoi3 gai1 dau3 bei2 jan4 gin3 dou2, dang1 zo2 soeng5 baat3 gwaa3 zau1 hon2.

examples.text: 請問#貴 公司咩嘢寶號呢？
examples.translation: May I know the name of your company?

senses.definition: 引申指對方所屬黑社會團體嘅暗語 (the triad society you belong to)

examples.text: o靚仔，乜野寶號呀？/貴寶號呀？
examples.translation: [ChatGPT]Hey handsome, what's your name? / What's your number?

senses.definition: 眼睛向上反後旁人見到你眼睛嘅部位。通常以「俾人白眼」用，表示俾人睇唔起。 (the part people see when you roll your eyes; usually used in the passive expression 俾人白眼; being treated with scorn or disdain)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我著得咁寒酸，如果參加宴會實會俾人白眼！
examples.jyutping: ngo5 zoek3 dak1 gam3 hon4 syun1, jyu4 gwo2 caam1 gaa1 jin3 wui6 sat6 wui5 bei2 jan4 baak6 ngaan5!
examples.translation: My clothes look very shabby; people will surely give me disdainful looks if I attend the party like this.

phonetic.original: bei2 go3 tin1 nei5 zou6 daam2
jyutping: bei2 go3 tin1 nei5 zou6 daam2

senses.definition: 即使你有天大嘅膽；意指即使你幾大膽都好，喺某情況下都係唔會敢做某樣嘢；意思同「#畀個冬瓜你做膽」、「#畀個沙煲你做膽」相同 (claiming somebody would never dare to do something no matter how daring he or she is; literally: even given the sky as your guts)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 畀個天你做膽，你都唔敢喺差館偷嘢啦。
examples.jyutping: bei2 go3 tin1 nei5 zou6 daam2, nei5 dou1 m4 gam2 hai2 caai1 gun2 tau1 je5 laa1.

bei go tin nei zou daam

senses.definition: 英制嘅重量單位；二點二磅就等於一公斤；喺香港，一磅又等於十二#両 (pound; pound-mass, note: stone is not used in Hong Kong)

examples.text: 個BB重八磅。
examples.jyutping: go3 bi4 bi1 cung5 baat3 bong6.
examples.translation: The baby weighs eight pounds.

senses.definition: 英制嘅壓力單位，一磅大約等於6895帕 (psi, pound per square inch)

examples.text: 打三十五磅呔氣
examples.jyutping: daa2 saam1 sap6 ng5 bong6 taai1 hei3
examples.translation: to add tyre pressure to 35 psi

senses.definition: 即係比喻；用一啲相同性質嘅野去做例子，去解釋一啲抽象或者難明嘅概念。 (metaphor or simile)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 打個比方：太陽就好似隻橙咁，又圓又多窿。
examples.jyutping: daa2 go3 bei2 fong1, taai3 joeng4 zau6 hou2 ci5 zek3 caang2 gam2, jau6 jyun4 jau6 do1 lung1.
examples.translation: Let me make a simile: the sun like an orange; it is round and full of holes.

senses.definition: 認為某樣嘢唔值得理，有輕視嘅意思。 (to disdain; to despise; to regard something as worthless to care about)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 女神對你不屑一顧，恐怕你連 #觀音兵 都做唔成。
examples.translation: Your crush has ghosted you so badly that I'm afraid you even cannot become a "gun jam bing".

senses.definition: #普通話 嘅官話諧音；略帶貶義 (near homophone for "普通話" (Putonghua), i.e. Mandarin, the standard language of China; used for comedic effect or to convey a (self)mocking tone; literally: to boil winter melon)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 除非你去廣東或者廣西南寧嗰頭啫，上大陸好難唔講煲冬瓜㗎噃。
examples.jyutping: ceoi4 fei1 nei5 heoi3 gwong2 dung1 waak6 ze2 gwong2 sai1 naam4 ning4 go2 tau4 ze1, soeng5 daai6 luk6 hou2 naan4 m4 gong2 bou1 dung1 gwaa1 gaa3 bo3.
examples.translation: Unless you go to Guangdung or Nanning in Guangxi, it's hard not to speak in Putonghua when you visit mainland China.

senses.definition: 一種名貴食用#螺（同#魚 冇關），個殼橢圓形，特點係殼上面有一排窿，用嚟呼吸、排泄、生殖（量詞：隻） (abalone)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 形容女人平胸，冇胸（因為#胸 喺粵語又叫#波），帶貶義 (used to describe a woman with small breasts (since the word #波 bo1 is euphemism for #胸 hung1 "breast" in Cantonese))
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 當紅時代嘅松田聖子曾經波平如鏡，目前上圍似乎較有睇頭。
examples.translation: Japanese star Seiko Matsuda had small boobs when she was young but now she seems a bit busty.

senses.definition: 個海冇風冇浪，水面好似塊鏡一樣 ((of the sea) calm like a mirror)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 中綱湖湖面波平如鏡，水面上完完整整咁反射出櫻花嘅倒影。
examples.translation: The Nakatsuna Lake in Japan was calm like a mirror; therefore, the sakura nearby is always clearly reflected.

senses.definition: 一定要有 (necessary to have)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢支藥油係旅行必備嘅。
examples.jyutping: ni1 zi1 joek6 jau4 hai6 leoi5 hang4 bit1 bei6 ge3.
examples.translation: This bottle of medicinal oil is a must when you travel.

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
冇#陰毛 嘅成年女性 (woman with no pubic hair; literally: white tiger)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 手掌（量詞： #巴 ／個） (palm)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢塊面同巴掌一樣咁細。
examples.translation: Her face is as small as the palm of my hand.

senses.definition: 喺拍賣會、拍賣網站上面#出價 或者買嘢 (to bid, or to buy on auction sites)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 部電話我上網 bid 返嚟嘅。
examples.jyutping: bou6 din6 waa2 ngo5 soeng5 mong5 bit1 faan1 lai4 ge3.
examples.translation: I won this phone in an online auction.

senses.definition: 好容易肚屙；腸易激 (expression of irritable bowel syndrome; literally: glass tummy)

senses.definition: 用嚟釀#啤酒 嘅一啲大麻科草本植物嘅#果實 統稱，多數指蛇麻，有抗菌、防止變酸、加強苦味、除去雜質等作用 (some fruits of the hemp family, mostly refering to hops, used in the brewing process of beer, providing extra bitterness and aroma)

Country/Region names are often added in front of the word, to specify where the currency is used and accepted. The material of the currency could also be specified if added in front of the word.)

examples.text: 呢頭近街市，又多舖頭，想買乜都有，不假外求。

senses.definition: #高筒鞋，高到包得住腳眼嘅鞋 (boot)

examples.translation: The computer won't boot up.

senses.definition: 階梯詩，由字數長短不等嘅詩句組成，一邊尖一邊闊；可以係單塔詩或者雙塔詩；向下由短至闊，叫做順塔詩，掉轉就叫倒塔詩，另外有一種，由少漸多再由多漸少，叫做塔影倒映詩（量詞：首） (tower-like calligram; stairs-like calligram)

examples.jyutping: geoi3 man4 wu4 sik1 jung6 jing1 man2 se2 gwo3 bou2 taap3 si1.
examples.translation: It is heard that Hu Shi wrote a tower-like calligram in English before.

senses.definition: 俾鬼迷惑，形容精神狀態反常 (an expression used to describe someone who has an abnormal mental status; literally "to be bewitched by a ghost")
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 你居然畀咗五嚿水買橙，係咪俾鬼迷啊？
examples.jyutping: nei5 geoi1 jin4 bei2 zo2 ng5 gau6 seoi2 mai5 caang2, hai6 mai6 bei2 gwai2 mai4 aa3?
examples.translation: You paid five hundred dollars for oranges? Were you bewitched by a ghost?

senses.definition: 將一件事歸咎於某個人 (to lure someone into a trap; to make someone a scapegoat; to "set someone up"; literally: to put onto the table)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢邊有畀人擺上枱啊？係佢掉返轉頭擺我上枱啊。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 bin1 jau5 bei2 jan4 baai2 soeng5 toi2 aa3? hai6 keoi5 diu6 faan1 zyun3 tau4 baai2 ngo5 soeng5 toi2 aa3.
examples.translation: It's not him who was set up. He set me up instead.

senses.definition: 改變#聲調；喺好多語言包括粵語都好常見，都叫連續變調 (tone sandhi)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 油麻地個地字變咗調，所以聽落同地下個地字唔同。
examples.jyutping: jau4 maa4 dei2 go3 dei6 zi6 bin3 zo2 diu6, so2 ji5 teng1 lok6 tung4 dei6 haa2 go3 dei6 zi6 m4 tung4.
examples.translation: The tone of #地 in #油麻地(Yau Ma Tei) has changed, so it sounds different from 地 in #地下(ground floor).

senses.definition: 指佈置場地，將大量人與物按既定時間或設計擺放到指定位置 (to set up a place for an event or show; literally: to form ranks like well-trained soliders)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 今日學校有話劇表演，我要幫手去禮堂擺陣。
examples.jyutping: gam1 jat6 hok6 haau6 jau5 waa6 kek6 biu2 jin5, ngo5 jiu3 bong1 sau2 heoi3 lai5 tong4 baai2 zan6.
examples.translation: Our school has a drama show today. I need to go help set things up in the hall.

senses.definition: 部署對策或展示姿態 (to devise a countermeasure; to form a strategy to counteract something; to arrange something as a show of oppostion)

examples.text: 中國政府要擺陣對付美國嘅新關税政策。
examples.jyutping: zung1 gwok3 zing3 fu2 jiu3 baai2 zan6 deoi3 fu6 mei5 gwok3 ge3 san1 gwaan1 seoi3 zing3 caak3.

senses.definition: 以不正當手段獲得嘅錢財（量詞：筆） (ill-gotten wealth)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你收咗呢筆不義之財，你嘅良心就會畀罪惡感玷污㗎喇。

senses.definition: 孭喺#背脊 嘅袋，有兩條帶，通常外出會用，可以用嚟放好多或者好重嘅嘢（量詞：個） (backpack)

examples.text: 地鐵出咗段片鬧啲孭背囊嘅人。
examples.jyutping: dei6 tit3 ceot1 zo2 dyun6 pin2 naau6 di1 me1 bui3 nong4 ge3 jan4.
examples.translation: The MTR released a video clip that criticises people who carry backpacks.

examples.jyutping: bat1 leon6 nei5 hai6 co1 hok6 ze2 ding6 hai6 jau4 wing6 hou2 sau2, lok6 seoi2 zi1 cin4 jat1 ding6 jiu3 zou6 jit6 san1 wan6 dung6.

examples.translation: I graduated from the University of Hong Kong in 1997.

senses.definition: 脱離一個階段；唔再做某事或從事於某地方 (to have surpassed that level; no longer to do something or work at some place)

senses.definition: 畫喺牆上面嘅畫（量詞：幅） (fresco; mural; literally "wall painting")

examples.translation: The murals on the exterior of this primary school differ year by year.

senses.definition: 形容一樣嘢裏面有啲咩成分 (to include; to contain)

examples.jyutping: ni1 gaan1 zung1 sam1 tai4 gung1 ge3 cit3 si1 baau1 kut3 mong5 kau4, gou1 ji5 fu1 kau4 tung4 maai4 bou2 ling4 kau4 dang2 dang2.
examples.translation: Facilities provided by this centre include tennis, golf, bowling, etc.

senses.definition: 用嚟做#筆記 嘅#簿（量詞：本） (notebook; notepad; a book for writing notes in)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 有本筆記簿用嚟上堂畫畫好緊要㗎。
examples.jyutping: jau5 bun2 bat1 gei3 bou2 jung6 lai4 soeng5 tong4 waak6 waa2 hou2 gan2 jiu3 gaa3.
examples.translation: This is important to have a notebook for drawing during the lesson.

senses.definition: 一直堅持，唔會因為壓力或者困難而放棄 (indomitable)

examples.text: 佢憑住不屈不撓嘅精神繼續比賽，最後反敗為勝。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 pang4 zyu6 bat1 wat1 bat1 naau5 ge3 zing1 san4 gai3 zuk6 bei2 coi3, zeoi3 hau6 faan2 baai6 wai4 sing3.

senses.definition: #八卦，收風，四圍打聽 (to sniff around, to gossip, to pry into something)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢哋分手咁突然，等我八下發生咗咩事先。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 fan1 sau2 gam3 dat6 jin4, dang2 ngo5 baat3 haa5 faat3 sang1 zo2 me1 si6 sin1.
examples.translation: Their breakup was out of the blue, let me pry into that and find out what happened.

senses.definition: 無視某人意願，強行要佢做某事 (to force; to compel; make someone do something regardless of their will)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: m4 hou2 bik1 zi6 gei2 zou6 di1 m4 zung1 ji3 zou6 ge3 je5.
examples.translation: Don't force yourself to do something you don't like.

senses.definition: 被擠滿人，一個相對細嘅空間，容納咗好多人，導致人嘅四周得好少位可以自由移動 (to be crowded with people; to contain many people in a relatively small space, that there are only little space around one to move about.)

examples.text: 呢個沙灘逢週末都逼滿晒人。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 saa1 taan1 fung4 zau1 mut6 dou1 bik1 mun5 saai3 jan4.
examples.translation: This beach is completely crowded with people every weekend.

senses.definition: 喺人多又唔夠空間嘅情況下夾硬用力推啲人，減少其他人嘅空間，從而令到自己可以多啲空間 (to push sby's way through a crowd; to squeeze; to push the others when there are many people and not enough space, so as to reduce the space the others occupied and make more space for oneself.)

examples.text: 今朝架火車好多人，我唯有夾硬逼入去。
examples.jyutping: gam1 ziu1 gaa3 fo2 ce1 hou2 do1 jan4, ngo5 wai4 jau5 gaap3 ngaang2 bik1 jap6 heoi3.
examples.translation: The train was very full this morning and I had to force my way into it.

senses.definition: 搭一啲好多人、好擠迫嘅公共交通工具 (to take public transportation during peak hours when the compartment is crowded with people)

examples.text: 逼巴士
examples.jyutping: bik1 baa1 si2

senses.definition: 原本指一啲得好少中醫知道嘅#藥方；而家延伸指一啲好少人知道或者自創嘅方法（量詞：條／個） (secret recipe; secret formula; originally referred to secret prescription / formula in Chinese medicine)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你唔用阿媽發明嘅秘方，又點會整到好食嘅豉油雞翼呢？
examples.jyutping: nei5 m4 jung6 aa3 maa1 faat3 ming4 ge3 bei3 fong1, jau6 dim2 wui5 zing2 dou2 hou2 sik6 ge3 si6 jau4 gai1 jik6 ne1?
examples.translation: Without mom's secret recipe, how could you make delicious soy sauce chicken wings?

senses.definition: #備份 電子檔案 (to backup (electronic files))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 死喇！我唔記得backup啲相，而家冇晒喇！
examples.jyutping: sei2 laa3! ngo5 m4 gei3 dak1 bek1 ap1 di1 soeng2, ji4 gaa1 mou5 saai3 laa3!
examples.translation: Oh no! I have forgotten to back up my photos. They are all gone now.

senses.definition: 衡量某一部份喺整體裏面佔咗幾多嘅一個值；#比重 (proportion; ratio)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 個班嘅男女比例係二比五。
examples.jyutping: go3 baan1 ge3 naam4 neoi5 bei2 lai6 hai6 ji6 bei2 ng5.
examples.translation: The ratio of boys to girls is 2:5 in this class.

senses.definition: 將一樣嘢放大或縮細之後，同原本物體嘅大細嘅比值 (scale)

examples.text: 個高達模型嘅比例係一比一百四十四。
examples.jyutping: go3 gou1 daat6 mou4 jing4 ge3 bei2 lai6 hai6 jat1 bei2 jat1 baak3 sei3 sap6 sei3.
examples.translation: The scale of the Gunpla is 1:144.

senses.definition: 會做成#爆炸 嘅嘢，通常入面有#火藥 (explosives; explosive material)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 使用爆炸品作爆破用途，係要經過授權嘅。
examples.jyutping: si2 jung6 baau3 zaa3 ban2 zok3 baau3 po3 jung6 tou4, hai6 jiu3 ging1 gwo3 sau6 kyun4 ge3.
examples.translation: Persons should be authorized to use explosives for blasting work.

senses.definition: 類似#rap，句逗整齊、有節奏、#押韻 嘅唸白；説唱嘅時候，通常會用#卜魚 嚟打拍子；以三字句、五字句、七字句為主，最少兩句，冇限句數，雙數句同最後一句要押韻（量詞：段） (baak-laam, a form of vocal performance that involves speech-like delivery of rhythmic and rhyming verses of regular length, usually accompanied by 卜魚 buk1 jyu4 (a wooden percussion instrument); verses are usually in three, five or seven words, with a minimum of two verses and no upper limit; even-numbered verses and the final verse must rhyme)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: #數白欖

examples.text: 佢講咗啲嘢之後全場爆笑，佢自己都唔知發生咩事。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 gong2 zo2 di1 je5 zi1 hau6 cyun4 coeng4 baau3 siu3, keoi5 zi6 gei2 dou1 m4 zi1 faat3 sang1 me1 si6.
examples.translation: He said something and then the audience burst into laughter, he himself didn't even know what's happening.

senses.definition: 控制、抑制唔住自己嘅動作或者情感，或者抵抗唔住衝動、壓迫去做某樣嘢 (to be unable to control or restrain oneself; to feel an irresistible urge to do something)

examples.translation: He couldn't help shivering when he heard the news.

senses.definition: 一種頭部扁平寬闊嘅#斧頭（量詞：把） (broad axe)

senses.definition: 本事；技巧；招數；辦法（量詞：道） (ability, skill, trick or solution)

examples.text: 我出盡板斧先搞掂單嘢。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 ceot1 zeon6 baan2 fu2 sin1 gaau2 dim6 daan1 je5.
examples.translation: I served all my tricks and methods to get it sorted.

senses.definition: (貶義)太薄；厚度唔夠 ((negative)too thin)

examples.translation: Your jacket is so thin and it looks like it's about to wear out.

examples.jyutping: faat3 ji1 gun1 jing6 wai4 sei2 ze2 hai6 bei6 saat3 ge3, m4 hai6 zi6 saat3.
examples.translation: The forensic pathologist thinks that the victim was killed and did not commit suicide.

senses.definition: 運用器械開啓聲音、動畫或者影片檔案，令到有聲音或者畫面出現 (to play an audio, animation or video; to broadcast)

examples.jyutping: bo3 fong3 tau4 jing2 pin2
examples.translation: to show the slides

senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: Why are you staring at me like that? I didn't break the vase.

examples.translation: You should see the doctor early once you get ill. Don't miss the best timing for treatment.

examples.jyutping: jau5 zo2 ni1 bun2 bei3 kap1 zau6 lin6 dou2 jyu4 loi4 san4 zoeng2 gaa3 laa3!
examples.translation: With this secret manual, you will master the Buddha's palm!

senses.definition: 急升；短時間內取得好大升幅 (to skyrocket; to rise sharply)

examples.translation: Property prices skyrocket by 30% this year.

senses.label: 名詞

examples.translation: Stunning robbers are active these days. Be careful when walking at night!

senses.definition: 悲慘；傷感 (miserable; pathetic)

examples.jyutping: nei1 go3 gu3 si6 zan1 hai6 bei1 cing4.
examples.translation: This is a tragic story.

senses.definition: 冇完整同埋忠實咁反映 (incomplete and unfaithful)

examples.text: 呢份報告不盡不實，係咪有心隱瞞事實製造假象？

examples.translation: This report is neither thorough nor truthful. Does it intend to conceal the facts and put us off the scent?

senses.definition: 背叛，叛變 (to turn traitor)

examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 ging2 caat3 ji5 ging1 bin3 zit3, m4 zoi3 seon3 dak1 gwo3.

senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 喺球場入面我哋為各自嘅球會搏殺，但係喺球場以外我哋係好朋友。
examples.jyutping: hai2 kau4 coeng4 jap6 min6 ngo5 dei6 wai6 gok3 zi6 ge3 kau4 wui2 bok3 saat3, daan6 hai6 hai2 kau4 coeng4 ji5 ngoi6 ngo5 dei6 hai6 hou2 pang4 jau5.
examples.translation: On the field we play hard for our own clubs, but off the field we stay good friends.

senses.definition: 做嘢嘅程序，係組成一件完整嘅事嘅好多個部份（量詞：個） (step; procedure)

examples.jyutping: gan1 zyu6 syu1 soeng5 min6 ge3 bou6 zaau6 zou6 zau6 dak1 laa3.

senses.definition: 有一半係空嘅 (half empty)

senses.definition: 生活喺水度嘅軟體動物嘅硬殼，一般指沙灘揾到嘅，畀人拎嚟玩或者加工做裝飾（量詞：個／隻） (seashell)

senses.definition: 潮流用語，恥笑對方填嘅詞完全唔啱音。較早期華人#教會 嘅#聖詩，着重翻譯原文嘅準確度同教義多過音樂性，尤其是用廣東話唱出嚟會唔啱音，冇辦法聽得出原本嘅歌詞，呢個印象就被人當做#填詞 唔啱音嘅代表；雖然新一代嘅基督教音樂已經大有改善，但係呢個講法仍然流行。 (Literally translating to 'which church do you go to', this expression is used to ridicule 'wrong-sounding' Cantonese lyrics, i.e. lyrics that pay no regard to the tones of the Cantonese language, a linguistic phenomenon which in normal cases necessitate careful matching of words to the rising and falling of the corresponding notes. Lyricists of early Chinese hymns were generally more concerned with the meaning and translation accuracy of their lyrics than the musicality of their pieces, giving rise to lyrics which, when sung aloud in Cantonese, may 'sound wrong' or even be distorted beyond recognition. These hymns gradually became the classic example of 'wrong-sounding' Cantonese lyrics. Although the lyrics of modern Christian hymns have improved significantly in terms of musicality, the expression remains in popular use to this day.)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 你邊間教會㗎？成句冇一個字啱音嘅？

examples.translation: (commenting on a lyricist's work) So, which church do you go to? The whole sentence sounds completely off!
