senses.definition: 一種#透明、唔透氣、易#碎，又具一定硬度嘅物料，主要成份係二氧化矽（量詞：塊） ((material) glass)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 玻璃窗
examples.jyutping: bo1 lei1 coeng1
examples.translation: glass window

senses.definition: 用#電話 聯絡其他人 (to call someone on the phone)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 返到屋企俾電話我啊。
examples.jyutping: faan1 dou3 uk1 kei2 bei2 din6 waa2 ngo5 aa3.
examples.translation: Remember to call me when you are back at home.

senses.definition: 去讚賞同埋長被讚者做過嘅好事講出去俾其他人聽 (to commend; to praise)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢個警察嘅英勇行為值得表揚。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 ging2 caat3 ge3 jing1 jung5 hang4 wai4 zik6 dak1 biu2 joeng4.
examples.translation: The heroic acts of this police officer is praiseworthy.

senses.definition: 兩個習武之人公平咁對打，用意係睇下邊個武術比較高明 (to duel (in martial arts); to fight)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 擂台比武
examples.jyutping: leoi4 toi4 bei2 mou5
examples.translation: to fight on stage

senses.definition: 守好防線，防止敵人越過進入自己一方嘅領域 (to defend the border, prevent the enemies from getting into one's own realm)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢哋喺邊境把關，防止黑幫進行走私活動。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 hai2 bin1 ging2 baa2 gwaan1, fong4 zi2 hak1 bong1 zeon3 hang4 zau2 si1 wut6 dung6.
examples.translation: They defend our borders to prevent smuggling carried out by triad societies.

senses.definition: （足球）守龍門 ((football) to keep the goal)
引申指嚴格按照標準檢查 (to secure; to check on)

examples.text: 為品質把關
examples.jyutping: wai6 ban2 zat1 baa2 gwaan1
examples.translation: to check on the quality

senses.definition: （學校）#班、#級。班係指喺同一個教室學習嘅一群學生，而級就解學習同一程度知識嘅同學，入面再分班。（量詞：個） ((of schools) classes and grades)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 國際學校嘅班級編排同傳統學校唔同，佢哋會早一年入學。
examples.jyutping: gwok3 zai3 hok6 haau6 ge3 baan1 kap1 pin1 paai4 tung4 cyun4 tung2 hok6 haau6 m4 tung4, keoi5 dei6 wui5 zou2 jat1 nin4 jap6 hok6.
examples.translation: International schools have different class arrangements from traditional schools: they start a year earlier.

senses.definition: 將啲頭髮分成一條條，跟住將佢哋翹埋一齊 (to braid someone's hair)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢擯咗條辮幾靚呀！
examples.jyutping: keoi5 ban3 zo2 tiu4 bin1 gei2 leng3 aa3!
examples.translation: The braid she made is quite pretty!

senses.definition: 形容客人嚟到有好似返咗屋企嘅感覺 (home away from home, usually used in the promotion of hotels and restaurants)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 我哋呢間酒店會令你有賓至如歸嘅感覺。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 ni1 gaan1 zau2 dim3 wui5 ling6 nei5 jau5 ban1 zi3 jyu4 gwai1 ge3 gam2 gok3.
examples.translation: Our hotel will make you feel at home.

senses.definition: 賓客同主人，或者僱主同僱員 (guest and host; employer and employee)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我哋係賓主嘅關係，行為檢點啲好。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 hai6 ban1 zyu2 ge3 gwaan1 hai6, hang4 wai4 gim2 dim2 di1 hou2.
examples.translation: We are but employer and employee; we should behave appropriately.

senses.definition: 覺得人哋唔會發現而攞人哋着數 (to try to take advantage of someone out of somebody's inattention or ignorance)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我冇邀請咭㗎，我搏懵行入去㗎咋。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 mou5 jiu1 cing2 kaat1 gaa3, ngo5 bok3 mung2 haang4 jap6 heoi3 gaa3 zaa3.
examples.translation: I didn't have an invitation card, I just tried to sneak in.

senses.definition: 搏人唔講出嚟而非禮佢哋 (to grope; to touch somebody up)

examples.text: 你企咁埋做咩啊，想搏懵呀？
examples.jyutping: nei5 kei5 gam3 maai4 zou6 me1 aa3, soeng2 bok3 mung2 aa4?
examples.translation: Why are you standing so close to me? Are you trying to grope me?

senses.definition: 為咗慶祝某件事（例如#結婚）舉辦#宴會 (to hold a feast or banquet in celebration of something, e.g. a wedding banquet)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你結婚嗰陣喺邊度擺酒㗎？
examples.jyutping: nei5 git3 fan1 go2 zan6 hai2 bin1 dou6 baai2 zau2 gaa3?
examples.translation: Where was your wedding reception held?

senses.definition: 放置，放低一樣嘢喺另一個地方；有時會改變佢嘅位置 (to put; to place)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢將啲錢擺咗喺枱面。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 zoeng1 di1 cin2 baai2 zo2 hai2 toi2 min2.
examples.translation: She placed the money on the table.

senses.definition: 作……狀，展露 (to display; to show)

examples.text: #擺款
examples.jyutping: baai2 fun2
examples.translation: to put on airs and graces; to give oneself airs and graces; to be arrogant

senses.definition: 維持一點固定嘅同時，另一邊左右郁動 (to sway; to wave; to wag)

examples.text: 隻狗見到我哋嗰陣，好開心噉喺度擺尾。
examples.jyutping: zek3 gau2 gin3 dou2 ngo5 dei6 go2 zan6, hou2 hoi1 sam1 gam2 hai2 dou6 baai2 mei5.
examples.translation: When the dog saw us, it wagged its tail very happily.

senses.definition: 令一啲狀況持續或者令自己可以繼續擁有一啲野 (to keep; to maintain status quo; to preserve; to protect)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你再唔勤力啲做嘢，小心保唔住份工啊。
examples.jyutping: nei5 zoi3 m4 kan4 lik6 di1 zou6 je5, siu2 sam1 bou2 m4 zyu6 fan6 gung1 aa3.
examples.translation: If you still don't work hard enough, beware that you cannot keep your job.

senses.definition: 俾錢等一個俾警察拘捕咗嘅人可以暫時有返自由；見 #保釋 (to bail out; to be released on bail)

examples.text: 個仔而家喺警局，你快啲保佢出嚟喇！
examples.jyutping: go3 zai2 ji4 gaa1 hai2 ging2 guk2, nei5 faai3 di1 bou2 keoi5 ceot1 lei4 laa3!
examples.translation: Our son is in the police station now, please bail him out as soon as possible.

senses.definition: 受保；保險公司肯為接受一個人嘅保險並且理賠 (insurance company to cover a risk)

examples.text: 呢樣保險公司唔保㗎喎。
examples.jyutping: nei1 joeng6 bou2 him2 gung1 si1 m4 bou2 gaa3 wo3.
examples.translation: This is not covered by the insurance company.

senses.definition: 防止一啲野受傷害 (to protect; to guard)
senses.label: 語素

examples.text: 保護
examples.jyutping: bou2 wu6
examples.translation: to protect; to guard

senses.definition: 令一個情況可以持續 (to maintain; to keep status quo)

examples.text: 保持
examples.jyutping: bou2 ci4
examples.translation: to maintain

senses.definition: 去令一啲野一定會發生，或確認唔會發生 (to guarantee)

examples.text: 保證
examples.jyutping: bou2 zing3
examples.translation: to guarantee

senses.definition: 唔同立場嘅人就一件事嘅是非對錯所做嘅討論（量詞：場／次） (debate)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: #辯論員
examples.jyutping: bin6 leon6 jyun4
examples.translation: debater

senses.definition: 表面或者周圍結晒冰；俾冰覆蓋住 (to freeze over; to ice up; to be covered in ice)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 冰封三尺，非一日之寒
examples.jyutping: bing1 fung1 saam1 cek3, fei1 jat1 jat6 zi1 hon4
examples.translation: The outcome is the result of a series of events over a long period of time, rather than a single event. (Literal meaning: A three-foot-thick slab of ice is not the result of the coldness in a single day.)

senses.definition: 同一樣嘢嘅唔同樣式，可能係推出時間、內容、出版方等等嘅差異（量詞：個） (version; edition)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢首歌有兩個版本。
examples.jyutping: ni1 sau2 go1 jau5 loeng5 go3 baan2 bun2.
examples.translation: This song has two versions.

senses.definition: 半#斤 同八#兩 相等，比喻彼此分量或程度不相上下 (nothing to choose between the two; six of one, half of a dozen of the other; literally: half catty and eight taels)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 你哋兩個，一個衝紅燈，一個超速，咪又係半斤八兩！
examples.jyutping: nei5 dei6 loeng5 go3, jat1 go3 cung1 hung4 dang1, jat1 go3 ciu1 cuk1, mai6 jau6 hai6 bun3 gan1 baat3 loeng2!
examples.translation: You two! One of you has jumped a red light and the other one has overspeeded. You two are the same!

senses.definition: 報告開支使費，報請有關部門、單位核可後#銷帳，以拎返預支咗嘅錢。 (to apply for reimbursement)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你買書嘅時候記住攞番張單，如果唔係佢哋唔幫你報銷㗎。
examples.jyutping: nei5 maai5 syu1 ge3 si4 hau6 gei3 zyu6 lo2 faan1 zoeng1 daan1, jyu4 gwo2 m4 hai6 keoi5 dei6 m4 bong1 nei5 bou3 siu1 gaa3.
examples.translation: Remember to get a receipt when you buy the books, or else they will not reimburse you for your expenses.

senses.definition: #報廢 銷帳。壞咗、用唔到。 (to hand in a list of expended articles; to write off; to become useless)

examples.text: 佢架車喺意外之後報銷咗。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 gaa3 ce1 hai2 ji3 ngoi6 zi1 hau6 bou3 siu1 zo2.
examples.translation: His car was completely written off after the accident.

senses.definition: 一#班 人 (group of people)
senses.label: 量詞

examples.text: 尋晚有兩幫人喺酒吧打交。
examples.jyutping: cam4 maan5 jau5 loeng5 bong1 jan4 hai2 zau2 baa1 daa2 gaau1.
examples.translation: Two groups of people engaged in a fight in a bar last night.

senses.definition: 減輕對方嘅問題，或者令對方想做嘅嘢易啲完成 (to help; to assist; to support)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 有冇人幫手呀？
examples.jyutping: jau5 mou5 jan4 bong1 sau2 aa3?
examples.translation: Anyone can help?

senses.definition: 因為一啲嘢危險、尷尬或者令人難受而選擇保持距離 (to avoid; to evade; to keep away from)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢為咗避開啲警察，匿埋咗喺一個秘密嘅地方度。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 wai6 zo2 bei6 hoi1 di1 ging2 caat3, nei1 maai4 zo2 hai2 jat1 go3 bei3 mat6 ge3 dei6 fong1 dou6.
examples.translation: He tried to evade the police by hiding in a secret place.

senses.definition: 物體同外界接觸嘅部分；物件內外嘅分界（量詞：層） (surface; the face that keeps in contact with the outside; the boundary between inside and outside)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 月球表面凹凸不平。
examples.jyutping: jyut6 kau4 biu2 min6 nap1 dat6 bat1 ping4.
examples.translation: The surface of the moon is very rough.

phonetic.original: bei2 bei2 gaai1 si6:bei6 bei6 gaai1 si6

senses.definition: 邊度都揾到，到處都有 (can be found everywhere; very common)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 大城市裏面嘅大學生比比皆是，揾工做唔易㗎！
examples.jyutping: daai6 sing4 si5 leoi5 min6 ge3 daai6 hok6 saang1 bei2 bei2 gaai1 si6, wan2 gung1 zou6 m4 ji6 gaa3.
examples.translation: In big cities, university graduates are everywhere. It isn't easy to get a job!

keywords: bei2 bei2 gaai1 si6:bei6 bei6 gaai1 si6

senses.definition: 俾警察截停，盤查身份證或者搜身（#龜 係警察嘅貶稱） (to be stopped by a police officer for identity check or search; literally "to be teased by a tortoise")
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 頭先我落街嗰陣俾龜逗。
examples.jyutping: tau4 sin1 ngo5 lok6 gaai1 go2 zan2 bei2 gwai1 dau6.
examples.translation: I was stopped by the police when I was out.

senses.definition: 兩個人或兩隊人比賽嘅分數 (score; the score of a competition or a match between two people or teams)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 德國對巴西嗰場波嘅比分係七比一。
examples.jyutping: dak1 gwok3 deoi3 baa1 sai1 go2 coeng4 bo1 ge3 bei2 fan1 hai6 cat1 bei2 jat1.
examples.translation: The score of the football match between Germany vs Brazil is seven to one.

senses.definition: 不合情理，離譜 (ridiculous; absurd; nonsense)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢講嘅嘢簡直不知所謂。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 gong2 ge3 je5 gaan2 zik6 bat1 zi1 so2 wai6.
examples.translation: What he's saying is basically total nonsense.

senses.definition: 停止 (to stop; to cease)
senses.label: 語素

examples.text: #欲罷不能
examples.jyutping: juk6 baa6 bat1 nang4
examples.translation: unable to stop

senses.definition: 指唔做嘢去抗議、表達不滿 (to strike)

examples.text: #罷課
examples.jyutping: baa6 fo3
examples.translation: to go on strike; to skip class in protest

senses.definition: 手腳唔協調同唔靈活 (clumsy and awkward with hand or overall body movements)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 你洗碗就打爛碗，真係笨手笨腳啊。
examples.jyutping: nei5 sai2 wun2 zau6 daa2 laan6 wun2, zan1 hai6 ban6 sau2 ban6 goek3 aa3.
examples.translation: When you wash the dishes, you break them. You are so clumsy.

senses.definition: 應該放假但係冇放，之後放返嘅假期（量詞：日） (deferred holiday; day off for having worked overtime; day in lieu; compensatory leave)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 今年嘅重陽節係星期日，所以星期一係補假。
examples.jyutping: gam1 nin4 ge3 cung4 joeng4 zit3 hai6 sing1 kei4 jat6, so2 ji5 sing1 kei4 jat1 hai6 bou2 gaa3.
examples.translation: As this year's Chung Yeung festival falls on a Sunday, there will be a deferred holiday on Monday.

senses.definition: 冇辦法知道 (unable to find out; unknown)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 至於佢點解會喺日本就不得而知嘞。
examples.jyutping: zi3 jyu1 keoi5 dim2 gaai2 wui5 hai2 jat6 bun2 zau6 bat1 dak1 ji4 zi1 laak3.
examples.translation: The reason why he's in Japan is anybody's guess.

senses.definition: 形容一個人成日駁嘴 (used to describe a person who talks back no matter what)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 我哋唔好同佢講嘢啫，正一包頂頸。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 m4 hou2 tung4 keoi5 gong2 je5 ze1, zing3 jat1 baau1 ding2 geng2.
examples.translation: Let's not talk to him; he always talks back for no reason.

senses.definition: 語素，指中國來港公務人員，戲稱。 (as a slang to discribe Chinese who come to Hong Kong for business purposes)
senses.label: 語素

examples.text: 哩個表姐好好酒量。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 biu2 ze2 hou2 hou2 zau2 loeng6
examples.translation: this Chinese lady can really drink.

senses.definition: 一長串紅色筒型嘅細小炸藥，會引爆嚟慶祝喜慶，多數會喺大陸見到人引爆 (firecracker; a long string of tiny red cylindrical explosives, usually detonated in celebrations in Mainland China)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 放鞭炮
examples.jyutping: fong3 bin1 paau3
examples.translation: to light firecrackers

senses.definition: 好有#價值 (precious; valuable)
senses.label: 語素

examples.text: #寶貴
examples.jyutping: bou2 gwai3
examples.translation: precious

senses.definition: 一啲都唔掩飾，全部流露晒出嚟 (to reveal everything without any reserve, on full display)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢管理嘅傲慢作風喺佢對待秘書嘅態度上面表露無遺。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 gun2 lei5 ge3 ngou6 maan6 zok3 fung1 hai2 keoi5 deoi3 doi6 bei3 syu1 ge3 taai3 dou6 soeng6 min6 biu2 lou6 mou4 wai4.
examples.translation: His managerial arrogance was on full display in the way he treated his secretary.

senses.definition: 暫時忍住唔#呼吸；暫停呼吸 (to hold one's breath)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你跳落水嘅時候記住要閉氣。
examples.jyutping: nei5 tiu3 lok6 seoi2 ge3 si4 hau6 gei3 zyu6 jiu3 bai3 hei3.
examples.translation: Remember to hold your breath when you dive into the water.

senses.definition: 辨別對象之間嘅差別 (to compare; to compete; to match)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我啲數學點同佢比呀？
examples.jyutping: ngo5 di1 sou3 hok6 dim2 tung4 keoi5 bei2 aa3?
examples.translation: How can my mathematical capability be compared with his?

senses.definition: 表示對象之間嘅比例 (to; used to indicate a ratio)

examples.text: 一比九十九
examples.jyutping: jat1 bei2 gau2 sap6 gau2

senses.definition: 「#俾」嘅常見錯字 (a commonly used but less acceptable way to write the verb #俾 bei2 "to give")
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 比例嘅簡寫 (ratio)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 七三比
examples.jyutping: cat1 saam1 bei2
examples.translation: 7-3 ratio

senses.definition: 形容一個人腳尖比正常人指得更出，形成一個倒八字；又或者佢對腳比正常人拗得更入，變成腳尖貼近，腳踭向外，一個正八字咁（量詞：對） (feet tending to point more inwardly or outwardly than normal; feet in the shape of the Chinese Character eight)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 動畫入面啲女仔成日八字腳好似好可愛咁，但現實如果成日咁嘅話好傷腳㗎。
examples.jyutping: dung6 waa2 jap6 min6 di1 neoi5 zai2 seng4 jat6 baat3 zi6 goek3 hou2 ci5 hou2 ho2 oi3 gam2, daan6 jin6 sat6 jyu4 gwo2 seng4 jat6 gam2 ge3 waa2 hou2 soeng1 goek3 gaa3.
examples.translation: The girls in anime might look cute when they always point their toes inwardly, but if we do it in real life, it would be really harmful to our legs.

senses.definition: 廟宇入面俾人擺放祭品嘅枱（量詞：張） (tables in a temple on which offerings are placed)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 每逢公開試，文武廟張拜枱都擺滿零食同生果之類嘅祭品。
examples.jyutping: mui5 fung4 gung1 hoi1 si5, man4 mou5 miu2 zoeng1 baai3 toi2 dou1 baai2 mun5 ling4 sik6 tung4 saang1 gwo2 zi1 leoi6 ge3 zai3 ban2.
examples.translation: On every exam season, the offering table of Man Mo Temple is covered with tributes such as fruits and snacks.

senses.definition: 唔理；唔考慮；無視 (to have no regard for; to ignore)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 不顧後果
examples.jyutping: bat1 gu3 hau6 gwo2
examples.translation: to have no consideration for the consequences

senses.definition: 唔考慮嘅範圍 (the batch of neglected matter)

examples.text: 置某人嘅感受於不顧
examples.jyutping: zi3 mau5 jan4 ge3 gam2 sau6 jyu1 bat1 gu3
examples.translation: to disregard someone's feelings

senses.definition: 指一樣嘢裏面有某啲成份或者內容 (to contain; to embody)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢個故事包含咗一個深遠嘅道理。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 gu3 si6 baau1 ham4 zo2 jat1 go3 sam1 jyun5 ge3 dou6 lei5.
examples.translation: This story embodies a profound truth.

senses.definition: #好處、#幫助；比較文雅嘅講法 (benefits; aid; advantage (formal))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 經常做運動對身體有所裨益。
examples.jyutping: ging1 soeng4 zou6 wan6 dung6 deoi3 san1 tai2 jau5 so2 bei1 jik1.
examples.translation: Frequent exercising benefits the body greatly.

senses.definition: 有#價值, 唔一定係金錢上嘅#價值（量詞：架） (precious; valuable)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 寶貴嘅經驗
examples.jyutping: bou2 gwai3 ge3 ging1 jim6
examples.translation: valuable experience

senses.definition: 一種#加密貨幣 (Bitcoin)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 人體或者動物嘅背面影像 (a view of the back of a person or an animal)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我凝望住佢嘅背影，感到失落。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 jing4 mong6 zyu6 keoi5 ge3 bui3 jing2, gam2 dou3 sat1 lok6.
examples.translation: I gazed at her back, feeling down.

senses.definition: 國家名；位於#東歐 內陸，首都係明斯克 (Belarus)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 將士兵同武器派去適當嘅地方，預備防守 (to set up defenses; to make tactical arrangements in order to defend; to place troops on garrison duty)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 軍事佈防
examples.jyutping: gwan1 si6 bou3 fong4

senses.definition: 繼續擁有 (to retain; to keep; to reserve)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 雖然間餐廳最近先裝修過，但係仍然保留住一種典雅嘅感覺。
examples.jyutping: seoi1 jin4 gaan1 caan1 teng1 zeoi3 gan6 sin1 zong1 sau1 gwo3, daan6 hai6 jing4 jin4 bou2 lau4 zyu6 jat1 zung2 din2 ngaa5 ge3 gam2 gok3.
examples.translation: Although the restaurant was renovated recently, it still retains a classic feel.

senses.definition: 申請參加一啲活動，通常要填表 (to apply for admission; to sign up for)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢報咗名參加歌唱比賽。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 bou3 zo2 meng2 caam1 gaa1 go1 coeng3 bei2 coi3.
examples.translation: She has joined the singing contest.

senses.definition: 唔知道一樣嘢嘅下落或者事情嘅結果 (not knowing the result or the final destination)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢辭咗份工之後就消失咗，不知所終。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 ci4 zo2 fan6 gung1 zi1 hau6 zau6 siu1 sat1 zo2, bat1 zi1 so2 zung1.
examples.translation: He vanished after quitting his job, no one knows where he is nor how he is doing now.

senses.definition: 認為某樣嘢唔值得並且唔願意做，有輕視嘅意思 (to disdain; to despise; to regard doing something as worthless; to feel it beneath one's dignity to do sth)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 江生覺得記者個問題太簡單同幼稚，佢不屑於浪費時間去回答。
examples.jyutping: gong1 saang1 gok3 dak1 gei3 ze2 go3 man6 tai4 taai3 gaan2 daan1 tung4 jau3 zi6, keoi5 bat1 sit3 jyu1 long6 fai3 si4 gaan3 heoi3 wui4 daap3
examples.translation: Mr. Kong thought the journalist's question was too simple and naive, so he felt it beneath him to waste time answering.

senses.definition: （通常用喺否定、反問句）停止，放棄 ((usually used in a negative sentence or rhetorical question) to stop; to give up)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我見唔到佢唔會罷休。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 gin3 m4 dou2 keoi5 m4 wui5 baa6 jau1.
examples.translation: I won't give up until I see him.

senses.definition: 俾提議嗰陣成日會用嘅詞 ((a word frequently used when making suggestions) why not; how about; what about)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 不如食日本菜吖。
examples.jyutping: bat1 jyu4 sik6 jat6 bun2 coi3 aa1.
examples.translation: Let's have Japanese food.

senses.definition: 唔係；唔夠其他人咁好；唔配叫做 (to be worse than; not even at that level)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: #一蟹不如一蟹
examples.jyutping: jat1 haai5 bat1 jyu4 jat1 haai5
examples.translation: the quality of the people declines as generations pass, literally "one crab is worse than another

senses.definition: #白色#頭髮 (gray hair)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 狂妄#自滿 ，以為一整個世界嘅其他人都比自己差。 (extremely arrogant)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢嗰副不可一世嘅嘴臉，真係好乞人憎！
examples.jyutping: keoi5 go2 fu3 bat1 ho2 jat1 sai3 ge3 zeoi2 lim5, zan1 hai6 hou2 hat1 jan4 zang1!
examples.translation: His arrogant attitude is so annoying!

senses.definition: 慶祝同標誌住一班人畢業嘅#典禮（量詞：個） (graduation ceremony)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 原本上年十一月搞嘅畢業禮，褪到而家先搞到。
examples.jyutping: jyun4 bun2 soeng6 nin2 sap6 jat1 jyut6 gaau2 ge3 bat1 jip6 lai5, tan3 dou3 ji4 gaa1 sin1 gaau2 dou2.
examples.translation: The graduation ceremony that was supposed to be held in November last year got postponed until now.

senses.definition: 解決問題或處理某事嘅方法（量詞：個） (solution; method; means; way; the way to solve a problem, the way to handle something)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 以下係一啲減少家居垃圾嘅辦法。
examples.jyutping: ji5 haa6 hai6 jat1 di1 gaam2 siu2 gaa1 geoi1 laap6 saap3 ge3 baan6 faat3.
examples.translation: Below are some methods for reducing domestic waste.

senses.definition: 唔知道，唔清楚一啲資料；多數係寫作嗰陣用 (not known; not clear (of some information))
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 出生日期不詳
examples.jyutping: ceot1 sang1 jat6 kei4 bat1 coeng4
examples.translation: (one's) date of birth is unknown

senses.definition: #巴黎 嘅艾菲爾鐵塔嘅俗稱，係世界知名建築 (Eiffel Tower; literally "Paris Tower")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 年老嘅男性（量詞：個） (old man)

examples.text: 有個伯爺公行行吓暈咗喺馬路。
examples.jyutping: jau5 go3 baak3 je1 gung1 haang4 haang4 haa5 wan4 zo2 hai2 maa5 lou6.
examples.translation: An old man fainted on the crosswalk when he was walking.

senses.definition: 年老女性稱呼自己年長丈夫嘅暱稱 (how elderly women lovingly address their spouses)

examples.text: 我個伯爺公又去咗快活谷睇跑馬喇。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 go3 baak3 je1 gung1 jau6 heoi3 zo2 faai3 wut6 guk1 tai2 paau2 maa5 laa3.
examples.translation: My husband went to Happy Valley to watch horse racing again.

senses.definition: 同時#存在 (to coexist)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 並存不悖
examples.jyutping: bing6 cyun4 bat1 bui3
examples.translation: to coexist without conflict

senses.definition: 用罐用燃火同抽氣嘅療法，嚟到通經活絡、行氣活血、消腫止痛同祛風散寒等等 (cupping therapy)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我多數去中醫度做拔罐
examples.jyutping: ngo5 do1 sou3 heoi3 zung1 ji1 dou6 zou6 bat6 gun3.
examples.translation: I always go to see the traditional Chinese physician to do Cupping therapy.

senses.definition: 唔花任何力氣、努力就可以享有或獲得成果 (reap without sowing)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 不勞而獲嘅人係唔會有成就㗎。
examples.jyutping: bat1 lou4 ji4 wok6 ge3 jan4 hai6 m4 wui2 jau5 sing4 zau6 gaa3.
examples.translation: Those who reap without sowing will not get any achievement.

senses.definition: 用嚟表示數值嘅符號，可以係已知亦可以係未知。 (variable)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 解方程就係要揾出變量所代表嘅數值。
examples.jyutping: gaai2 fong1 cing4 zau6 hai6 jiu3 wan2 ceot1 bin3 loeng6 so2 doi6 biu2 ge3 sou3 zik6
examples.translation: Solving equation is the process of finding the values of the variables.

senses.definition: 中式嘅#包，通常係#蒸 嘅 (steamed bun)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我整咗個包。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 zing2 zo2 go3 baau1
examples.translation: I made a bun.

senses.definition: 機構組織入面有特定功能嘅分支單位（量詞：個） (department; section)

examples.text: 跨部門小組
examples.jyutping: kwaa1 bou6 mun4 siu2 zou2

senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 水嘅表面張力令一啲昆蟲可以喺水面飄浮。
examples.translation: Insects may float on water due to surface tension.

senses.definition: 用嚟計一啲有柄或者有把手嘅嘢、成束長條狀嘅嘢、可以用手握住嘅嘢、手部動作、火嘅數量。 (quantifier for fire or hand movements or something which have a handle or strip or able to hold with hands)

examples.text: 一把長頭髮

senses.definition: （東亞）題咗字嘅牌，通常掛喺門牆、樑柱嘅上方，寫上建築物名稱，或者對建築物、物業主人嘅稱頌同祝福（量詞：塊） (plaque)

senses.definition: （東亞）題咗字嘅牌，通常掛喺門牆、樑柱嘅上方，寫上建築物名稱，或者對建築物、物業主人嘅稱頌同祝福；一般稱為#匾額 或者#牌匾（量詞：塊） (plaque)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 橫匾
examples.jyutping: waang4 bin2
examples.translation: horizontal plaque

senses.definition: #司機 唔開車，#罷工 抗議 ((of professional drivers) to go on strike)

examples.text: 的士而家好少罷駛，最多慢駛。
examples.jyutping: dik1 si2 ji4 gaa1 hou2 siu2 baa6 sai2, zeoi3 do1 maan6 sai2.

senses.definition: 唔缺少，大把，好多 (to not lack; to have no shortage of)

examples.text: 公司不乏人才，走啦，冇人留你。
examples.jyutping: gung1 si1 bat1 fat6 jan4 coi4, zau2 laa1, mou5 jan4 lau4 nei5.
examples.translation: The company has no shortage of talented people. Just leave. No one is asking you to stay.

senses.definition: 中國古代嘅爵位名，「伯」係五等中嘅中間。經常會被用嚟對照等級翻譯返外國嘅爵位，咁嘅情況就多數係尾三嗰級。（量詞：個） (the third level of Ancient Chinese noble system. It is often used to translate the similar levels of noble statuses in European countries, which are usually the third last; earl)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 香港巴士術語，指舊款白色車身嘅冷氣巴士 (a special term used within the bus-lover subculture, referring to the white painted buses with air conditioning)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #落雨 時去揾一個地方減低畀雨嘅影響 (to take cover from the rain)

examples.text: 避雨亭
examples.jyutping: bei6 jyu5 ting4
examples.translation: rain shelter

senses.definition: 用手掌打人呢個動作嘅量詞 (quantifier for the act of slapping)

examples.text: 個女仔摑佢男朋友塊面，摑咗十四巴。
examples.jyutping: go3 neoi5 zai2 gwaat3 keoi5 naam4 pang4 jau5 faai3 min6, gwaat3 zo2 sap6 sei3 baa1.

senses.definition: 美國#百事 公司推出嘅一種飲品，口味同可口可樂相似；包裝主要係藍色，對比#可口可樂 嘅紅色（量詞：罐／樽） (Pepsi-Cola, a kind of cola that is produced and manufactured by PepsiCo)

examples.jyutping: hou2 do1 jan4 dou1 fan1 m4 ceot1 baak3 si6 tung4 ho2 hau2 ho2 lok6 jau5 me1 m4 tung4.
examples.translation: Many people could not tell the difference between Pepsi and Coca-cola.

senses.definition: 向#北 嘅嗰一面；朝向#北方 或位於北方 (the northern side; the side facing north)

examples.jyutping: daai6 gwok3 bok3 jik6

examples.translation: you guys (showing disdain)

examples.translation: The first step of garnishing: Put your food at the centre of a big plate.

senses.definition: 傳統中式婚禮中嘅儀式，源於對#天地 嘅崇拜；新人會參拜天地，請天地見證 (worshiping the sky and the earth, a ritual in a traditional Chinese-style wedding)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 形容差唔多，難分優劣 (on a par; on a similar level)

examples.text: 我認為唐詩同宋詞嘅文學地位不相伯仲。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 jing6 wai4 tong4 si1 tung4 sung3 ci4 ge3 man4 hok6 dei6 wai6 bat1 soeng1 baak3 zung6.

senses.definition: 用布料縫製而成嘅#玩偶（量詞：隻） (toy figure made of cloth)

senses.definition: 植物名；一種#棕櫚 樹，原產於#馬來西亞，係東南亞好普遍；亦都指可以食用嘅果實 (areca catechu or areca palm; a kind of palm tree originating from Malaysia and commonly found in Southeast Asia; also refer to the edible fruit of areca palm)

senses.definition: 國家名；位於#非洲 西部，首都係新港 (Benin)

senses.definition: 國家名；全名係北馬其頓共和國，位於東南歐#巴爾幹半島 南部，首都係斯科普里 (North Macedonia)

senses.definition: #非洲 嘅北部 (North Africa)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 阿爾及利亞、利比亞同埃及都係北非嘅國家。

examples.translation: Algeria, Libya and Egypt are countries in North Africa.

senses.definition: #動物 名；#熊 屬嘅其中一種，主要住喺#北極；全身毛髮透明，喺陽光及冰層反射下呈白色，而毛下面嘅皮膚係黑色嘅（量詞：隻） (polar bear)

senses.definition: 即係#唔打緊、#唔緊要 (never mind)

examples.jyutping: syun1 zi1 baat3 sin1 toi2
examples.translation: square table made of rosewood

senses.definition: 形容人好似嬰兒，多數用嚟指人天真、幼稚、唔成熟、唔識照顧自己，或外表好細個 (to describe someone who resembles a baby as to either appearance or behavior; usually used to describe someone as naive, childish, immature, unable to take care of themselves, or baby-faced.)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 我個仔好啤啤㗎，出門口都仲要我幫佢著鞋。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 go3 zai2 hou2 bi4 bi1 gaa3, ceot1 mun4 hau2 dou1 zung6 jiu3 ngo5 bong1 keoi5 zoek3 haai4.
examples.translation: My son is like a baby. When he goes out, I still have to help him put on his shoes.

senses.definition: 嬰兒，幼兒（量詞：個） (baby, toddler)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: #啤啤仔
examples.jyutping: bi4 bi1 zai2
examples.translation: baby boy

senses.definition: 寶貝，情侶用嚟稱呼對方嘅暱稱 (baby; sweetheart; affectionate term of address used between lovers)

examples.text: BB呀，我哋聽日去赤柱拍拖好冇啊？
examples.jyutping: bi4 bi1 aa4, ngo5 dei6 ting1 jat6 heoi3 cek3 cyu5 paak3 to1 hou2 mou2 aa3?
examples.translation: Baby, should we go to Stanley for a date tomorrow?

senses.definition: #唔緊要 (not important; do not matter; nevermind)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 唔緊要，慢慢嚟。
examples.jyutping: m4 gan2 jiu3, maan6 maan2 lai4.
examples.translation: It's fine, take it slow.

senses.definition: 對老年男人嘅稱謂（量詞：個） (form of address to an elderly man)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 小明成日扶伯伯過馬路。
examples.jyutping: siu2 ming4 seng4 jat6 fu4 baak3 baak3 gwo3 maa5 lou6.
examples.translation: Ming always helps the elderly men cross the road.

senses.definition: 周圍有冰保凍嘅 (kept cool in an ice bath)
senses.label: 區別詞

examples.text: 冰鎮奶茶
examples.jyutping: bing1 zan3 naai5 caa4
examples.translation: ice bath milk tea

senses.definition: 一九七零年代流行髮型，頭髮又鬈又鬆又大嚿 (afro-hair; literally: explosive head)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一種印刷藝術，透過喺唔同嘅材料例如木版、石版、金屬版雕刻或者腐蝕，得到想要嘅圖形，再喺上面上顏料，從而將圖像轉移到紙上。版畫同其他最大嘅分別係版畫可以一次過大量複製，價錢亦都相對地平好多 (printmaking)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 扁平；形容一樣嘢壓到扁晒 (flat; flattened)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 你坐到我個紙包蛋糕扁踢踢咁，我點食呀。
examples.jyutping: nei5 co5 dou3 ngo5 go3 zi2 baau1 daan6 gou1 bin2 tek6 tek6 gam2, ngo5 dim2 sik6 aa3.
examples.translation: You sat on my packed cake and completely flattened it. How am I supposed to eat it now?

senses.definition: #指南針 指住嘅#方向，同#南 方相對；#日出 嗰陣直望#太陽，#左 手邊就係北方 (north)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: #北方
examples.jyutping: bak1 fong1

senses.definition: 只係普普通通，冇乜突出嘅地方，同預料中有落差；帶貶義 ((derogatory) insignificant, unassuming, worse then expectation)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢話到間餐廳點好食法，試過咪又不外如是。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 waa6 dou3 gaan1 caan1 teng1 dim2 hou2 sik6 faat3, si3 gwo3 mai6 jau6 bat1 ngoi6 jyu4 si6.
examples.translation: He kept raving about how good restaurant's food was, but after trying it, I think it's not as good as he made it out to be.

senses.definition: 「#報告」嘅普通話諧音（bàogào） (report; humorous near homophone of the Mandarin reading of #報告 "bàogào")
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 出包膠
examples.jyutping: ceot1 baau1 gaau1
examples.translation: to post a report (to share some personal experience and commentary)

senses.definition: 唔單止、唔係淨係一個人或者一樣嘢 (not only)

senses.definition: （體力）支持唔住，頂唔順，唔夠 ((of physical strength) to be unable to endure; to be exhausted)

examples.text: 不支倒地
examples.jyutping: bat1 zi1 dou2 dei6
examples.translation: to fall down due to exhaustion

senses.definition: 唔#滿意 一啲嘢 (dissatisfied; unhappy with; discontented)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 公司不停削減福利，員工都對公司好不滿。
examples.jyutping: gung1 si1 bat1 ting4 soek3 gaam2 fuk1 lei6, jyun4 gung1 dou1 deoi3 gung1 si1 hou2 bat1 mun5.

senses.definition: 形容能力麻麻，學藝未精，指淨係識一部份，未能完全掌握 (imperfectly learnt; literally: half bucket of water)

examples.jyutping: keoi5 joeng6 joeng6 je5 dou1 bun3 tung2 seoi2, mou5 joeng6 je5 hok6 dak1 seng4.

senses.definition: #窗 嘅一種，採用一塊塊長條形嘅玻璃、金屬或木等材料平行排列組成（量詞：個） (jalousie window; louvre window)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 歷史人物；古典時期至浪漫時期嘅#德國 作曲家 (Ludwig van Beethoven)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 《歡樂頌》係貝多芬其中一首名作。
examples.jyutping: fun1 lok6 zung6 hai6 bui3 do1 fan1 kei4 zung1 jat1 sau2 ming4 zok3.
examples.translation: Ode to Joy" is one of Beethoven's famous works.

senses.definition: 講完電話或道別時講嘅説話 ((English loan) bye-bye; goodbye; a conventional expression used when parting or at the end of a conversation)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 我走先喇，拜拜！
examples.jyutping: ngo5 zau2 sin1 laa3, baai1 baai3!
examples.translation: I gotta go. Bye!

senses.definition: 歇後語；下半句係「無權無勢」（取「#拳」 kyun4 嘅諧音以及#太監#去勢 嘅意思） (the former part of a sandwich pun which implies "powerless and uninfluential", literally "eunuch with disabled hands")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 馬路嘅過路設施，由路面黑白間條紋組成，貌似#斑馬 紋，俾行人優先行馬路，唔使等紅綠燈（量詞：條） (zebra crossing; pedestrian crossing)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 過斑馬線安全啲。
examples.jyutping: gwo3 baan1 maa5 sin3 on1 cyun4 di1.
examples.translation: It's safer to use the zebra crossing.

senses.definition: 一種#哺乳類 動物；係斑馬亞屬同細紋斑馬亞屬嘅通稱，個樣好似#馬，身上有黑白相間嘅條紋，隻隻嘅紋理都唔同（量詞：隻） (zebra)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你知唔知其實斑馬係行一夫多妻制㗎？
examples.jyutping: nei5 zi1 m4 zi1 kei4 sat6 baan1 maa5 hai6 haang4 jat1 fu1 do1 cai1 zai3 gaa3?

examples.text: #圖窮匕現
examples.jyutping: tou4 kung4 bei3 jin6
examples.translation: the truth is revealed; literally when the map is unrolled, the dagger is revealed

senses.definition: 一種武器；係相對短而幼嘅#刀，有尖端，通常兩面開鋒，就好似一把小型嘅#劍 咁；主要用嚟#切、#𠝹 或者#捅，而唔會用嚟#斬#劈 嘅（量詞：把） (dagger)

senses.definition: 指用長窄木板整嘅冇靠背長椅，可以俾好多人坐。亦指同以長方形木板整嘅單人冇靠背凳。（量詞：張） (wooden bench, a long seat without a backrest made with long narrow plank. Also refers to a one-man wooden seat without a backseat made with rectangular plank.)

senses.definition: 專俾#BB 坐喺上面嘅#櫈（量詞：張） (baby chair)

examples.text: 呢張枱夠唔夠位擺BB櫈呀？
examples.jyutping: ni1 zoeng1 toi2 gau3 m4 gau3 wai2 baai2 bi4 bi1 dang3 aa3?

senses.definition: 因為某方面嘅損失而喺另一方面得到嘅嘢，目的係令損失嘅影響冇咁嚴重或慘痛（量詞：筆） (compensation; remuneration)

examples.text: 我哋會畀五千蚊你作為補償。

senses.definition: 太陽喺#北半球 能夠直射到嘅範圍嘅最北便（離#赤道 最遠）嘅界線 (Tropic of Cancer)

senses.definition: 城市名；位於#法國 西南部 (Bordeaux)

senses.definition: 防止著作俾人抄襲或盜用嘅法律權利；「版權」喺法律上有特定意思，同 #商標、#專利 有分別，但一般人有時都會通稱呢啲做版權 (copyright; sometimes used to refer to other intellectual property rights, such as trademarks, patents, etc.)

examples.text: #版權費
examples.jyutping: baan2 kyun4 fai3

senses.definition: 嚟自#菲律賓 嘅女傭；略帶貶義 (domestic workers from the Philippines; Filipino maids; somewhat derogatory)

examples.text: 每逢星期日，中環都會有好多賓賓。
examples.jyutping: mui5 fung4 sing1 kei4 jat6, zung1 waan4 dou1 wui5 jau5 hou2 do1 ban1 ban1.

senses.definition: #菲律賓 少女；一般指嚟自菲律賓嘅女性傭工，帶少少貶義 ((slightly derogatory) female Filipino maid / domestic helper; Filipino girl)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 《易經》入面嘅概念，占卜用。每個卦由三個「#爻」組成，每個「爻」可以分陰或者陽，所以總共有八個組合，分別係「乾兑離震巽坎艮坤」。 (the Eight Trigrams of Yi Jing (the Book of Changes), which were formerly used in divination. Also refers to a tool based on the Eight Trigrams, used by Taoist practitioners)

senses.definition: 即係八卦鏡，係一種外圍印有八卦符號，中間係一塊圓鏡嘅#道教 辟邪器具（量詞：塊） (Bagua mirror)
身體欠缺黑色素嘅遺傳疾病，頭髮同全身皮膚都會近乎白色 (albinism)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 身體上出現白色斑塊嘅皮膚病；通常係後天出現，同#白化病 唔同 (vitiligo)

senses.definition: 因為一啲野危險、尷尬或者令人難受，而選擇唔去面對 (to avoid; to evade; to keep away from)

examples.text: 佢避開我嘅問題唔答。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 bei6 hoi1 ngo5 ge3 man6 tai4 m4 daap3.

senses.definition: #報價 嘅文件（量詞：張／份） ((price) quotation; quote)

examples.text: 我第一次揾人裝修，可唔可以幫手睇睇張報價單呀？

senses.definition: 病得好嚴重，就快會死 (seriously ill; fatally ill)

examples.jyutping: keoi5 beng6 zung6 ngo6 cong4, hou2 heoi1 joek6.

senses.definition: 講嘢好大聲或者好快 (to talk loudly or fast)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 頭先地鐵度有個阿叔成程響度嗶哩叭啦。
examples.jyutping: tau4 sin1 dei6 tit3 dou6 jau5 go3 aa3 suk1 seng4 cing4 hoeng2 dou6 bi1 li1 baa1 laa1.

senses.definition: 有#寶物 嘅#盒、#箱 (treasure chest)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 整體入面嘅其中一啲個體（量詞：個） (part; portion)

examples.text: #一部分
examples.jyutping: jat1 bou6 fan6
examples.translation: a part; a portion

senses.definition: 泛指唔係靠#打工，花極短工作時間，而又固定嘅#收入，如#股息、#租金、#版權費 (passive income)

senses.definition: 隱藏嘅嘢露咗出嚟，無遮無掩 (to expose; to bare; to reveal)

examples.text: 暴露於空氣之中
examples.jyutping: bou6 lou6 jyu1 hung1 hei3 zi1 zung1

senses.definition: 又叫做 #期票 ，係由一個人簽畀另一個人嘅一種書面承諾，用嚟保證自己喺約定嘅日子或者見到呢張單據時，會無條件畀錢一個特定的對象。 (cashier orders)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一個#病 嘅跡象，病人因病而引致嘅行為、感覺、外表或分泌異常，病人或醫生可以透過分析病徵，得知有冇可以患咗某個病（量詞：種／個） (symptom of a disease)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 頭痛、發燒係感冒嘅病徵。
examples.jyutping: tau4 tung3, faat3 siu1 hai6 gam2 mou6 ge3 beng6 zing1.
examples.translation: Headache and fever are symptoms of common cold.

senses.definition: 有證據顯示喺案發當時，但嫌疑人唔喺案發現場 (alibi)

examples.text: 喺案發當時，我嘅當事人有不在場證明。
examples.jyutping: hai2 on3 faat3 dong1 si4, ngo5 ge3 dong1 si6 jan4 jau5 bat1 zoi6 coeng4 zing3 ming4
examples.translation: The person in question has an alibi at the time of the crime.

senses.definition: #醫院 裏面俾病人住嘅房（量詞：間） (ward in a hospital; the place where in-patients stay in a hospital)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 隔離病房
examples.jyutping: gaak3 lei4 beng6 fong2

senses.definition: 脾氣唔好，容易#發嬲 (ill-tempered; irritable; grumpy; short-tempered; crotchety)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢係一個暴躁嘅人。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 hai6 jat1 go3 bou6 cou3 ge3 jan4.
examples.translation: He is a crotchety man.

senses.definition: 用手拎住一樣嘢 (to hold something with one's hand)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 堅持一啲嘢 (to insist on)
按住一啲嘢去做人處事 (to deal with a matter in accordance with something)
擊打某人身體；用手或者物件，帶有武力同速度噉接觸某人身體，作為攻擊；#毆；#打 人 (to beat up someone)

examples.text: 你哋同我抦到佢變豬頭炳。
examples.jyutping: nei5 dei6 tung4 ngo5 bing2 dou3 keoi5 bin3 zyu1 tau4 bing2.

senses.definition: #鬧；#責罵 (to scold; to chastise)

examples.text: 我要返屋企喇，如果唔係實俾阿媽丙呀！
examples.jyutping: ngo5 jiu3 faan1 uk1 kei2 laa3, jyu4 gwo2 m4 hai6 sat6 bei2 aa3 maa1 bing2 aa3!
examples.translation: I have to go home now or I'll get it from my mum!

senses.definition: 排除、唔要一啲嘢 (to expel; to drive off)
senses.label: 語素

examples.text: #摒除
examples.jyutping: bing2 ceoi4
examples.translation: to expel; to drive off

senses.definition: 排除、唔要一啲嘢 (to discard; to reject; to cast aside)

examples.text: 我哋摒棄咗呢個方案。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 bing2 hei3 zo2 ni1 go3 fong1 on3.
examples.translation: We discounted this solution.

senses.definition: 做一啲嘢保護自然資源，包括動物、真菌同植物物種以及佢哋嘅棲息地 (conservation; to take measures to protect natural resources)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 當啲生物開始絕種嗰陣我哋先識得保育。
examples.jyutping: dong1 di1 sang1 mat6 hoi1 ci2 zyut6 zung2 go2 zan6 ngo5 dei6 sin1 sik1 dak1 bou2 juk6.
examples.translation: Only when animals start to become extinct do we start to conserve them.

senses.definition: 奉金錢為至上，以金錢作為理想，貪錢。 (materialistic, money-oriented, takes money as their belief, greedy for money.)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 條女好拜金㗎，專揀有錢仔拍拖。
examples.jyutping: tiu4 neoi2 hou2 baai3 gam1 gaa3, zyun1 gaan2 jau5 cin2 zai2 paak3 to1.
examples.translation: That girl is really materialistic, she only dates rich guys.

senses.definition: 一種傳統小食，將#山楂 用竹籤串埋，再用糖漿醃完變硬；而家都會用其他水果做原料，譬如士多啤梨（量詞：串／粒） (a stick of Chinese haw fruits coated in a hardened sugar syrup as a traditional snack)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 同相同性質嘅具體對象比較，藉此展示抽象或者難明嘅概念 (to draw an analogy; to make a simile or metaphor)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢將總統比喻為希特拉。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 zoeng1 zung2 tung2 bei2 jyu6 wai4 hei1 dak6 laai1.
examples.translation: He drew an analogy between the president and Hitler.

senses.definition: 為咗解釋抽象或者難明嘅概念，同相同性質嘅具體對象所作嘅比較，係一種修辭手法（量詞：個） (metaphor; analogy)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 打個比喻
examples.jyutping: daa2 go3 bei2 jyu6

senses.definition: 報名申請入讀某課程、學校 (to apply for a course or a school; to apply for studies)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我打算報讀暑期日語班。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 daa2 syun3 bou3 duk6 syu2 kei4 jat6 jyu5 baan1.
examples.translation: I plan to apply for a summer Japanese course.

examples.translation: We must defend our home with all our might against foreign enemies!

senses.definition: 犯法，違反法律，通常形容犯咗刑事法 (illegal; unlawful; usually used to describe someone who broke the criminal law)
senses.label: 區別詞

examples.text: 不法嘅行為
examples.jyutping: bat1 faat3 ge3 hang4 wai4
examples.translation: an illegal act

senses.definition: 排除、唔要一啲嘢 (to expel; to drive off)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 摒除雜念
examples.jyutping: bing2 ceoi4 zaap6 nim6
examples.translation: to expel distracting thoughts; to stay focused and avoid distractions

senses.definition: 伊朗嘅官方語言，屬於印歐語系，用波斯阿拉伯字母書寫；其下嘅分支語亦係阿富汗同塔吉克嘅官方語言 (Persian language, Farsi, using Persian alphabet to write)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 即係#波斯語 (Persian language, see#波斯語)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 未來國家名；位於南#太平洋 嘅島國，首都係布卡 (Bougainville)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 唔駛；唔一定要 (no need to; not necessary to; need not)
senses.label: 副詞

senses.definition: 向上級#報告 (to report to one's superior)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 稟告皇上
examples.jyutping: ban2 gou3 wong4 soeng5
examples.translation: to report to Your Majesty

senses.definition: 一直持續，停唔到落嚟 (endlessly)
senses.label: 副詞

senses.definition: 一啲制度或社會定落嚟用嚟判斷某樣嘢好壞嘅尺；判斷層次嘅條件（量詞：個／項） (standard; that which is used to make comparative evaluations, whether based on some system, societal expectations, etc.)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 雙重標準
examples.jyutping: soeng1 cung4 biu1 zeon2
examples.translation: double standard

senses.definition: 特指位於香港#尖沙咀 嘅半島酒店 (Peninsula Hotel, Tsim Sha Tsui)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 三面臨海，一面連接大陸嘅地形（量詞：個） (peninsula)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 九龍半島
examples.jyutping: gau2 lung4 bun3 dou2
examples.translation: Kowloon Peninsula

senses.definition: 比喻男士小便 ((of men) to urinate; literally: to deploy a willow)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 即係#槍決 ，「迫」係槍聲嘅擬聲詞 (to be executed by a firing squad; #迫 baak1 is onomatopoeia for a gunshot)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢俾人迫咗。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 bei2 jan4 baak1 zo2
examples.translation: He was executed by a firing squad.

senses.definition: #緊急，#趕時間 (urgent; pressing)
senses.label: 語素

examples.text: 迫不得已
examples.jyutping: bik1 bat1 dak1 ji5
examples.translation: to have no choice but to do something

senses.definition: 空間細但係容納咗好多人、動物、嘢，令到四周得好少位可以自由移動 (crowded; congested; to contain so many people or things in a relatively small space, such that there is very little room for one to move about)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 架巴士好逼。
examples.jyutping: gaa3 baa1 si2 hou2 bik1.
examples.translation: The bus is very crowded.

senses.definition: 公開出現；喺公眾面前出現 (public appearance; public exposure)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 增加曝光
examples.jyutping: zang1 gaa1 bou6 gwong1
examples.translation: to gain more exposure

senses.definition: 影相嗰陣，畀光線進入相機之後，由菲林或者感光元件感光，紀錄低畫面 ((of photography) to expose)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 曝光三角：光圈、快門、感光度
examples.jyutping: bou6 gwong1 saam1 gok3 gwong1 hyun1, faai3 mun4, gam2 gwong1 dou6
examples.translation: the exposure triangle: aperture, shutter speed and ISO value

senses.definition: 公開秘密，畀其他人知道 (to make a secret known; to expose)

examples.text: 佢個經理人唔准佢嘅戀情曝光。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 go3 ging1 lei5 jan4 m4 zeon2 keoi5 ge3 lyun2 cing4 bou6 gwong1.
examples.translation: His agent didn't allow his relationship be exposed to the public.

senses.definition: 公開出現；喺公眾面前出現 (to appear in public; to reach the public; to expose to the public)

examples.text: 有一批經常曝光嘅政界人物勝出今次選舉。
examples.jyutping: jau5 jat1 pai1 ging1 soeng4 bou6 gwong1 ge3 zing3 gaai3 jan4 mat2 sing3 ceot1 gam1 ci3 syun2 geoi2.
examples.translation: A batch of political figures with high exposure have won the election.

senses.definition: 身體#唔舒服，通常用嚟形容輕微嘅病，例如屙、嘔、肚痛 (unwell; indisposed; usually describes sickness and illness, for example: diarrhea, vomiting, and abdominal pain)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 有十個學生食完午飯之後感到不適，被送院治理。
examples.jyutping: jau5 sap6 go3 hok6 saang1 sik6 jyun4 ng5 faan6 zi1 hau6 gam2 dou3 bat1 sik1, bei6 sung3 jyun2 zi6 lei5.
examples.translation: Ten students felt unwell after eating lunch and were sent to the hospital.

senses.definition: 毒品「甲基安非他命」嘅花名 (a nickname of the drug methamphetamine, also called speed / ice / meth)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: #伏冰
examples.jyutping: buk6 bing1
examples.translation: to inhale meth (onomatopoeia for bubbles in a pipe)

senses.definition: 扁平物體嘅表面同底面之間嘅距離好細 (thin; flimsy; filmy)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 薄冰
examples.jyutping: bok6 bing1
examples.translation: thin ice

senses.definition: 同 #邊 一樣，詢問地點、物件、人物、時間，用嘅時候唔使指明量詞，後面指唔指明名詞都得；「邊+其他量詞」同「邊啲」兩者分別在於，用「邊啲」嘅時候，發問人預想中嘅答案包括多過一個物件／地點／人物／ 時間 (which (plural); same as  #邊 , the word used for enquiry of places, objects, people and time. Classifier should be omitted when used, and the specification of object is optional. The difference between 邊 and 邊啲 is that the latter one is used when the speaker is expecting the answer to be of more than one entity.)
senses.label: 代詞

examples.text: 呢度邊啲書係你㗎？
examples.jyutping: nei1 dou6 bin1 di1 syu1 hai6 nei5 gaa3?
examples.translation: Which of these books are yours?

senses.definition: 即係做嘢唔使體力勞動嗰啲人，例如文員、律師（因為喺傳統入面，佢哋返工係著白色衫嘅，所以叫白領，與#藍領 相對）（量詞：個） (white-collar; non-manual and usually skilled labour)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 白領階級
examples.jyutping: baak6 leng5 gaai1 kap1
examples.translation: white-collar workers

senses.definition: 一種吸食#冰毒 嘅方法，指吸入加熱冰毒之後蒸發出嚟嘅煙霧；呢種方法需要吸食工具，通常用飲管同唔同味道嘅飲品包裝自製而成 (to inhale vapourised meth)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢伏完冰覺得自己識飛，然後跳咗落街。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 buk6 jyun4 bing1 gok3 dak1 zi6 gei2 sik1 fei1, jin4 hau6 tiu3 zo2 lok6 gaai1.
examples.translation: He thought he could fly after inhaling meth, and jumped off a building.

senses.definition: 毒品「甲基安非他命」嘅花名 (a nickname of the drug methamphetamine, also called speed / ice / meth)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 植物名；根部係紅色；葉嫩綠，有少少呈三角形，有甜味，含有豐富鐵質；可以供作蔬菜食用（量詞：條／箸／樖／紮） (spinach)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 指事情進行嗰陣發生嘅曲折、變化同遇到嘅難題 (twists and turns; setback)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 人生總會有波折，但係最重要係要對自己有信心。
examples.jyutping: jan4 sang1 zung2 wui5 jau5 bo1 zit3, daan6 hai6 zeoi3 zung6 jiu3 hai6 jiu3 deoi3 zi6 gei2 jau5 seon3 sam1.
examples.translation: There may be twists and turns in life, but the most important thing is to have confidence in yourself.

senses.definition: 指姑媽、姑姐、姨媽、阿姨或舅父嘅比自己年紀大嘅仔（量詞：個） (the son of one's mother's brother or sister, or of one's father's sister, who is older than oneself; elder male cousin with different family name)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 與其他人喺某種技能方面分高低 (to play in a match; to compete)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢哋比賽咗五個回合都分唔到勝負。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 bei2 coi3 zo2 ng5 go3 wui4 hap6 dou1 fan1 m4 dou2 sing3 fu6.
examples.translation: They've competed for five rounds but it's still not known who's won.

senses.definition: 用嚟判斷兩組以上嘅人之間，某樣技能或者技巧高低嘅活動（量詞:個/場） (competition; match; contest)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 比賽正式開始。
examples.jyutping: bei2 coi3 zing3 sik1 hoi1 ci2.
examples.translation: Let the competition commence.

senses.definition: 好有價值嘅物件（量詞：件） (treasure; something which is very valuable)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 聽講張保仔洞入面以前有好多寶物。
examples.jyutping: teng1 gong2 zoeng1 bou2 zai2 dung6 jap6 min6 ji5 cin4 jau5 hou2 do1 bou2 mat6.
examples.translation: I have heard that there were treasures in the Cheung Po Tsai Cave.

senses.definition: 形容食物對身體有益；可以補到身 ((of food) nourishing)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢隻湯好補㗎。
examples.jyutping: ni1 zek3 tong1 hou2 bou2 gaa3.
examples.translation: This soup is very nourishing.

senses.definition: 持續而經常嘅 (from time to time; often)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 佢不時都會嚟探下我，好關心我㗎。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 bat1 si4 dou1 wui5 lai4 taam3 haa5 ngo5, hou2 gwaan1 sam1 ngo5 gaa3.
examples.translation: He visits me often and cares about me so much.

senses.definition: 背著人哋做一啲嘢，例如#篤背脊 (to do something behind one's back; privately)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 佢喺你面前讚你好有本事，但係背地裏成日同人唱衰你㗎。
examples.translation: He praises your capability in your face but he often bad-mouth you behind your back.

senses.definition: 搬去第度居住 (to move house; to relocate; to move to another residence)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 如果你搬屋嘅話，你要通知税務局。
examples.jyutping: jyu4 gwo2 nei5 bun1 uk1 ge3 waa2, nei5 jiu3 tung1 zi1 seoi3 mou6 guk2.
examples.translation: You have to notify the Inland Revenue Department if you move house.

senses.definition: 將新聞話俾人知嘅媒介，可以係文章、聲音、影片（量詞：則／篇） (news report)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一種 #意大利粉；呈扁平狀嘅長條型意大利麪，橫切面呈橢圓形，比#闊條麪 幼，比#意大利粉 粗 (linguine; a type of pasta)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 形容人好#八卦，中意打聽人哋啲嘢、好管閒事，或成日講人是非 (used to describe someone who is nosy or loves to gossip)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢好八㗎，有咩秘密唔好話佢知。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 hou2 baat3 gaa3, jau5 me1 bei3 mat6 m4 hou2 waa6 keoi5 zi1.
examples.translation: She really loves to gossip, don't tell her any secret.

senses.definition: 用嚟帶出行為嘅受益對象 (for; for the sake of; grammatically to introduce the beneficiary of an action)
senses.label: 介詞

examples.text: 呢間舖頭專門幫人做西裝。
examples.jyutping: ni1 gaan1 pou3 tau2 zyun1 mun4 bong1 jan4 zou6 sai1 zong1.
examples.translation: This shop specialises in making suits for people.

senses.definition: 一直；好長時間都係；一向 (always; all along)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 我啲地理不嬲都好差。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 di1 dei6 lei5 bat1 lau1 dou1 hou2 caa1.
examples.translation: I've always been weak at geography.

senses.definition: #條碼（量詞：個／條） (barcode)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 收銀員掃咗下barcode。
examples.jyutping: sau1 ngan2 jyun4 sou3 zo2 haa5 baa1 kuk1.
examples.translation: The cashier scanned the barcode once.

senses.definition: 短時間內大幅度嘅變化，好多時形容情緒 (to fluctuate; to be unstable; often refers to emotions)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 情緒波動
examples.jyutping: cing4 seoi5 bo1 dung6
examples.translation: in an emotional fluctuation

senses.definition: 手提式筒型#吹風機 (blower; axial fan)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 剎停汽車、單車或者其他移動工具嘅裝置，係英文 brake 嘅音譯（量詞：個） (brake)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 踩迫力
examples.jyutping: caai2 bik6 lik1
examples.translation: to step on the brake

senses.definition: 剎車掣 (vehicle brake)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 踩brake
examples.jyutping: caai2 brik1
examples.translation: to hit the brakes

senses.definition: 喺教學、會議、演講、舞台劇等有主持、表演者長時間進行嘅場合，中間短暫嘅休息時間（量詞：個） (short break)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: #放break
examples.jyutping: fong3 brik1
examples.translation: to take a short break

senses.definition: 英文"Brother"嘅直譯，係某啲討論區對其他男會員嘅稱呼。稱呼女性會員嘅同類詞係#絲打。 ((From English 'brother') Bro, an appellation between forum members, meaning that everyone is just like brothers.)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 巴打，我喺論壇留意咗你好耐！
examples.translation: Bro, I've paid attention to you for a long time in the forum!

senses.definition: 未開化嘅民族，分做好多個部份，為之「部落」。佢地通常係有特定嘅語言同文化，但係政治上唔統一嘅小規模社會，由家族組成。（量詞：個） (tribe)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #皮膚 受傷之後出現，取代正常皮膚嘅#纖維#組織（量詞：條／道／笪） (scar)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 個手術會唔會留疤痕㗎？
examples.jyutping: go3 sau2 seot6 wui5 m4 wui5 lau4 baa1 han4 gaa3?
examples.translation: Will the surgery leave a scar?

senses.definition: 未有人知 (unknown)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 不明氣體
examples.jyutping: bat1 ming4 hei3 tai2
examples.translation: unknown gas

senses.definition: 唔積極，要人哋做嘢自己先有反應 (passive)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢喺呢件事上面處於一個被動嘅位置。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 hai2 ni1 gin6 si6 soeng6 min6 cyu5 jyu1 jat1 go3 bei6 dung6 ge3 wai6 zi3.
examples.translation: He stayed in a passive position on this matter.

senses.definition: 即係#BB（量詞：個） (baby)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你個B好得意！
examples.jyutping: nei5 go3 bi1 hou2 dak1 ji3
examples.translation: Your baby is so cute!

senses.definition: 記熟一啲嘢（通常係一啲文句），然後唔睇原文都可以噏返出嚟。 (to recite from memory)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 背誦係一個傳統嘅學習方法。
examples.jyutping: bui6 zung6 hai6 jat1 go3 cyun4 tung2 ge3 hok6 zaap6 fong1 faat3.
examples.translation: Recital is a traditional teaching method.

senses.definition: #資金 (funds)
senses.label: 語素

examples.text: 本金
examples.jyutping: bun2 gam1
examples.translation: capital

senses.definition: #書 (books)

examples.text: #課本
examples.jyutping: fo3 bun2
examples.translation: textbook

senses.definition: 書嘅某一個版本、排版 ((of books) version; edition)

examples.text: 合訂本
examples.jyutping: hap6 ding6 bun2
examples.translation: bound journals

senses.definition: 事物嘅#根源 (source; origin)

examples.text: #本末倒置
examples.jyutping: bun2 mut6 dou2 zi3
examples.translation: putting the cart before the horse; attend to the incidentals and neglect the essentials

senses.definition: 同講者自己嘅身份、特質有關嘅（後面唔需要量詞） (this; our; my; relevant to the identity or attribute of the speaker (no quantifiers are required))
senses.label: 代詞

examples.text: #本人
examples.jyutping: bun2 jan4
examples.translation: I; me

senses.definition: 做咗都冇用，嘥氣；做咗冇回報 (in vain; for nothing)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 白行一趟
examples.jyutping: baak6 hang4 jat1 tong3
examples.translation: to go on a fruitless trip

senses.definition: 免費；唔需要付出代價嘅 (free of charge; at no cost)

examples.text: 佢哋喺你屋企白食白住，你唔嬲嘅咩？
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 hai2 nei5 uk1 kei2 baak6 sik6 baak6 zyu6, nei5 m4 nau1 ge3 me1?
examples.translation: They stayed at your home without paying for food or lodging, didn't you get mad?

senses.definition: 一個人嘅品德同人格 (one's morality and character)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 成嚿嘢入面一啲個別嘅位置，通常係指人類身體嘅個別位置。 ((of human bodies) part; position)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 八種珍貴嘅食材；有唔同組合，其中一種係龍肝、鳳髓、豹胎、鯉尾、鴞炙、猩講、熊掌、酥酪蟬八種 (eight treasures; eight delicacies)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你哋依家細細個已經嚐盡八珍。
examples.jyutping: nei5 dei6 ji1 gaa1 sai3 sai3 go3 ji5 ging1 soeng4 zeon6 baat3 zan1.
examples.translation: Nowadays you can enjoy all eight delicacies at a young age.

senses.definition: 生物整個個體，經過處理之後，令佢可以長久保存，並儘量保住原貌（量詞：個） (specimen, often of plants or insects)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 製成標本
examples.jyutping: zai3 sing4 biu1 bun2
examples.translation: to make a specimen

senses.definition: 極為緊急嘅關頭，只差一步某事就會發生。同 #邊沿 意義類似，但邊緣通常用於抽象嘅事物上，邊沿就比較比較具體、實際。 (verge; brink; the critical moment and limit, beyond which something would happen)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢個國家正處於滅亡嘅邊緣。
examples.jyutping: nei1 go3 gwok3 gaa1 zing3 cyu2 jyu1 mit6 mong4 ge3 bin1 jyun4.
examples.translation: This country is on the brink of collapse.

senses.definition: 形容俾社會邊緣化或排斥嘅人或群體。佢地嘅生活方式、價值觀或意識型態等通常同社會主流唔同，所以被排斥。 (used to describe a person or group that are marginalized, rejected by society, usually because his or their lifestyles, values, or ideologies, etc, are different from the mainstream.)

examples.text: 邊緣青年
examples.jyutping: bin1 jyun4 cing1 nin4
examples.translation: youth at risk

senses.definition: 泛指政府或者係組織所發放嘅資金；通常係為咗某啲特定嘅目的而發放（量詞：筆） (subsidy by the government)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 政府決定減低對本地農夫嘅補助金。
examples.jyutping: zing3 fu2 kyut3 ding6 gaam2 dai1 deoi3 bun2 dei6 nung4 fu1 ge3 bou2 zo6 gam1.
examples.translation: The government has decided to reduce the level of subsidy to local farmers.

examples.jyutping: bat1 zik1 bou3 doi2
examples.translation: non-woven bag

senses.definition: 即係#屙屎、大便，為香港監獄中囚犯既術語 (to defecate; literally, to arrange a heap)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 講#粗口 (to swear; to use foul language)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我最撚憎人爆粗㗎嘞。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 zeoi3 lan2 zang1 jan4 baau3 cou1 gaa3 laak3.
examples.translation: I fucking hate a person who swears.

senses.definition: 外遊以避開喺#農曆新年 同親友拜年之類嘅社交 (to travel outbound during the Lunar New Year so as to escape from one's relatives and the associated social obligations; literally: to avoid the new year)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢一家大細尋日飛咗去美國避年。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 jat1 gaa1 daai6 sai3 cam4 jat6 fei1 zo2 heoi3 mei5 gwok3 bei6 nin4.
examples.translation: His family flew to the USA yesterday to avoid the Lunar New Year.

senses.definition: #死 嘅委婉講法（通常用嚟討論#在生 嘅人嘅#身後事） (an euphemistic way to discuss the death of a person when he is still alive; literally, "after 100 years returns to old")
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 立咗平安紙，咁你第日百年歸老之後，我哋都知道啲後事你想點安排嘛。
examples.jyutping: laap6 zo2 ping4 on1 zi2, gam2 nei5 dai6 jat6 baak3 nin4 gwai1 lou5 zi1 hau6, ngo5 dei6 dou1 zi1 dou6 di1 hau6 si6 nei5 soeng2 dim2 on1 paai4 maa3.
examples.translation: Make a will first. So after you pass away, we would know your intention about the funeral arrangement.

senses.definition: 銷售策略嘅一種，啲貨品定價定得比較低、利潤微薄，吸引到多啲人來買從而提高銷售量同總利潤 (having a small profit but rapid turnover)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 經濟唔好，唯有薄利多銷。希望賺到少少啦。
examples.jyutping: ging1 zai3 m4 hou2, wai4 jau5 bok6 lei6 do1 siu1. hei1 mong6 zaan6 dou2 siu2 siu2 laa1.
examples.translation: The economy is not so good right now, let's set the price lower to attract more buyers and hope we can earn a profit this way.

senses.definition: 城市名；係#比利時 嘅首都及最大城市 (Brussels)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 問候對方自上次見面以嚟係咪#安好 (have you been well (since last time we met)?)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 咁耐冇見，別來無恙吖嘛？
examples.jyutping: gam3 noi6 mou5 gin3, bit6 loi4 mou4 joeng6 aa1 maa3?
examples.translation: Long time no see. Have you been fine?

senses.definition: #表示#忠心 (to show devotion)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 警察設置#薄落（路障）或者#影快相 (to set up a road-block; to set up a speed trap; literally: to set up a block)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 屯門公路有警察擺薄落。
examples.jyutping: tyun4 mun4 gung1 lou6 jau5 ging2 caat3 baai2 bok6 lok1.
examples.translation: The police has set up a road block in Tuen Mun Road.

senses.definition: 有關文字或圖片嘅額外補充文字，例如係解釋或者評語 (remark; note; annotation)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 用子彈擊中頭部，造成嚴重傷害或者死亡 (to headshot (with a projectile weapon esp. a gun))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 一槍爆頭
examples.jyutping: jat1 coeng1 baau3 tau4
examples.translation: to headshot with a single bullet

senses.definition: 引申指物體擊中頭部，尤其是造成流血嘅時候 (to hit (or be hit) with an object in the head, especially when causing bleeding)
上臂嘅肥肉，通常用於女性；源於揮手道別嘅時候，上臂肥肉隨之晃動（量詞：嚿） (the fat surrounding triceps in the upper limb, especially for females; literally: bye bye meat)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 集體用#迴避、#冷落 及#拒絕 等行為去#抵制、#排斥 人。被杯葛嘅人通常都係唔受人歡迎或者做咗衰嘢。（音譯自英文 Boycott，來源於1880年北愛爾蘭一個惡死收租佬 Charles Cunningham Boycott，響失收之時仍然壓迫佃農，於是引起愛爾蘭人群起用抵制方式反抗，並成功將佢趕離社區。後人就用 Boycott 呢個名去代表抵制排斥嘅行動。） (to boycott)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 班同事唔滿意佢成日擦波士鞋，所以杯葛佢。
examples.jyutping: baan1 tung4 si6 m4 mun5 ji3 keoi5 seng4 jat6 caat3 bo1 si2 haai4, so2 ji5 bui1 got3 keoi5.
examples.translation: Her colleagues disliked how she kisses her boss' ass, so they boycotted her.

senses.definition: 估唔到、冇預計會嚟嘅人（量詞：個） (an uninvited guest; a gatecrasher)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一啲用嚟包紮傷口嘅醫療用品（量詞：條） (bandage)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 縛一條繃帶
examples.translation: to wrap with a bandage

senses.definition: 搶先喺人哋坐低之前，宣示對張檯／個位嘅主權，以確保自己有位坐。通常啲人霸位，會擺個袋係個位上面，話俾人知有人用；或者會有個人坐喺度幫其他人霸位。 (to take a seat before somebody else does, usually by putting something on a public seat to indicate somebody is sitting there, or have an actual person sitting there and waiting for the others)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 圖書館張張檯都擺晒袋霸位但又冇人坐，我真係好躁。
examples.jyutping: tou4 syu1 gun2 zoeng1 zoeng1 toi2 dou1 baai2 saai3 doi2 baa3 wai2 daan6 jau6 mou5 jan4 co5, ngo5 zan1 hai6 hou2 cou3.
examples.translation: The seats are all occupied by bags in the library, but nobody is actually sitting there, it's really pissing me off.

senses.definition: 勢力大，大佬，蝦蝦霸霸，用武力或權勢騎住人哋，君王 (bully; overlord; despot; ruler)
senses.label: 語素

examples.text: 惡霸
examples.jyutping: ok3 baa3
examples.translation: bully

senses.definition: 個天有光嘅時間 (daytime)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢白天先嚟瞓覺。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 baak6 tin1 sin1 lai4 fan3 gaau3.
examples.translation: He only sleeps during daytime.

senses.definition: 形容啲建築物冧落嚟 ((of structures) to collapse; to cave in; to fall in)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 個工程師認為呢個屋頂會隨時崩塌。
examples.jyutping: go3 gung1 cing4 si1 jing6 wai4 ni1 go3 uk1 deng2 wui5 ceoi4 si4 bang1 taap3.

senses.definition: #球 狀物體；#圓 嘅立體物體（量詞：個） (a ball; a spherical object)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 個發射站成個波咁，喺山上面碌落嚟咁點算。
examples.jyutping: go3 faat3 se6 zaam6 seng4 go3 bo1 gam2, hai2 saan1 soeng6 min6 luk1 lok6 lai4 gam2 dim2 syun3.
examples.translation: The transmission station is just like a ball! What if it rolls down the hill?

senses.definition: 球類運動；配上動詞就可以指明係邊一種 (a generic term for ball games; collocations can be formed with different verbs to indicate the precise type of ball game being mentioned)

examples.text: #打波
examples.jyutping: daa2 bo1
examples.translation: to play basketball / volleyball / badminton / tennis / etc.

senses.definition: 汽車變速箱嘅俗稱 ((of vehicles) gearbox; transmission)

examples.text: 我考到#棍波 車牌，而家棍波同#自動波 都揸得。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 haau2 dou2 gwan3 bo1 ce1 paai4, ji4 gaa1 gwan3 bo1 tung4 zi6 dung6 bo1 dou1 zaa1 dak1.
examples.translation: I passed the driving exam and got a manual-gear licence. Now I can drive either manual-gear or auto-gear cars.

senses.definition: #風球，亦即香港天文台發出嘅颱風信號（熱帶氣旋警告信號）；源於以前天文台係用氣球嚟標示風球強度 (typhoon signal (aka. tropical cyclone warning) issued by the Hong Kong Observatory)

examples.jyutping: lok6 bo1
examples.translation: to cancel a typhoon warning signal

senses.definition: #乳房（#胸）嘅俗稱（量詞：對／個） (boobs)

examples.text: #肥仔波
examples.jyutping: fei4 zai2 bo1
examples.translation: man boobs

senses.definition: 水因為引力、湧流或者風力振盪而產生嘅起伏現象 ((of water) waves; ripples)

examples.text: #波浪

senses.definition: 一種物理現象，通常由物質來來回回咁震動而形成，可以傳送能量、訊息等等 ((physics) wave)

examples.text: #波長
examples.jyutping: bo1 coeng4
examples.translation: wavelength

senses.definition: 接受並寬容人哋嘅過失 (to pardon; to condone and accept)

senses.definition: 用嚟包住禮物或貨品嘅嘢，通常係紙造嘅 (package; wrappings, usually made of paper)

examples.jyutping: di1 kuk1 kei4 beng2 cyun4 bou6 dou1 jung6 bou3 zi2 baau1 zong1 laa1.
examples.translation: Wrap the cookies with newspaper.

senses.definition: 必要嘅嘢；冇咗佢好唔掂嘅嘢（量詞：樣／件） (necessity; essential item)

senses.definition: 國家名；位於#中東，臨近波斯灣；全名叫巴林王國；首都係麥納麥 (Bahrain; Mamlakat al-Baḥrayn)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 有血緣關係嘅#家姐 (elder sister with blood relation; biological sister)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢胞姊依家住喺英國。
examples.translation: His elder sister is currently living in the UK.

senses.definition: 特別關心啲同自己無關嘅野嘅女仔；鐘意四處打聽野嘅女仔 (nosy girl; gossip girl)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你問咁多做咩啫，都唔關你事，正一八卦妹嚟。
examples.jyutping: nei5 man6 gam3 do1 zou6 me1 ze1, dou1 m4 gwaan1 nei5 si6, zing3 jat1 baat3 gwaa3 mui1 lai4.

senses.definition: 表示一樣嘢、一件事嘅缺失或者問題所在 (but, with the meaning of "unfortunately", the following phrase usually describes the cause or problem; used to indicate a critical problem that negates the positive aspects of the subject)
senses.label: 連詞

examples.text: 佢好努力，又上進，弊在成日得罪人，所以冇得升職。
examples.translation: He is hardworking and diligent, unfortunately, he often offends people, so he never gets a promotion.

senses.definition: 多到數唔晒 (too numerous to mention individually; too many to enumerate one by one)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 種種問題，真係不勝枚舉啊！
examples.jyutping: zung2 zung2 man6 tai4, zan1 hai6 bat1 sing1 mui4 geoi2 aa3!
examples.translation: The issues that we face is really too numerous to mention!

senses.definition: 借助超自然力量預測 (to divine)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: #占卜
examples.jyutping: zim1 buk1
examples.translation: to practise divination; to divine

examples.translation: It is better not to play "the pen fairy" without concern that it is really dangerous.

senses.definition: 一種食得嘅菌類，原產於東亞及非洲，能夠抵受高温 (abalone mushroom; oyster mushroom)

senses.definition: 指塊面兩側近耳仔嘅頭髮 (sideburns)

examples.text: #兩鬢
examples.jyutping: loeng5 ban3

examples.text: #跛手太監
examples.jyutping: bai1 sau2 taai3 gaam3

senses.definition: 因為腳患或者受傷而行唔到路，或者行路嗰陣有隻腳唔可以靈活運動，保持唔到平衡，或者行到趷吓趷吓 (to be lame; to be crippled; to limp; to have difficulties balancing oneself when one walks)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 跛佬
examples.jyutping: bai1 lou2
examples.translation: crippled person

senses.definition: 因為腳患或者受傷而行唔到路，或者行路嗰陣有隻腳唔可以靈活運動，保持唔到平衡，或者行到趷吓趷吓 (to be lame; to be crippled; to limp; to have difficulties balancing oneself when one walks)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢跛咗一隻腳。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 bai1 zo2 jat1 zek3 goek3.
examples.translation: She is lame in one leg.

senses.definition: 指一個人喺某事件上，或經常噉唔肯負起應有嘅 #責任 (irresponsible)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 聽日就係deadline喇。啲嘢未做晒，你就話請半日假聽音樂會，你知唔知你噉做好不負責任啊？
examples.jyutping: ting1 jat6 zau6 hai6 det1 laai1 laa3. di1 je5 mei6 zou6 saai3, nei5 zau6 waa6 ceng2 bun3 jat6 gaa3 teng1 jam1 ngok6 wui2, nei5 zi1 m4 zi1 nei5 gam2 zou6 hou2 bat1 fu6 zaak3 jam6 aa3?
examples.translation: Tomorrow is the deadline. The stuff has not been finished yet, but you are about to take half-day leave for going to a concert. Do you know you are irresponsible?

senses.definition: 報告數量或者次序 (to state the amount or sequence)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: #報大數
examples.jyutping: bou3 daai6 sou3
examples.translation: to overstate an amount

senses.definition: 宗教人士對#離教 嘅貶稱，指#叛離#信仰 (to apostatise)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 步行距離或者時間 (walking distance or time)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 由呢度行去火車站需要五分鐘步程。
examples.jyutping: jau4 ni1 dou6 haang4 heoi3 fo2 ce1 zaam6 seoi1 jiu3 ng5 fan1 zung1 bou6 cing4.
examples.translation: It takes five minutes to walk from here to the railway station.

senses.definition: 講#排場，追求 #門面 嘢，不切實際 (to keep up appearances; to appear grand)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢請十個保鏢都係擺門面啫。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 ceng2 sap6 go3 bou2 biu1 dou1 hai6 baai2 mun4 min6 ze1.
examples.translation: He employed ten bodyguards just for keeping up appearances.

senses.definition: 指人或事物被主流社會所忽視或排擠 (to marginalize)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 政府一直都有推行種族共融計劃，避免少數族裔被邊緣化。
examples.jyutping: zing3 fu2 jat1 zik6 dou1 jau5 teoi1 hang4 zung2 zuk6 gung6 jung4 gai3 waak6, bei6 min5 siu2 sou3 zuk6 jeoi6 bei6 bin1 jyun4 faa3
examples.translation: The government has implemented many racial inclusion schemes to avoid ethnic minorities being marginalized.

senses.definition: 經過其他人多番批評同磨練，然後成為一個有能力嘅人 (becoming a better person through harsh criticism from others)
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: 空氣唔正常噉積聚喺肺同胸壁之間嘅胸膜腔，會造成心口痛同呼吸困難；醫學上稱為#氣胸 (pneumothorax)

examples.text: 我細佬呢排係噉爆肺入醫院，最後要#黐肺。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 sai3 lou2 nei1 paai4 hai6 gam2 baau3 fai3 jap6 ji1 jyun2, zeoi3 hau6 jiu3 ci1 fai3.
examples.translation: These days my brother repeatedly had pneumothorax and needed to admit to the hospital. Finally he had to undergo pleurodesis.

senses.definition: 啲血不停咁流，止唔到血，尤其是喺頭部，就好似水缸爆開咗，啲水不斷流出嚟咁 (to bleed profusely, especially from a head wound; literally: explode tank)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我一嚟就見到佢喺地下爆嗮缸，即刻送佢去急症室。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 jat1 lai4 zau6 gin3 dou2 keoi5 hai2 dei6 haa2 baau3 saai3 gong1, zik1 kaak1 sung3 keoi5 heoi3 gap1 zing3 sat1.
examples.translation: I came and just saw him on the floor, blood oozing non-stop from his head. I sent him to the emergency room right away.

senses.definition: 血管爆裂，尤其係指腦裏面嘅血管 (rupture of blood vessels, especially when causing a haemorrhagic stroke)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢上個月爆血管入咗院喎，唔知搞成點呢？
examples.jyutping: keoi5 soeng6 go3 jyut6 baau3 hyut3 gun2 jap6 zo2 jyun2 wo3, m4 zi1 gaau2 seng4 dim2 le1?
examples.translation: He was admitted to hospital last month for a stroke. How has he been?

senses.definition: 指一個人好嬲，誇張到好似血壓高到會血管爆裂噉 (to be extremely angry and irritated, used as a hyperbole)

examples.text: 嬲到爆血管
examples.jyutping: nau1 dou3 baau3 hyut3 gun2
examples.translation: to be so angry as if the blood vessels would rupture

senses.definition: 乾嘅#鮑魚 (dried abalone)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 蠔皇花菇扣鮑甫
examples.jyutping: hou4 wong4 faa1 gu1 kau3 baau1 pou
examples.translation: braised abalone slices with Chinese mushroom in oyster sauce

senses.definition: 指#囚犯 基於特定嘅健康理由，獲准出外治療 (medical parole)
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: 又叫後灰質柱，係#脊髓 嘅一部分，係三條灰質柱之一 ((anat.) dorsal horn; posterior grey column)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 中藥名，即係#黃芪，作用主要係補氣、止汗、利尿 (Huangqi; Astragali radix)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 行路入去 (to walk into; to go on foot)

examples.jyutping: bou6 jap6 wui2 coeng4

senses.definition: 引申指到達某個階段、方向 (figuratively, to reach a certain stage)

senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 「白表居屋第二市場計劃」嘅簡稱，指房委會推行合資格人士毋須補地價購買居屋嘅計劃 (White Form Secondary Market Scheme)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #清 代末年（1900年）由八個國家為鎮壓#義和團 而組成嘅聯軍，八國分別係#日本、#俄國、#英國、#法國、#美國、#德國、#奧匈帝國 同#意大利 (Eight-Nation Alliance, the coalition formed to quell the Boxer Rebellion)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 去令某種情況唔好發生 (to avoid; to prevent something from happening)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 避免出錯
examples.jyutping: bei6 min5 ceot1 co3
examples.translation: to avoid mistakes

senses.definition: #鼻哥窿 入面啲#毛（量詞：條） (nasal hair; nose hair)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 掹鼻毛
examples.jyutping: mang1 bei6 mou4
examples.translation: to pull out nasal hair

senses.definition: 英格蘭足球聯賽球隊阿仙奴嘅花名；係球隊英文名 arsenal 嘅意譯 (the nickname of the Arsenal Football Club)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 特指用錢換取物件、服務或者權利 (to pay; to give money)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你未畀錢我。
examples.jyutping: nei5 mei6 bei2 cin2 ngo5.
examples.translation: You haven't paid me yet.

senses.definition: 對兩樣嘢同樣重視 (to place equal emphasis on; to pay equal attention to)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 香港小姐選舉嘅宗旨係「美貌與智慧並重」。
examples.translation: The aim of the election of Miss Hong Kong is "emphasis on both beauty and wisdom".

senses.definition: 一端接有手柄嘅繩狀物，專用嚟打人或者動物（量詞：條） (whip; a length of cord which has a handle attached on one end, which people use to beat a person or an animal.)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 俾人用鞭打咁痛，我想像唔到點會有快感。
examples.jyutping: bei2 jan4 jung6 bin1 daa2 gam3 tung3, ngo5 soeng2 zoeng6 m4 dou2 dim2 wui5 jau5 faai3 gam2.
examples.translation: It hurts to get beaten with a whip, I can barely imagine how that could be pleasurable.

senses.definition: 作為補品或食材用嘅雄性動物生殖器官 (the genitals of male animals used as ingredient in food or folk medicine)

examples.text: 牛鞭
examples.jyutping: ngau4 bin1
examples.translation: cow penis

senses.definition: 揸住條繩或者鞭大力揮動，快速打落另一樣嘢上面 (to whip; to lash)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 賽馬嘅時候，騎師成日要鞭隻馬。
examples.jyutping: coi3 maa5 ge3 si4 hau6, ke4 si1 seng4 jat6 jiu3 bin1 zek3 maa5.
examples.translation: In horse racing, the jockeys often whip the horse.

senses.definition: 開車開得好快, 特別係非法賽車個陣 (to drive very quickly, especially for illegal street racing)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 明確咁表達自己嘅立場、態度、心意等等 (indication or expression of stance, feelings, etc.)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 專門指對鍾意嘅人送禮物、表白、求婚呢類行為 (more specifically, the show of affection to a person one loves (by sending gifts, asking one out, proposing, etc.))

examples.text: 有咩表示先？
examples.jyutping: jau5 me1 biu2 si6 sin1?
examples.translation: What do you have to "show your affection"?

senses.definition: #燒烤、#燒嘢食 (barbecue; in Hong Kong, unlike typical Western barbecues, everyone gathers around the fire and cooks their own food, so the atmosphere is closer to that of a fondue or a hot pot)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 不如我哋去BBQ吖！
examples.jyutping: bat1 jyu4 ngo5 dei6 heoi3 bi1 bi1 kiu1 aa1!
examples.translation: Let's have a barbecue!

senses.definition: 一種 #藍色，好似 #藍寶石 噉樣嘅顏色 (sapphire blue; navy blue)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一種蛀食木材嘅白色昆蟲（量詞：隻） (termite; a kind of white insect that eats wood)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 統稱一啲薄身，用麪粉製成嘅麪食。薄餅有好多種類，其中比較出名嘅係意大利薄餅，同埋 #印度薄餅（量詞:塊/件/個） (pizza; pancake; flatbread; naan)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 以演講、對話等方式，去傳揚基督教裏面嘅道理 (to conduct a sermon; to evangelise)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佈道會
examples.jyutping: bou3 dou6 wui2
examples.translation: evangelistic service

senses.definition: 西洋梨，生果嘅一種，果型呈黃、綠、啡色嘅葫蘆狀，食落清甜多汁（量詞：個／隻） ((English loan) pear)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 放喺枱面，俾人放隻杯上去嘅墊（量詞：個） ((beverage) coaster)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 即係#避孕套 (condom; see #避孕套 for details)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: （政府機關）發出，公佈 ((governmental agency) to issue; to promulgate)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 頒佈法令
examples.jyutping: baan1 bou3 faat3 ling6
examples.translation: to issue a decree

senses.definition: 一種足部畸形，指足部冇正常嘅弓形而變得平坦，長遠會造成行路容易痛同疲勞 (flat feet; pes planus)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 好多小朋友有扁平足，通常等到足弓發育完就冇事㗎喇。
examples.jyutping: hou2 do1 siu2 pang4 jau5 jau5 bin2 ping4 zuk1, tung1 soeng4 dang2 dou3 zuk1 gung1 faat3 juk6 jyun4 zau6 mou5 si6 gaa3 laa3.
examples.translation: Many children have flat feet, but the condition usually resolves after the foot arch finishes developing.

senses.definition: 「唔喇」嘅書面語直譯，用嚟答人唔想要一啲嘢 (to be reluctant; to nope out of something)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 呢間茶記咁難食，不了。
examples.jyutping: ni1 gaan1 caa4 gei3 gam3 naan4 sik6, bat1 liu5.
examples.translation: The food here is disgusting. I will not eat here any more.

senses.definition: 形容偉大嘅成就流傳萬世 ((of accomplishments) eternal; great; amazing)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 嗰個將軍嘅戰績好彪炳。
examples.jyutping: go2 go3 zoeng1 gwan1 ge3 zin3 zik1 hou2 biu1 bing2.
examples.translation: The general's record is immaculate.

senses.definition: 古中國神話傳説及道教中嘅八位神仙：漢鍾離、張果老、韓湘子、鐵拐李、曹國舅、呂洞賓、藍采和、何仙姑 (Eight Immortals)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 城市名；#捷克 嘅首都及最大城市 (Prague)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 比喻嚴重嘅長期疾病 (severe chronic disease; literally: disease devil)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢晚年飽受病魔纏身，又冇仔女照顧，非常淒涼。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 maan5 nin4 baau2 sau6 beng6 mo1 cin4 san1, jau6 mou5 zai2 neoi2 ziu3 gu3, fei1 soeng4 cai1 loeng4
examples.translation: She suffered from severe illness in her late years, she does not have any children taking care of her either, she was very miserable.

senses.definition: 警方設置嘅固定式快相機（量詞：個） (the fixed type of speeding camera installed on road side; literally "dove cage")
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 上水嗰邊有兩個白鴿籠，記得收慢。
examples.jyutping: soeng6 seoi2 go2 bin1 jau5 loeng5 go3 baak6 gaap3 lung2, gei3 dak1 sau1 maan6.
examples.translation: There are two speeding cameras in Sheung Shui, remember to slow down.

senses.definition: 用嚟強調件事會由自己一個人負責，亦都一定搞得掂，叫人唔使擔心 (used to assure the interlocutor that the speaker will be solely responsible for something, and will surely accomplish it)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 唔使驚，包喺我身上。
examples.jyutping: m4 sai2 geng1, baau1 hai2 ngo5 san1 soeng6.
examples.translation: Don't worry. Just leave it all to me.

senses.definition: 一大嚿由#冰川、冰架等脱離出嚟，喺開放嘅水域（通常係#海）漂浮嘅#冰（量詞：座） (iceberg)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #黑白無常 入面白面白袍嗰個 (the one with a white face in a white robe among #黑白無常)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 地方名；係#印尼 嘅一個省份，亦都係旅遊名勝 (Bali)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 長期保存並且研究生物、天然或者人造物品，陳列出嚟加深受眾認識嘅場所，可以分為 #藝術、#歷史、#科學 等性質（量詞：間／座） (museum)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #電容器#壞 咗 (capacitor burnt out)

senses.definition: 鈕扣形狀或者扁平圓柱狀小型電池嘅俗稱，電池容量同功率都比較細（量詞：粒） (button cell; literally: biscuit cell)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 網絡上寫日誌、文章嘅平台（量詞：個） (blog)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 寫博客
examples.jyutping: se2 bok3 haak3
examples.translation: to write a blog

senses.definition: 將個樣本用藥水處理 (chemical sample preparation and digestion)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 間實驗室一日煲幾百個辦再出數。
examples.jyutping: gaan1 sat6 jim6 sat1 jat1 jat6 bou1 gei2 baak3 go3 baan2 zoi3 ceot1 sou3.

senses.definition: 好天出現嘅白色嘅#雲（量詞：朵／嚿） (white cloud)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 天空飄過幾朵白雲。
examples.jyutping: tin1 hung1 piu1 gwo3 gei2 do2 baak6 wan4.
examples.translation: Several clusters of white clouds drift across the sky.

senses.definition: 一種冷盤點心；將雞腳淥熟，瓊乾攤凍之後浸喺醋汁度醃（量詞：隻） (cold chicken feet in vinegar sauce)

senses.definition: 使用於一種被動式動詞謂語句，句中嘅主語係受事者 (used in passive verb structures in which the subject is the patient of the action)
senses.label: 介詞

examples.text: 受害人被鞭打至死。
examples.jyutping: sau6 hoi6 jan4 bei6 bin1 daa2 zi3 sei2.
examples.translation: The victim was whipped to death.

senses.definition: 配合一啲只能夠主動嘅動詞，以作反諷 (used with active verbs as irony)

examples.text: 被自殺
examples.jyutping: bei6 zi6 saat3
examples.translation: to "be suicided"; to be the victim of a suicide-looking homicide

senses.definition: 位於#巴拿馬 嘅一條#運河，連接#大西洋 同#太平洋 (Panama Canal)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 城市名；位於#伊拉克 中部，係#首都 兼巴格達省首府，亦係伊拉克最大嘅城市 (Baghdad)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 出力同其他人比試 (to strive against another or others)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 香港隊同韓國隊將會喺決賽中比拼，爭奪冠軍。
examples.jyutping: hoeng1 gong2 deoi2 tung4 hon4 gwok3 deoi2 zoeng1 wui5 hai2 kyut3 coi3 zung1 bei2 ping3, zang1 dyut6 gun3 gwan1.
examples.translation: Hong Kong team will strive against South Korea team in the final to obtain the champion.

senses.definition: 用一啲材料，例如膠、布，或者係紙，包裹起書本嘅表面，目的係保護本書 (to wrap book covers for protection)
