examples.text: #包書膠
examples.jyutping: baau1 syu1 gaau1

senses.definition: 潮濕蟲，又稱 #牆蝨 或 #書蝨；一種喺潮濕、有霉菌嘅環境入面滋生嘅昆蟲（量詞：隻） (booklice)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一項室內球類運動；玩家有兩至四個人，要用球拍將波打到場內天花板以外嘅牆上面再落地，令到對方冇辦法喺粒波彈跳一次之後回擊，就為之贏（量詞：場） (squash)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 打壁球
examples.jyutping: daa2 bik1 kau4
examples.translation: to play squash

senses.definition: 打壁球用嘅波；用橡膠製成，空心而有彈性（量詞：個） (squash ball)
#區分 (to distinguish; to differentiate)
senses.label: 語素

examples.text: #辨認
examples.translation: to identify; to recognise

senses.definition: #巴打 同#絲打 嘅合稱 ("bros and sis" (an address among netizens))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 多謝各位巴絲支持！
examples.jyutping: do1 ze6 gok3 wai2 baa1 si1 zi1 ci4!
examples.translation: Thanks for all your support, bros and sis!

senses.definition: 特別#聰明；多數用嚟形容年輕女性 ((of young females) clever; smart)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 姑娘冰雪聰明，一定有好多追求者。
examples.jyutping: gu1 noeng4 bing1 syut3 cung1 ming4, jat1 ding6 jau5 hou2 do1 zeoi1 kau4 ze2.
examples.translation: (To a young lady) How clever you are. You must have many adorers.

senses.definition: 講道理，只要犯咗錯就算係親人朋友都無情講 (referring to someone who is righteous and not tolerant of mistakes committed by other people(even his/ her friends or relatives))
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 認理不認人，幫理不幫親。
examples.jyutping: jing6 lei5 bat1 jing6 jan4, bong1 lei5 bat1 bong1 can1.
examples.translation: To recognize and apply moral standards is better than to identify and help who makes mistakes.

senses.definition: #新加坡 嚟嘅後生女性（量詞：個） (a girl or young woman from Singapore)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 唔埋怨或者嫌辛勞，盡心盡力咁做嘢 (to spare no effort)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 義工不辭勞苦咁幫災民重建家園。
examples.jyutping: ji6 gung1 bat1 ci4 lou4 fu2 gam2 bong1 zoi1 man4 cung4 gin3 gaa1 jyun4.
examples.translation: The volunteers spared no effort to rebuild homes for the victims.

senses.definition: 引申做#分頭行事，各自努力完成目標 (to separate and go in different directions; literally: army split up on two different roads)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 我哋不如兵分兩路：你哋去買禮物，我哋就去攞生日蛋糕。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 bat1 jyu4 bing1 fan1 loeng5 lou6: nei5 dei6 heoi3 maai5 lai5 mat6, ngo5 dei6 zau6 heoi3 lo2 saang1 jat6 daan6 gou1.
examples.translation: Why don't we split up and do different things - you go and buy the gift and we'll get the birthday cake.

senses.definition: 由#北面 吹嚟嘅#風（量詞：陣／股） (northern wind)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 天文台話呢兩個禮拜會吹北風，所以會開始凍。
examples.jyutping: tin1 man4 toi4 waa6 nei1 loeng5 go3 lai5 baai3 wui5 ceoi1 bak1 fung1, so2 ji5 wui5 hoi1 ci2 dung3.
examples.translation: The Observatory says there'll be north wind in the coming two weeks, so it'll start to get colder.

senses.definition: 天晴之時嘅#驟雨（量詞：場／陣） (sun-shower; literally: trespassing rain)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 今朝落咗場白撞雨。
examples.jyutping: gam1 ziu1 lok6 zo2 coeng4 baak6 zong6 jyu5.
examples.translation: This morning a sun-shower fell.

senses.definition: 上車後先至買車票或者補返差額 (to buy a ticket or pay back the missing fare after getting on a vehicle)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 張飛買錯咗，要去詢問處補飛先得。
examples.jyutping: zoeng1 fei1 maai5 co3 zo2, jiu3 heoi3 seon1 man6 cyu5 bou2 fei1 sin1 dak1.
examples.translation: If one made a mistake in buying the single ride ticket, one must visit the service counter to make up the extra fee.

senses.definition: 程度唔夠，要做多一次#補救 (to redo something since its earlier attempt is not good enough)

examples.text: 上次染髮染得唔夠色，要補多次飛。
examples.jyutping: soeng6 ci3 jim5 faat3 jim5 dak1 m4 gau3 sik1, jiu3 bou2 do1 ci3 fei1.
examples.translation: The color didn't quite stick last time I dye my hair and has to be done again.

senses.definition: #癌症 藥物嘅一種，原理係干擾涉及癌細胞生長同存活嘅特定分子；因為一般比傳統#化療 有針對性，所以噉樣叫法（量詞：隻／種） (targeted therapy)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 老竇腸癌隻標靶藥一個月成二萬蚊，有冇得申請資助？
examples.jyutping: lou5 dau6 coeng2 ngaam4 zek3 biu1 baa2 joek6 jat1 go3 jyut6 sing4 ji6 maan6 man1, jau5 mou5 dak1 san1 cing2 zi1 zo6?
examples.translation: The targeted therapy for my father's colon cancer costs $20,000 a month. Is there any subsidy available?

senses.definition: #新加坡 嘅貨幣 (Singapore dollar)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 揸住繩狀物嘅一端，大力揮動以令繩嘅另一端可以快速打落某人或物上，從而令佢感到痛楚。 (to whip; to lash; to flog; to grab one end of a cord and wave forcefully, that the other end of the cord could hit someone or something in a high speed to make it feel pain.)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 以前嘅奴隸，做錯事就會被主人鞭打。
examples.translation: In the old times, the slaves would be whipped by the masters if they did anything wrong.

senses.definition: 宗教人士對前教徒、離教者嘅貶稱，指叛離信仰嘅人（量詞：個） (apostate; recreant)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 引申指做事小心謹慎，有防備 (to take precautions at every step; to act cautiously)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 想贏呢盤棋，一定要步步為營。
examples.jyutping: soeng2 jeng4 ni1 pun4 kei2, jat1 ding6 jiu3 bou6 bou6 wai4 jing4.
examples.translation: If you want to win this chess-game, every step has to be planned carefully.

senses.definition: 將石碑上面嘅雕文記錄低嘅文本同#書法，以作鑑賞或者#臨摹 (copied scripts from a stone tablet, as an artwork or a model for calligraphy)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 專登討好人，奉承人，擦鞋 (to curry favour with; to fawn on; to flatter)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢全靠巴結上司先至升到而家呢個位咋。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 cyun4 kaau3 baa1 git3 soeng6 si1 sin1 zi3 sing1 dou3 ji4 gaa1 ni1 go3 wai2 zaa3.
examples.translation: He rose to the current position by flattering the boss.

senses.definition: 用滾水或者滾湯將生嘅食物煮熟 (to cook by immersing in boiling water for a short period of time; blanched)
senses.label: 區別詞

examples.text: 白灼蝦
examples.jyutping: baak6 coek3 haa1
examples.translation: boiled shrimps

senses.definition: 一個人嘅言論或者行動另有企圖或者目的 (with a hidden agenda or an ulterior motive)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢咁做一定別有用心。

It contains no pineapple.)

senses.definition: 啓動電腦或者其它電子儀器，多數用於開機後要運行一段時間先至用得嘅機 (to turn on, to boot up a computer or gadget, mostly for the machines that need some running time after switch on before it can be used)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 部機好似有啲問題喎，淨係boot機都用咗十幾分鐘
examples.translation: The machine seems a bit abnormal, it used over 10 mins just for booting up

senses.definition: 運用器械開啓聲音、動畫、影片檔案又或者轉達他方嘅即時實境，令到有聲音或者畫面喺此地出現 (to play an audio, animation or video; to broadcast)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 播片
examples.jyutping: bo3 pin2
examples.translation: to play a (video) clip

senses.definition: 水邊 (bank of water; beach; shore)
senses.label: 語素

examples.text: #海濱
examples.translation: seashore

senses.definition: 因為有人做啲暴力同犯法嘅事而發生嘅混亂。 (riot)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 平息暴亂
examples.jyutping: ping4 sik1 bou6 lyun6
examples.translation: to put down a riot

senses.definition: 長期儲存冰塊嘅建築物（量詞：座） (ice house)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 古時冇冷氣，都係靠冰窖降温。
examples.jyutping: gu2 si4 mou5 laang5 hei3, dou1 hai6 kaau3 bing1 gaau3 gong3 wan1.
examples.translation: There were no air conditioners in the ancient time. Ice houses were deployed for cooling.

senses.definition: #暖壺；#暖水壺；#熱水壺（量詞：個） (thermos bottle)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 北美華人（尤其温哥華）對於#西蘭花 嘅另一個稱呼 (Phonetic translation of broccoli, used among ethnic Chinese in North America (especially in Vancouver) alongside with #西蘭花)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一種喺辦公室、學校同埋職場嘅政治行為，通常牽涉到人士同利益競爭 (workplace politics)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢個辦公室入面好多人講八卦搞辦公室政治㗎，小心啲。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 baan6 gung1 sat1 jap6 min6 hou2 do1 jan4 gong2 baat3 gwaa3 gaau2 baan6 gung1 sat1 zing3 zi6 gaa3, siu2 sam1 di1.
examples.translation: Many people in this office would gossip and play workplace politics, watch out.

senses.definition: 配以蒜頭、洋葱、蘑菇、蕃茄、橄欖油同香草烹調嘅方式 (Provençal; Provençale; cooked with garlic, onion, mushrooms, tomato, olive oil, and herbs)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 寶雲酥羊架
examples.jyutping: bou2 wan4 sou1 joeng4 gaa2
examples.translation: Lamb Rack Provencal

senses.definition: 納税人利用税法上嘅漏洞或税法允許嘅辦法，去減低本來應該要課嘅税額 (tax avoidance)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 生喺#鼻咽 ，即係鼻腔最後面，喉嚨對上嘅#癌症 。 (nasopharyngeal cancer)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 鼻咽癌因為喺華南地區好常見，所以又叫做「廣東癌」或者「廣東瘤」。
examples.translation: Nasopharyngeal cancer is most commonly seen in the Southern China area and has therefore been nicknamed as "guangdong cancer" or "guangdong tumour" in Cantonese parlance.

senses.definition: 用油炒香料（葱、蒜、薑之類） ((of spices) to quick-fry in oil)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 爆香啲葱
examples.jyutping: baau3 hoeng1 di1 cung1
examples.translation: to quick-fry green onion in oil

senses.definition: 擝走，連埋根部脱離 (to pull out; to remove)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 拔除雜草
examples.jyutping: bat6 ceoi4 zaap6 cou2
examples.translation: to remove weeds

senses.definition: 引申指完全去除，從基礎消滅；#掃除；#剷除 (figuratively, to wipe out)

examples.text: 拔除敵軍據點
examples.jyutping: bat6 ceoi4 dik6 gwan1 geoi3 dim2
examples.translation: to wipe out the enemy's stronghold

senses.definition: 喺鑊度好快咁炒起材料，增加餸菜嘅香味 (to stir-fry rapidly (on a wok to enrich the fragrance of a dish))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 葱薑爆鑊
examples.jyutping: cung1 goeng1 baau3 wok6
examples.translation: to stir-fry Chinese scallion and ginger

senses.definition: 發生#事故 或者#問題；#出事 ((of accidents or problems) to happen; to occur; to take place)

examples.text: 今日公司爆鑊，成個系統冧咗，今晚返唔到屋企食飯喇。
examples.jyutping: gam1 jat6 gung1 si1 baau3 wok6, seng4 go3 hai6 tung2 lam3 zo2, gam1 maan1 faan1 m4 dou2 uk1 kei2 sik6 faan6 laa3.
examples.translation: There's been a major system outage at my company today; I can't return for dinner.

senses.definition: 揭露問題（#篤爆#大鑊） (to expose a scandal; to be whistleblower (against a problem or a person))

examples.text: 今次系統失靈，我以為#過咗海就係神仙 啦，點知畀隔籬部門爆鑊。
examples.jyutping: gam1 ci3 hai6 tung2 sat1 ling4, ngo5 ji5 wai4 gwo3 zo2 hoi2 zau6 hai6 san4 sin1 laa1, dim2 zi1 bei2 gaak3 lei4 bou6 mun4 baau3 wok6.
examples.translation: I thought I could get away with the system failure, but the problem was exposed by the department next door.

senses.definition: 特登去做一啲野或講一啲説話令人覺得你可憐，繼而對你有善意嘅態度或行動 (to gain someone's sympathy)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 你唔洗喺度博同情喇，你今次真係做錯咗。
examples.jyutping: nei5 m4 sai2 hai2 dou6 bok3 tung4 cing4 laa3, nei5 gam1 ci3 zan1 hai6 zou6 co3 zo2.
examples.translation: Don't try to gain sympathy from us. You really did something wrong this time.

senses.definition: 包裝好既冷凍劑，冷藏後通常可用於為發燒病人降温退熱或為扭傷部位鎮痛（量詞：塊／件） (ice pack; cooling pad)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 可以喺#餅店 換餅嘅憑證，通常喺喜慶日子派發（量詞：張） (cake coupon)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 通常啲人結婚會派唐餅卡俾親戚，派西餅卡俾朋友。
examples.jyutping: tung1 soeng4 di1 jan4 git3 fan1 wui5 paai3 tong4 beng2 kaat1 bei2 can1 cik1, paai3 sai1 beng2 kaat1 bei2 pang4 jau5.
examples.translation: Couples usually give Chinese cake coupons to relatives and Western cake coupons to friends.

senses.definition: 唔講唔知，唔知一件冇人講過嘅事。 (unaware of sth because it was not mentioned.)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 對他人嚟講，個人喜好係不説不知咖。
examples.translation: Your preferences will not be known if you do not tell others.

senses.definition: 一個#宋 代出名廉潔嘅官員；民間傳説同流行文化當中，為咗突顯佢鐵面無私嘅形象，好多時都會將佢嘅面部描繪成黑色，因此亦會「包青天」呢個字亦會畀人用嚟指#面部發黑，#黑口黑面 噉 (Justice Bao; a government officer in Song dynasty who was praised for justice; notable for the dark color on his face in folk stories and popular culture, and therefore used to refer to someone with a black face or who is in a bad mood)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你塊面瘀黑到包青天咁。
examples.jyutping: nei5 faai3 min6 jyu2 hak1 dou3 baau1 cing1 tin1 gam2.
examples.translation: Your bruise is dark like Justice Bao Gong.

senses.definition: 喺衣食温飽之後開始起唔應份嘅慾望；比喻慾望無止境 (those who get well-fed and well-clad think of excessive desires)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 飽暖思淫欲，飢寒起盜心。
examples.jyutping: baau2 nyun5 si1 jam4 juk6, gei1 hon4 hei2 dou6 sam1.
examples.translation: Those who get well-fed and well-clad think of excessive desires, whereas hunger and coldness breed the temptation to steal.

senses.definition: 原本係指《聖經》入面記載天使向人傳遞耶穌降生嘅喜訊；後來多指基督徒仿效呢個行為，喺平安夜時喺街上唱詩歌，同人分享聖誕節嘅喜悦 (originally refers to angels announcing the birth of Jesus Christ; nowadays usually refers to Christmas carolling)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 冇得比；其他人、事或者物都比唔上。方物指用天下萬物去#比方。用來描繪人物（尤其是女性）嘅美麗，亦可以用嚟贊美嘅事物。 (not comparable; beyond compare)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 美豔不可方物
examples.translation: nothing compares to her beauty

senses.definition: 神話小説之中，生物幻變成人；一個人轉變成另一個模樣 (to transform; to morph)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 面前隻狐狸，眨下眼變身成少女。
examples.jyutping: min6 cin4 zek3 wu4 lei2, zaam2 haa5 ngaan5 bin3 san1 sing4 siu3 neoi5.
examples.translation: The fox transformed into a girl at a blink of an eye.

senses.definition: 喺體温唔高嘅情況下出汗，原因可能係神經緊張、唔舒服或者突然受刺激 (to break out in a cold sweat)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 頭先部電影真係好恐怖，嚇到我標冷汗。
examples.jyutping: tau4 sin1 bou6 din6 jing2 zan1 hai6 hou2 hung2 bou3, haak3 dou3 ngo5 biu1 laang5 hon6.
examples.translation: That movie really creeps me out so much that I just have a cold sweat.

senses.definition: 即係#苦瓜；因為通常有番噉上下年紀嘅人先鍾意食，喻意後生仔捱唔到苦 (bitter melon; bitter gourd)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 好嘅事物喺最尾先會出現；好嘅事物通常會被隱藏，要耐心尋找先會揾到 (the best things come at the end; the best things are always hidden; literally: the treasure sinks to the bottom)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 正所謂寶物沉歸底，我就唔怕冇人要嘅。
examples.jyutping: zing3 so2 wai6 bou2 mat6 cam4 gwai1 dai2, ngo5 zau6 m4 paa3 mou5 jan4 jiu3 ge3.
examples.translation: As the saying goes, the best things are always hidden. I don't think I will die single.

senses.definition: 大型#補習社 入面好出名、好受學生歡迎、揾到好多錢嘅#補習 老師 (extremely famous, popular, and well-paid tutors working for large-scale tutorial centres; literally: tutor superstar)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 啲補習天王個個年薪過千萬，唔講得笑㗎。
examples.translation: Those top cram school tutors make more than $10 million per year. It's a serious business.

senses.definition: 叫人#加油，#鼓勵 人嘅説話 (an expression of encouragement (to somebody who is doing something challenging))
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 俾心機呀！你實得㗎！
examples.jyutping: bei2 sam1 gei1 aa3! nei5 sat6 dak1 gaa3!
examples.translation: Go for it! You can do it!

senses.definition: 喺外間揾錢返嚟；籌募資金 (to borrow money, to get hold of money; literally: to gather water)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 有好多路數，識好多唔同既人 (involved in many businesses or enterprises; having many friends; having "lots of irons in the fire"; literally, to have as many legs as a centipede)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 你有問題就揾佢啦，佢百足咁多爪，一定揾到人幫你。
examples.jyutping: nei5 jau5 man6 tai4 zau6 wan2 keoi5 laa1, keoi5 baak3 zuk1 gam3 do1 zaau2, jat1 ding6 wan2 dou2 jan4 bong1 nei5.
examples.translation: If you have any inquiry, you might ask him. He has many friends from different fields that might help you.

senses.definition: 一種遊戲；遊戲分為捉嘅一方同匿埋嘅一方；捉嗰一方會畀一段時間另一方匿埋，時間夠，佢就會開始揾啲匿埋嘅人；當揾晒匿埋嘅人，或者遊戲時間夠，噉遊戲就會終止 (hide-and-seek)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一種烹調嘅方法，用嚟炮製海鮮，做法係將蒜、葱、辣椒、豆豉等連埋海鮮一齊炒；相傳發源地係香港嘅#避風塘 (to cook seafood with Typhoon Shelter style; to stir-fry seafood with garlic, chili, black beans, etc.)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 避風塘炒蟹
examples.jyutping: bei6 fung1 tong4 caau2 haai5
examples.translation: Typhoon Shelter Crab

senses.definition: 皮膚因為天氣乾燥裂開，會甩皮、甚至會流血 (to have dry and cracked skin)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 嘩，你隻手爆拆得好勁，快啲搽啲膏啦。
examples.jyutping: waa3, nei5 zek3 sau2 baau3 caak3 dak1 hou2 ging6, faai3 di1 caa4 di1 gou1 laa1.
examples.translation: The cracked skin on your hand is getting serious. Get some ointment!

senses.definition: 五穀類食物，意大利式意粉嘅一種；因為外形似貝殼而得名；大細分為兩種，細嘅（Conchiglie）同手指頭差唔多大，用途近似#通心粉，大嘅（Conchiglioni）通常會釀啲肉餡入去 (Conchiglie; Conchiglioni)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 動物嘅生殖器（雄性#陰莖、雌性陰蒂）因為充血而膨脹撐起嘅生理現象，通常係指#扯旗；有啲人會將因為性興奮而#乳頭 突起都當做勃起 ((to have an) erection)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 一齊，一同 (to accompany)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 一陣悦耳嘅音樂伴隨佢哋出場。
examples.translation: A piece of beautiful music accompanied them when they came on the stage.

senses.definition: 人民發起嘅暴力運動，混亂而無秩序可言，一般係以暴力或破壞嘅形式出現，針對嘅目標多數係有權勢嘅人或者有錢人。 (riot; insurrection)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 如果政府加税兩成，真係暴動都似。
examples.jyutping: jyu4 gwo2 zing3 fu2 gaa1 seoi3 loeng5 sing4, zan1 hai6 bou6 dung6 dou1 ci5
examples.translation: If the government increases taxes by twenty per cent, there is a good chance it will lead to riots.

senses.definition: 減慢變凍嘅過程，保持一件物品嘅温度；通常用於食物或飲品 (to keep something warm, often referring to food or drinks)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 保温瓶
examples.jyutping: bou2 wan1 ping4
examples.translation: vacuum flask

senses.definition: #保持 體温，或 #保持 食物温度 (to keep body or food temperature)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 用嚟保護電路、防止過熱起火嘅電路部件；一旦#電流 過大，入面嘅金屬線或者片會產生高温而熔斷，導致電路開放而中斷電流（量詞：條） (fuse)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 專業保護一個人或者一啲嘢嘅人（量詞：個） (bodyguard)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 個細路有個保鑣跟住㗎！
examples.jyutping: go3 sai3 lou6 jau5 go3 bou2 biu1 gan1 zyu6 gaa3!
examples.translation: The kid has a bodyguard following him!

senses.definition: 幫某人講好説話, 為某人辯護 (saying good things for another person or arguing for another person)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 阿媽今日為阿明幫腔。
examples.jyutping: aa3 maa1 gam1 jat6 wai6 aa3 ming4 bong1 hong1.
examples.translation: Mom spoke for Ming today.

senses.definition: 將兩樣嘢連接埋一齊 (to connect; to join together)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: #駁髮
examples.jyutping: bok3 faat3
examples.translation: hair extensions

senses.definition: #反駁；對某人講嘅説話表示唔同意，再講自己嘅諗法或者唔同意嘅理由 (to refute; to talk back)

examples.text: 你點樣駁返佢啊？
examples.jyutping: nei5 dim2 joeng2 bok3 faan1 keoi5 aa3?
examples.translation: How did you refute him?

senses.definition: 通常指攝氏零度，即淡水凝固結冰所需嘅温度。 (freezing point; ice point; usually referring to zero degree celsius, which is the temperature value needed for fresh water to condense into solid ice.)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 講一啲説話去支持某個立場 (to defend; to justify)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢請咗三個律師幫佢出庭辯護。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 ceng2 zo2 saam1 go3 leot6 si1 bong1 keoi5 ceot1 ting4 bin6 wu6.
examples.translation: He employed three lawyers to defend his case in court.

senses.definition: #較量，去分出高下 (to compete)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 聽講你捉棋好叻喎，得閒揾日我哋切磋比試下哩？
examples.translation: It's said that you're really good a chess play. Let's have our little contest sometime, shall we?

senses.definition: 唔講都知，擺到明，明顯到冇必要講 (it goes without saying, it's obvious that there's no need to say it.)
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: 唔喜悦；唔gur；唔開心 (displeased, discontent)
senses.label: 形容詞

senses.definition: 同時代脱節，喺現代已經唔恰當、唔適宜 (not keeping up with the times; outdated; not suited to present needs)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 喺現代社會，盲婚啞嫁已經不合時宜。
examples.jyutping: hai2 jin6 doi6 se5 wui2, maang4 fan1 aa2 gaa3 ji5 ging1 bat1 hap6 si4 ji4.
examples.translation: In modern society, blind marriage is already outdated.

senses.definition: 抵受唔住，唔能夠承受 (cannot bear; cannot endure)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 佢講咗一啲不堪入耳嘅説話。
examples.translation: He has said something revolting (=intolerable to the ear).

senses.definition: 加喺形容詞後面，形容程度極高，令人難以忍受。 (extremely; used after an adjective, to indicate it is so intense that is intolerable.)

examples.text: 一間破爛不堪嘅舊屋
examples.translation: a dilapidated old house

senses.definition: 為某啲事而四處頻撲 (to be busy running about; to run errands)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 為咗游説選民，候選人到處奔走演説。
examples.jyutping: wai6 zo2 jau4 seoi3 syun2 man4, hau6 syun2 jan4 dou3 cyu3 ban1 zau2 jin2 syut3.
examples.translation: To persuade voters, the candidate travelled here and there to make speeches

senses.definition: 版權使用費；用某人持有版權嘅著作時，就要俾返原創人（量詞：筆） (royalty paid to writers, singers, lyricists, etc., the fee payable to the author when the copyright-protected work is used.)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 出版佢嘅小説要俾百分之十二嘅版税。
examples.jyutping: ceot1 baan2 keoi5 ge3 siu2 syut3 jiu3 bei2 baak3 fan6 zi1 sap6 ji6 ge3 baan2 seoi3.
examples.translation: Royalties are to be paid at a rate of 12% if we are going to publish his novel.

senses.definition: 人民；大眾；一般人 (people; ordinary folk; commoners; literally: (old) hundreds of surnames)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 個暴君徵好多税，搞到啲百姓苦不堪言。
examples.jyutping: go3 bou6 gwan1 zing1 hou2 do1 seoi3, gaau2 dou3 di1 baak3 sing3 fu2 bat1 ham1 jin4.
examples.translation: The tyrant imposed so many taxes, that the people are suffering miserably.

senses.definition: #農曆新年 期間去長輩或者朋友屋企探人，講一啲意頭好嘅説話去互相恭賀，一齊慶祝新年 (to visit relatives' or friends' homes in Lunar New Year, and to say auspicious greetings to each other and to celebrate the new year together)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我年初一去咗爺爺度拜年。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 nin4 co1 jat1 heoi3 zo2 je4 je2 dou6 baai3 nin4.
examples.translation: On the first day of Lunar New Year, I paid a visit to Grandpa.

senses.definition: 將自己從某人或某事中解放，撇甩佢哋 (to break away from; to free somebody from; to get rid of)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 擺脱束縛
examples.jyutping: baai2 tyut3 cuk1 bok3

senses.definition: #水母 嘅俗稱（量詞：隻） (jellyfish)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 香港交通警嘅別稱，事關佢哋以前嘅制服，手臂外面會再包一層白色衫袖，依家換咗設計之後就無咗（量詞：隻） (nickname for a traffic police officer, who used to have white sleeves, resembling jellyfish tentacles)

examples.text: 白鮓車
examples.jyutping: baak6 zaa3 ce1
examples.translation: traffic police car

senses.definition: 用嚟擺放拜神祭品嘅枱（量詞：張） (offering table; altar table)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 村民入廟拜神，將燒豬放喺拜案上面。
examples.jyutping: cyun1 man4 jap6 miu2 baai3 san4, zoeng1 siu1 zyu1 fong3 hai2 baai3 on3 soeng6 min6.
examples.translation: The villagers entered the temple, worshipped the god and put the roasted pig onto the offering table.

senses.definition: 玩球類運動嗰陣著嘅衫（量詞：件） ((of ball games) jersey; sports clothing)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你最鍾意邊隊球隊嘅波衫？
examples.jyutping: nei5 zeoi3 zung1 ji3 bin1 deoi6 kau4 deoi2 ge3 bo1 saam1?
examples.translation: Which sports team's jersey do you like the best?

senses.definition: 指#父親 嘅#表弟 (male cousin of one's father)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: （舊式）來自大陸，尤其指#官員，去香港工作嘅男人 (used to refer to a male from mainland China, especially government officer, go to work in Hong Kong)
唔平凡，唔普通，好勁，非比尋常 (distinguished; extraordinary; outstanding)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢身手不凡。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 san1 sau2 bat1 faan4.
examples.translation: He has outstanding agility.

senses.definition: 鹹水魚，係一種#鯛魚，魚身銀白色，魚鰭尖形（量詞：條） (white sea bream)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 又大而圓、鬆泡泡嘅面部（量詞：塊） (chubby face)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 好多女士都想減甩包包面，不過有啲人又覺得包包面望落都幾可愛。
examples.jyutping: hou2 do1 neoi5 si6 dou1 soeng2 gaam2 lat1 baau1 baau1 min6, bat1 gwo3 jau5 di1 jan4 jau6 gok3 dak1 baau1 baau1 min6 mong6 lok6 dou1 gei2 ho2 oi3.
examples.translation: Many ladies want to slim their chubby face, but some people rather think that chubby face looks quite cute.

senses.definition: 朝拜、供奉、祭祀祖先或神明 (to worship ancestors or gods)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 拜神
examples.jyutping: baai3 san4
examples.translation: worship the gods

senses.definition: 跪拜，用膝頭支持身體為跪，俯身為拜。用嚟表示崇敬或屈服 (to kneel, support one's body with the knees and bend forward, to express respect or submission)

examples.text: 我拜你喇，唔好收咗我間屋啊！
examples.jyutping: ngo5 baai3 nei5 laa3, m4 hou2 sau1 zo2 ngo5 gaan1 uk1 aa3!
examples.translation: I'll kneel down to you, don't take away my house!

senses.definition: 向先人表達敬意，通常會供奉同掃墓 (pay respect to ancestors or the deceased, usually by sweeping (cleaning) their grave sites and providing offerings.)

examples.text: 阿女，今年我哋幾時去拜阿公呀？
examples.jyutping: aa3 neoi2, gam1 nin2 ngo5 dei6 gei2 si4 heoi3 baai3 aa3 gung1 aa3?
examples.translation: Daughter, when are we going to visit our grandpa's grave?

senses.definition: 快速咁移動，好似隻馬咁；通常係形容一啲交通公具 (to run quickly, as if one were galloping like a horse; to run like the wind)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 架跑車喺跑道上奔馳。
examples.jyutping: gaa3 paau2 ce1 hai2 paau2 dou6 soeng6 ban1 ci4.
examples.translation: The race car ran like the wind on the runway.

senses.definition: 指一個行為完全冇用（用喺動詞短語後面，要用「嚟把托」嘅形式） (completely useless, completely pointless (the form 嚟把托 is used when placed after a verb phrase))
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 屋企咪有個囉，買個新嘅嚟把托呀？
examples.jyutping: uk1 kei2 mai6 jau5 go3 lo1, maai5 go3 san1 ge3 lai4 baa2 tok3 aa4?
examples.translation: We already have one at home. What's the point of buying a new one?

senses.definition: 重視；珍惜；睇得好重要 (to treasure; to cherish)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你咁寶貝啲高達模型就放好啲，唔好四圍擺！
examples.jyutping: nei5 gam3 bou2 bui3 di1 gou1 daat6 mou4 jing4 zau6 fong3 hou2 di1, m4 hou2 sei3 wai4 baai2!
examples.translation: If you treasure your Gundam figures so much, store them properly. Don't leave them here and there.

senses.definition: 同某個人好親密，或者對佢好重要嘅人或物件；亦可以做暱稱，只係冇其他咁常用 (dear; baby; darling; a person or a thing that is personally important to oneself; also used as an intimate address, though less commonly)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: #心肝寶貝
examples.jyutping: sam1 gon1 bou2 bui3
examples.translation: the apple of one's eye

senses.definition: 貶低並排斥、斥責某人 (to belittle, reject and condemn somebody)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 降低某人嘅官職 (to demote a government official, usually used in the context of ancient China court affairs)
#總統、#總裁 或者#會長 嘅舊稱 (president (of a country or an organization))
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #致病 嘅#原因（量詞：個） (cause of a disease; etiology)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 自閉症嘅病因依然未有確切嘅答案。
examples.jyutping: zi6 bai3 zing3 ge3 beng6 jan1 ji1 jin4 mei6 jau5 kok3 cit3 ge3 daap3 on3.
examples.translation: There is still not a definite answer for the causes of autism.

senses.definition: 頂部畀風吹到起白泡嘅海浪（量詞：陣） (breaking wave; "white horse")
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 暴雨驟至，海面又捲起白頭浪。
examples.jyutping: bou6 jyu5 zaau6 zi3, hoi2 min6 jau6 gyun2 hei2 baak6 tau4 long6.
examples.translation: The storm came abruptly while waves broke.

senses.definition: 用#膠 將一啲物品包住 (to wrap something with plastic or rubber)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 包膠啞鈴
examples.jyutping: baau1 gaau1 aa2 ling4
examples.translation: rubber coated dumbbell

senses.definition: #綁架 人質嘅匪徒（量詞：個） (kidnapper)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 個綁匪將啲人質綁起咗。
examples.jyutping: go3 bong2 fei2 zoeng1 di1 jan4 zi3 bong2 hei2 zo2.
examples.translation: The kidnapper tied the hostages up.

senses.definition: 物理嘅#波 (wave) 嘅長度 (wave-length)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一種#輔音；#口腔 嘅#氣流 通道受阻塞，氣流從而通過#鼻腔 發音（量詞：個） (nasal (consonant))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 廣府話有三個鼻音。
examples.jyutping: gwong2 fu2 waa2 jau5 saam1 go3 bei6 jam1.
examples.translation: Cantonese has three nasals.

senses.definition: 扮係弱勢，以應對對自己不利嘅情況 (to offer passive resistance; to play dead; literally: to pretend to be a dead crab)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 凶惡殘暴 (to be atrocious)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢個君主暴虐無道，自招滅亡。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 gwan1 zyu2 bou6 joek6 mou4 dou3, zi6 ziu1 mit6 mong4.
examples.translation: This tyrant is so atrocious that he is overthrown by others without any surprise.

senses.definition: 事物或者情況嘅變化轉移（量詞：個） (vicissitudes; changes)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 經過時代嘅變遷，電腦已經變得非常普及。
examples.jyutping: ging1 gwo3 si4 doi6 ge3 bin3 cin1, din6 nou5 ji5 ging1 bin3 dak1 fei1 soeng4 pou2 kap6.
examples.translation: As the ages went by, the computer became extremely common.

senses.definition: 以冰做主要材料，透過雕刻、堆砌等方式製成嘅雕塑甚至建築物，係一種藝術形式。（量詞：座） (ice sculpture; a form of art which utilizes ice as the main material to create sculptures or even architecture by carving, stacking etc.)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢係雕冰雕嘅高手。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 hai6 diu1 bing1 diu1 ge3 gou1 sau2.
examples.translation: He is master in making ice sculptures.

senses.definition: 用金錢或物質去供應對方生活所需，從而換取穩定或長期嘅性關係；可以簡稱做「包」 (to have a sugar daddy or a fancy woman; to suck on a moneybag)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢十八歲開始就俾唔同嘅男人包養。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 sap6 baat3 seoi3 hoi1 ci2 zau6 bei2 m4 tung4 ge3 naam4 jan2 baau1 joeng5.
examples.translation: She started to switch between sugar daddies since eighteen.

senses.definition: 再俾一次；漏咗冇俾而俾番 (to reissue; to issue because something should have been issued but hasn't yet)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 補發欠薪
examples.jyutping: bou2 faat3 him3 san1
examples.translation: to belatedly issue wages

senses.definition: 唔作任何評論，通常係因為唔願意、唔適合、怕尷尬、怕麻煩等等 ((to make) no comment)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 我對呢件事不予置評。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 deoi3 ni1 gin6 si6 bat1 jyu4 zi3 ping4.
examples.translation: I have no comment on the matter.

senses.definition: 一種外皮係白色嘅#苦瓜 (white bitter cucumber)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 爺爺或者公公嘅阿嫂 (wife of (either paternal or maternal) grandfather's elder brother; grand aunt)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 指皮膚或者物件表面又#白 又#滑 ((of skin or surface) white and smooth)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 白滑#豆腐花
examples.jyutping: baak6 waat6 dau6 fu6 faa1
examples.translation: white and smooth bean curd pudding

senses.definition: 削去受刑人膝頭蓋（臏骨），令佢企唔到起身嘅酷刑 (removal of the kneecaps (punishment))
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一定會經過嘅路（量詞：條） (the only way (to a location))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢條係去佢學校嘅必經之路，我哋喺度等佢啦。
examples.jyutping: ni1 tiu4 hai6 heoi3 keoi5 hok6 haau6 ge3 bit1 ging1 zi1 lou6, ngo5 dei6 hai2 dou6 dang2 keoi5 laa1.
examples.translation: This is the only way to school; let's wait for him here.

senses.definition: 一定會經歷嘅嘢（量詞：條） (something that one will certainly experience)

examples.text: 生、老、病、死係人生嘅必經之路。
examples.jyutping: sang1 lou5 beng6 sei2 hai6 jan4 sang1 ge3 bit1 ging1 zi1 lou6.
examples.translation: To be born, to age, to be sick and to die are all that humans must experience.

senses.definition: 國家名；位於東非嘅小型內陸國家，首都係基特加 (Burundi)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 擊打某人頭部以致流血 (to hit someone's head causing bleeding)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你再亂講嘢，我就扑濕你！
examples.jyutping: nei5 zoi3 lyun2 gong2 je5, ngo5 zau6 bok1 sap1 nei5!
examples.translation: If you keep talking nonsense, I will make your head bleed!

senses.definition: 畀某個數（#乘數）#乘 嘅數，即係自己重複相加若干次數嘅數（量詞：個） (multiplicand)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一種人手托得起、炮身短、射角大、彈道弧線高、以座鈑承受後座力嘅曲射火炮（量詞：座） (mortar)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 城市名；係#羅馬尼亞 嘅首都同最大城市，亦係#歐盟 第六大城市 (Bucharest)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #入樽 (slam dunk)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 通告大眾 (to announce (to the public))
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 一個做衰嘢嘅人所得到嘅懲罰；來自神嘅懲罰 (punishment one gets for doing evil things; divine retribution; bad karma)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你做埋咁多衰嘢，你因住有報應啊！
examples.jyutping: nei5 zou6 maai4 gam3 do1 seoi1 je5, nei5 jan1 zyu6 jau5 bou3 jing3 aa3!
examples.translation: You've done so many evil things; you'd better beware of karma!

senses.definition: 冇畀人邀請而自行到來 (to turn up without being invited)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 人地宴會，佢不請自來，無人理佢，唯有自己玩手機。
examples.jyutping: jan4 dei6 jin3 wui6, keoi5 bat1 cing2 zi6 loi4, mou5 jan4 lei5 keoi5, wai4 jau5 zi6 gei2 waan2 sau2 gei1
examples.translation: They threw a dinner party and he showed up without being invited. Nobody paid attention to him, so all he could do was play on his phone.

senses.definition: 即係 #背囊 (backpack)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 專指RPG遊戲玩家儲存隨身物品嘅空間 (backpack in RPG game)
得到或者承擔某個範疇嘅所有事項 (to take on the entirety of something; to undertake the whole thing)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 包攬訴訟
examples.jyutping: baau1 laam5 sou3 zung6
examples.translation: champerty

senses.definition: 排第尾 (to come last (in a race, exam, list, etc.))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: #包尾大翻
examples.translation: the person who comes last

senses.definition: 排第尾嘅人 (the person who comes last (in a race, exam, list, etc.); literally: the last coming somersault/flag/tycoon)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 成日都唔温書，梗係次次考試都做做包尾大班啦。
examples.translation: You don't do revision. Indeed you come last in every exam.

senses.definition: #台灣 嘅別名 (another name for Taiwan, literally "treasure island")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #麻風 病人嘅謔稱（量詞：個） ((jeer) leper; person afflicted with leprosy; literally: local number-one scholar)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一種女性泳裝款式。以極少嘅布料剪裁而成，遮掩到身體嘅三點重要部位。（量詞：件） (bikini)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 所做或者所諗嘅嘢都唔適用於現實嘅情況 (impractical; unrealistic)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢嘅建議不切實際，所以不獲接納。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 ge3 gin3 ji5 bat1 cit3 sat6 zai3, so2 ji5 bat1 wok6 zip3 naap6.
examples.translation: His suggestions were impractical so they were not accepted.

senses.definition: 新鮮食材喺攝氏0度至-4度儲存同運送；唔同#急凍，急凍通常需要喺攝氏-18度以下儲存 (chilled (food); "chilling" is a method to process food by keeping it at 0 to -4°C; it is different from the normal freezing process which requires at least -18°C)
senses.label: 區別詞

examples.text: 冰鮮雞
examples.jyutping: bing1 sin1 gai1
examples.translation: chilled chicken

senses.definition: 澳門人對#澳門 嘅稱呼；通常喺正式場合用 (Macao (to be said in the context of Macao in formal situations))
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 球類運動；兩隊互戰，每隊各十一人，用木板打個波入三柱門而得分 (cricket)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 打板球
examples.jyutping: daa2 baan2 kau4
examples.translation: to play cricket

senses.definition: 猛#熱頭 下照射 (to be exposed to strong sunlight)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 咁熱，咪喺室外曝曬，以免中暑。
examples.jyutping: gam3 jit6, mai5 hai2 sat1 ngoi6 bou6 saai3, ji5 min5 zung3 syu2.
examples.translation: It's so hot. Don't get exposed in strong sun outdoors, for fear of heat stroke.

senses.definition: 超出可以用錶量度嘅範圍，引申指程度極高 (unmeasurably high; extremely high)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 今日嘅空氣污染爆晒錶，大家出街要戴口罩呀。
examples.translation: Air pollution today is unmeasurably high. You should wear a mask when you go outdoors.

senses.definition: 將思想、感情、生活經歷，或者心理情緒同質素顯露出黎 (to show; to display; to behave)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢表現得好有自信。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 biu2 jin6 dak1 hou2 jau5 zi6 seon3.
examples.translation: She showed great confidence.

senses.definition: 用膊頭去承擔重量 (to carry on shoulders)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 孭書包
examples.jyutping: me1 syu1 baau1
examples.translation: to carry a schoolbag

senses.definition: 負責 (to be responsible for)

examples.text: #孭鑊
examples.jyutping: me1 wok6
examples.translation: to take the rap

senses.definition: 改變自己嘅#性別 (to change sex; to change gender)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 變性手術
examples.jyutping: bin3 sing3 sau2 seot6
examples.translation: transsexual surgery; sex reassignment surgery

senses.definition: 冇學識又冇本事 (neither learned nor talented)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 大家見到佢有幾不學無術啦。
examples.jyutping: daai6 gaa1 gin3 dou2 keoi5 jau5 gei2 bat1 hok6 mou4 seot6 laa1.
examples.translation: Now you guys see how ignorant and incompetent he is.

senses.definition: 猛烈嘅#風雪 (blizzard)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 形容建築後面有山，前面對住海；一般認為呢種地理環境屬於好嘅風水格局 (to be located on a foothill fronting the sea (considered good for feng shui))
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 天后廟坐北向南，背山面海。
examples.jyutping: tin1 hau6 miu2 zo6 bak1 hoeng3 naam4, bui3 saan1 min6 hoi2.
examples.translation: Tin Hau Temple, facing south, is located on a foothill fronting the sea.

senses.definition: 違背自己嘅承諾，唔顧道義 (to renege on one's promises and betray others' trust)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 明哥唔係背信棄義嘅人，佢一定係有苦衷㗎。
examples.jyutping: ming4 go1 m4 hai6 bui3 seon3 hei3 ji6 ge3 jan4, keoi5 jat1 ding6 hai6 jau5 fu2 cung1 gaa3.
examples.translation: Brother Ming is not a person who breaks promises and betrays others' trust. He must have his reasons.

senses.definition: 軟身嘅扁圓帽（量詞：頂） (barret; beret)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一個國家統治嘅疆域 (territory, domain, the region ruled by a regime)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 某國成日都處心積慮將某島納入自己嘅版圖。
examples.jyutping: mau5 gwok3 seng4 jat6 dou1 cyu5 sam1 zik1 leoi6 zoeng1 mau5 dou2 naap6 jap6 zi6 gei2 ge3 baan2 tou4.
examples.translation: A certain country always makes devious plans to make some island their own domain.

senses.definition: #菢 緊蛋嘅雞乸（量詞：隻） (chicken hatching eggs)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 指哺乳類動物以外，昆蟲、兩棲動物等類別嘅動物喺出生或者孵化之後，通過細胞繁殖和分化，急劇轉換形態；例如部份昆蟲，由受精卵發育起，需要經過或多或少嘅變化，經過#卵、#幼蟲、#蛹，先至變為成蟲 (to metamorphose)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 完全變態
examples.jyutping: jyun4 cyun4 bin3 taai3
examples.translation: holometabolism; complete metamorphosis

senses.definition: 形容動作、心理、言語等有別於一般正常人，含貶義 ((derog.) (used to describe a person's words, actions or mental state) abnormal; sick; perverted; crazy; mad)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 你變態㗎？俾人鬧都咁開心嘅？
examples.jyutping: nei5 bin3 taai3 gaa4? bei2 jan4 naau6 dou1 gam3 hoi1 sam1 ge2?
examples.translation: Are you crazy? Why are you so happy after being told off?

senses.definition: 多用響反問句中，用嚟質疑人哋收埋一啲無用或#唔等使 嘅嘢浪費空間，或保留一啲有用嘅嘢又唔用，造成浪費；煲醋本身係指「煲#薑醋」，專門煲俾孕婦產後補身，但煲醋用嘅大型瓦煲平時好少機會用到，留嚟都係#躉 多過用 (usually used in a rhetorical question about keeping something that is either useless, seldom used that wasting space, or holding something useful but not using it, causing a waste of the item. Originated from the over-sized ginger vinegar boiler, only useful while a family member is give birth to a baby.)

examples.text: 你連小學果陣啲手冊都唔捨得掉，留嚟煲醋咩？

senses.definition: 由大學提供嘅學士課程；高等教育嘅最基本程度；讀完之後可以得到學士學位嘅課程 (undergraduate programme)

examples.text: 去馬會落波纜
examples.translation: go to HK Jockey Club to make a bet on the soccer match

senses.definition: 一個數值，指某樣嘢嘅量達到呢個數就會滿晒（#飽和），再多就容納唔到（量詞：個） (saturation point)

senses.definition: 鍾意睇足球嘅人；足球#球迷（量詞：個） (football (soccer) fans)

全身按摩 (body massage
jpn:ボディマッサージ)

令到電話兩邊嘅人都可以同對方通話 ((also 接通 Zip3Tung1) to dial a number and be connected
!!!written)

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA

examples.jyutping: keoi5 hai6 ngo5 hai2 gung1 si1 ge3 hou2 bong1 sau2.

senses.definition: 軍隊嘅組成部分（量詞：支） (troops; forces; army)

senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我哋用乜嘢布料做窗簾好啊？
examples.translation: Which fabric should we use for the curtains?

senses.definition: 事物嘅本身。 (thing-in-itself)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 同#佼佼者 (an outstanding individual)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
未有內容 NO DATA
未有內容 NO DATA
指手腳唔靈活 (cumbersome; clumsy)
senses.label: 語素

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
未有內容 NO DATA
未有內容 NO DATA
未有內容 NO DATA
未有內容 NO DATA
未有內容 NO DATA
未有內容 NO DATA
打扮，令自己靚啲，例如化妝、著靚衫等等 (to put on make-up; to dress up; to make oneself prettier)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 女仔個個都鍾意扮靚㗎啦。
examples.jyutping: neoi5 zai2 go3 go3 dou1 zung1 ji3 baan6 leng3 gaa3 laa1.
examples.translation: Every girl loves making herself prettier.

senses.definition: 佔據（間中有指佔據過多嘅意味），據為己有唔俾人掂。 (to occupy; to take; to grasp)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢哋喺條村度霸咗塊地。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 hai2 tiu4 cyun1 dou6 baa3 zo2 faai3 dei6.
examples.translation: They've occupied a piece of land in the village.

senses.definition: 幫進行緊秘密活動嘅人睇住出面嘅形勢，以防有人嚟打亂計劃。 (to keep watch; to keep a lookout)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 個賊喺入便偷嘢嘅時候，啲同黨就喺門口把風。
examples.jyutping: go3 caak2 hai2 jap6 bin6 tau1 je5 ge3 si4 hau6, di1 tung4 dong2 zau6 hai2 mun4 hau2 baa2 fung1.
examples.translation: While the thief was stealing inside, his accomplice was keeping watch at the doorway.

senses.definition: 做出記號或者寫出文字令人知道 (to indicate clearly; to mark clearly)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢隻罐頭湯冇標明佢嘅營養成份。
examples.translation: This canned soup doesn't indicate its nutritional value.

senses.definition: 為國家作出貢獻，回報國家。 (to serve the country)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 岳飛一心報國，對金國發起猛烈進攻。
examples.translation: Yue Fei was intent on serve his country, and he launched a strong attack towards Jin.

senses.definition: 邊防檢查。一個地區為咗保安，喺邊境設立嘅防守機制，工作係檢查入境嘅人同物件，睇下有冇危險或違法。 (immigration inspection; the defensive mechanisms at the borders of a region for its security, to inspect the immigrants and their belongings to see if they are dangerous or illegal.)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 美國邊檢好嚴㗎，你最好預鬆啲時間。
examples.translation: The immigration inspection in America is really strict, you better save more time for that.

senses.definition: 背離、違反，唔再聽從本來嘅權威、組織。 (to betray; to rebel against)
senses.label: 語素

senses.definition: 用土石築成嘅小城 (castle; a building made from mud and stones)
senses.label: 語素

examples.text: 雖然我哋未必係白雪公主或者王子，不過你又有冇興趣去睇下世界上最靚嘅城堡呢？
examples.translation: Even though we may not be Snow White or Prince Charming, are you interested in seeing the most beautiful castles in the world?

senses.definition: 目標同實際做事嘅方向完全相反 (to run counter to; to run in the opposite direction)
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: 婚禮入面陪襯新娘嘅女仔，通常同新娘最親嘅叫伴娘，其他人叫「#姊妹」。（量詞：位/個） (maid of honour (of a wedding))
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 悲哀淒涼, 通常形容啲景況 (desolate)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢個國家嘅民生真係悲涼。
examples.translation: The situation of the people in this country is desolate.

senses.definition: 即係 #半路 。 (Refers to #半路 .)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 非常悲哀 (deeply grieved)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢嘅死令佢嘅朋友好悲慟
examples.translation: His friends deeply grieved his death.

senses.definition: 顯示, 標示 (to indicate, to mark)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢啲柱標注咗跑道唔同位置嘅距離。
examples.translation: These poles mark the distance between different positions on the runway.

senses.definition: 唔話係或唔係，唔表態，唔俾任何意見 (not giving an answer to a question; not saying yes or no, noncommittal)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 記者問佢係咪受咗傷，但係佢不置可否。
examples.translation: The reporters asked him whether he was injured but he remained noncommittal.

senses.definition: 唔聰明，冇智慧，愚蠢 (unwise, stupid)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 不智嘅行為
examples.translation: unwise behaviour

senses.definition: 形容地位非常低 ((of social classes) petty and low)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 出身卑微
examples.translation: to be born into a lower social status

senses.definition: 低級, 下賤, 冇品 (despicable; contemptible; dishonourable)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 卑劣嘅手段
examples.translation: a contemptible trick

senses.definition: （服務同招待）唔周到，唔夠周全，唔夠好，唔貼心 ((of services and hospitality) not satisfactory; not attentive enough)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 如有招呼不周，請向經理投訴。
examples.translation: If the service is not satisfactory, please report it to the manager.

senses.definition: （計劃）唔周全，唔夠完善，唔夠深入 ((of plans) not thorough)

examples.text: 考慮不周
examples.translation: Ill-considered

senses.definition: 唔振作，唔興旺，頹廢。 (sluggish; slump)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 關係唔和諧，大家都睇唔順眼對方，會成日鬧交或者冷戰。 (not on good terms)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢哋不和咗好耐。
examples.translation: They have not been getting along with each other for a long time.

senses.definition: 堅持，唔屈服 (To insist, to not yield)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢至死不屈，就快俾人斬首嗰陣仍然堅持唔投降。
examples.translation: He died unyielding, when he was about to be beheaded, he still insisted on not surrendering.

senses.definition: 意志堅定，唔會俾其他嘢動搖而有改變。 (Strong-willed, will not be shaken by others and change.)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 美色當前，佢依然不所為動，果然係個正人君子。
examples.translation: He is a righteous man, not being tempted by lust

senses.definition: 兩人近身嘅打鬥, 可以持械或者空手都得 (wrestling or melee fighting)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 某人獨有嘅寫字風格；人人寫字習慣唔同，筆跡都會唔同。 (sby's handwriting; a person's particular style of writing words; everyone has different writing habits, hence different handwriting.)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 筆跡分析
examples.translation: handwriting analysis

senses.definition: 熨得好直好平順、挺拔，多數用嚟形容西裝或制服 (well-pressed, usu. to describe a suit or uniform)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 一套筆挺嘅西裝
examples.translation: a well-pressed suit

senses.definition: 一支筆筆尖以上嘅部分，用嚟俾人寫字時揸住。 (pen shaft, the handle which holds the pen nib)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 冇停止，冇結束，指好多，多到唔會完。 (endless, infinite, inexhaustible)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 滔滔不絕
examples.translation: babbling so intensely that it feels like it would never end

senses.definition: 唔停，不停，無休止 (non-stop, continually, without pause)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 不住禱告
examples.translation: pray continually

senses.definition: 唔錯，幾好，唔係一般貨色 (not bad; quite good; fine; not ordinary)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢度嘅食物都尚算不俗。
examples.translation: The food here is quite good.

senses.definition: 百分百，完全係，特質同某物完全一致 (out and out; unquestionably; hundred percent; have exactly the same characteristics as something)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 一個不折不扣嘅英雄
examples.translation: an out and out hero

senses.definition: 填番空咗嘅位置 (to fill up a vacancy)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 因為冠軍違反參賽條件被取消資格，冠軍位置由亞軍補上。
examples.translation: The champion was disqualified because he violated the rules; the championship was therefore given to the runner up.

senses.definition: 指一個人打扮好古怪，或者一件物件設計或者功態等等同一般有分別，唔知似乜咁 (describing someone with a really weird, "out-there" appearance)
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: 值得俾人咁叫; 俾人咁叫完全受得起 (worthy of; deservedly)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 佢不愧係世界冠軍。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 bat1 kwai5 hai6 sai3 gaai3 gun3 gwan1.
examples.translation: He is worthy of the title of world champion.

senses.definition: 喪失咗生殖能力嘅人 ((of people) sterile; barren; unable to have produce children)
senses.label: 形容詞

senses.definition: 啲物件冇端端唔見咗 (to disappear without a trace (for objects))
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: 否定，唔認同，唔覺得係啱嘅，甚至係覺得係無關 (disagree, not to agree with, not to think it is true or relevant)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢講咗佢嘅意見，但係大家都不以為然。
examples.translation: He expressed his views, but nobody agreed with him.

senses.definition: 唔仁慈，唔講仁義 (merciless; unkind)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 一個麻木不仁嘅殺手
examples.translation: an unfeeling and merciless killer

senses.definition: 非常重要，必須，唔可以缺少或被取代。 (terribly important, essential, cannot be absent or replaced.)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 草帽海賊團入面每個團員都係不可或缺嘅存在。
examples.translation: In the Straw Hat Pirate crew, every member is essential.

senses.definition: 好多，多到數唔到 (countless; innumerable)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 夜空上嘅星星，多得不可勝數。
examples.translation: The stars in the night sky are too many to be counted.

senses.definition: 唔可以，唔能夠，唔得 (cannot, not able to)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 唔批準 (not allowed, forbidden)
（某做法）唔會成功 ((a method) cannot work well)
唔公平，有所偏頗 (unjust, unfair)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 社會不公，好多人都企出嚟發聲。
examples.translation: The society is unjust, that many people come forward and voice out.

senses.definition: 唔理，不論，通常用嚟表明下列任何事情都唔會改變某事。 (no matter (how, what, etc.); regardless of; usually used to indicate anything listed after the phrase would not be able to alter something.)
senses.label: 連詞

examples.text: 唔理發生咩事，我都會撐落去。
examples.translation: No matter what happens, I will persist.

senses.definition: 唔係特登，唔為意，冇意識咁做咗某事 (unintentionally; unconsciously)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 佢不經意間撞跌咗個File，見到老公同情婦嘅合照。
examples.translation: She unintentionally knocked the file off the table, and saw the photo of her husband and the mistress.

senses.definition: 唔令大家失望，唔辜負大眾期望，做得到人哋想佢做嘅嘢。 (to live up to others' expectations, not to let the others down, do what they anticipated you to do)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 如果當選議員，我一定不負眾望，為市民效力。
examples.translation: If I'm elected as a legislator, I won't disappoint the public and I would serve the people.

senses.definition: 唔一樣，唔符合 (not to match; not to tally; to be inconsistent with)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 與事實不符
examples.translation: not to tally with the facts (or be inconsistent with the facts)

senses.definition: 唔趕，唔緊張，慢慢嚟 (unhurriedly; unhastily; leisurely)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 佢啲時間預到啱啱好，喺最後一分鐘，佢至不慌不忙噉上車。
examples.translation: He estimated the time just right, in the last minute he got on the car without a hurry.

senses.definition: 犯法嘅人，通常形容犯下比較嚴重嘅罪行，特別係刑事法。（量詞：個） (criminal, people who break the law, usually used to describe someone who commit a more serious offense, especially criminal law.)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我哋應該擧報罪行，將不法之徒繩之於法。
examples.translation: We should report the crimes, and pull those criminals behind the bars.

senses.definition: 喺緊急情況下，講嘢、神態仍然同平時一樣，形容人非常鎮靜。 (not revealing somebody's feelings or emotions; not turning a hair)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 有人打劫銀行，銀行經理不動聲色，偷偷報警。
examples.translation: Someone is robbing the bank, the bank manager did not turn a hair and secretly called the cops.

senses.definition: 只係 #報喜 而唔報壞消息、負面嘅嘢。 (only announce good news but not to announce bad news)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 嗰份報紙立場親政府，成日都係報喜不報憂，唔會報道民間疾苦。
examples.translation: That newspaper tend to support the government, they often only report the good news, folk hardships will not be reported.

senses.definition: 報告好消息、正面、聽到會覺得開心嘅嘢。 (announce good news)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 指被保險人參加保險個陣時，根據佢投保時所訂嘅保險費率，向保險人交付嘅費用（量詞:筆） (insurance premium; the amount of money to be charged for a certain amount of insurance coverage)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 讚賞, 正面, 好 (to praise; to honour; to commend)
senses.label: 語素

examples.text: 褒義
examples.translation: positive connotation

senses.definition: 睇唔到關鍵所在 (cannot perceive the crucial point of things)
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: 形容兒女不考 (unfilial (children; offspring); unworthy)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 不肖子
examples.translation: an unworthy son

senses.definition: 將塊面拉到好實 (to stretch something really tightly)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 你又繃緊塊面做乜呀?
examples.jyutping: nei5 jau6 bang1 gan2 faai3 min6 zou6 mat1 aa3?
examples.translation: Why are you tightening your face again?

senses.definition: 形容將啲嘢拉得好緊 (to stretch something really tightly)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢成日繃住塊面做乜呀？
examples.jyutping: keoi5 seng4 jat6 bang1 zyu6 faai3 min6 zou6 mat1 aa3?
examples.translation: What's the matter with him? His face looks so tight.

senses.definition: 唔係好大嘅霧（量詞:陣） (thin mist; light mist)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 明早有薄霧。
examples.translation: There will be some light mist tomorrow morning.

senses.definition: 客人嘅統稱 (generic term of guests)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 廣集各式工商產品，陳列展覽，藉以促進文化交流，工商繁榮、進步嘅展覽會（量詞:個） (exposition; exhibition)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一個可以俾人記錄低啲重要野用黎之後睇番嘅嘅工具（量詞:份） (memorandum)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 預備陣間用; 待用 (to be ready for use; to stand by; to be in reserve)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 薯仔洗淨備用。
examples.translation: Wash the potatoes and keep them for use later.

senses.definition: 擁有啲一啲設備 (to be equipped with; to have)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 本醫院備有先進嘅醫療設備。
examples.translation: Our hospital is equipped with advanced medical equipment.

senses.definition: 隊伍，團隊。（量詞：個） (team; group)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 特首嘅領導班子
examples.jyutping: dak6 sau2 ge3 ling5 dou6 baan1 zi2
examples.translation: the Chief Executive's leadership team

senses.definition: 隊伍，成員嘅組合。 (crew, team)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 又話大陸版《西遊記》個電腦特技係由《魔戒》嘅班底負責，但點解咁肉酸㗎？
examples.jyutping: jau6 waa6 daai6 luk6 baan2 sai1 jau4 gei3 go3 din6 nou5 dak6 gei6 hai6 jau4 mo1 gaai3 ge3 baan1 dai2 fu6 zaak3, daan6 dim2 gaai2 gam3 juk6 syun1 gaa3?
examples.translation: They say the computer graphics of the Mainland version of "Journey to the West" are taken up by the crew from "Lord of the Rings", but why is it so hideous?

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
未有內容 NO DATA
